name: Apartment in centre of Rotterdam
description:
This bright comfortable one bedroom apartment with a architectural thouch has a true cosy feeling! It comfortably fits two and is centrally located on a quiet street, near everything you need! Shops, musea, transport, dining, bars and supermarket!
Take a look at the floorplan to save money.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in a quiet side street of the Witte de With. So you are near the restaurants, bars and pubs but you don't have the noise!
host_about:
Hi I'm Kim and I'm an architect. 
I studied at the TU in Delft. The apartment is renewed by myself. I wanted to created a place where you feel at home. It is a combined style of wood some color and comfortable warm furniture.  You are very welcome to find out yourself :)

Take a look at the floor plan between the pictures. The whole apartment is yours! To save money contact me directly via contact info at the floor plan.

name: Apartment Dependance Rotterdam
neighborhood_overview: Lively young neighborhood. Bistro on the corner, Lots of nice shops, Museums within walking distance, Cinema, public transport all nearby.
host_about:
I am a mimeplayer as a professional, play theatre acts on festivals, busines parties, weddings, conferences, etc. On the picture is shown me and my husband as "Henk en Ien",  our cotton candy act. www.suikerspinmachien.nl.
My initiative to start renting an apartment was inspired by my colleague, who did it already in The Hague, Maff apartment.
now it is, next to my work, my pasion to entertain people and make sure that my guests feel at home.
The apartment is renovated is 2008 with help from an architect, my husband and a few great workers to make it a little palace in Rotterdam. Sometimes, when it is not rented, me and my husband stay there to be on holliday for a night. We always ejoy staying.

name: Sunny garden apt in Kralingen/R'dam
host_about:
This apartment is my "pied a terre" in Rotterdam acquired many years ago.  Kralingen, where the apartment is located, was a village until 1895(?) and still feels like a village even though it is only 1 kilometer from the heart of Rotterdam...such as the main public library,  the main fruit and vegetable market and the Hoogstraat (Highstreet or Main St.).

The nearby streets and houses are really lovely, lovely, lovely and very quaint...  Just thinking about taking a walk within a block or two from my apartment lifts my spirits even when I am not at home in Rotterdam.    Rotterdam  is constantly changing and is a great modern city.

It would be my pleasure to give you more info on Rotterdam and the Netherlands ... just let me know what your interests are!

name: City appartment: b&b Walenburg
description: A lovely, comfortable stay in the city centre of Rotterdam. The appartment is very spacious, has it's own kitchen and a nice garden-view. At night it is very quiet. The Central Station, as well as the town center and restaurants are on walking distance.
neighborhood_overview: The northern side of Rotterdam Centre is an up-coming area. Here you will find authentic old pre-war houses. The atmosphere is pleasant. There are lots of nice little restaurants.
host_about: I'm an event organiser in creative industry, based in Rotterdam, the Netherlands. I live in the city center of Rotterdam for almost 25 years and I can tell you: I love my city. I also like to travel, to take pictures, to watch movies (our Rotterdam Filmfestival is awesome!), read books and to cook. Saturdays I watch my sons football match and I do some groceries on the Rotterdam Market.

name: Apartment  Rotterdam Noord
description: The wonderfully spacious two-room Apartment Rotterdam Noord is located at ground level on a quiet street. The city center at a 10 minute walk and public transport available at the end of the street. A spacious and cozy bedroom with closets, small desk and a nice double bed. Living room with lounge area, dining table and workplace with WiFi. Private bathroom with shower and toilet. A kitchen for preparing simple meals. Covered balcony and south facing garden. A pleasant stay.
neighborhood_overview: Apartment Rotterdam Noord is situated in a quiet street in a lively neighborhood in Rotterdam Noord. In this area the most small and creative businesses in Rotterdam.

name: Spacious room close to city centre
description:
Spacious room with sink & private balcony in a beautiful privately-owned house in a quiet, safe, street and neighbourhood.

Bathroom and toilet shared with the host. Shared kitchenette on the 2nd floor for minimal usage.

5 minutes walk to bus (38, 40, 456, 824) and tram (21, 23, 24). 15 minutes walk to Rotterdam central station.

Close to city centre, hospital, & a direct tram to university.

name: Romantic deckhouse on historic ship central R'dam
description:
Romantic overnight in the deckhouse of a historic ship.
This skipper's house is 4x5 m2 and 182 cm high.
With a seat on the roof of the deckhouse and a beautiful view.

This special and bright space is located in a quiet spot in the heart of Rotterdam in the former skipper's house of the historic ship "Veinard", which means "Bofkont".

Spending the night here will complete your Rotterdam experience, whether you came for relaxation and fun or as a business traveler.

welcome!
neighborhood_overview:
Trendy and dynamic neighbourhood 'Witte de Wihtstraat' is just around the corner.
Supermarket SPAR 5 minutes walking.
there are lots of things to do here close by.
host_about:
Dear Guests,

From the first of July 2021 Im the new owner of the ship MS Veinard in Rotterdam. 
Because for my work as fine artist and Polar expedition photographer I'm not always around. Michiel from rhBnB (Rotterdam Host BnB) is the host. If you plan to stay on the MS Veinard he will be your contact person,  receive you and can answer all your questions.

This kind of ship is called a Spits. She is build in Belgium in 1913 and 38.40 meter long and 5.04 meter wide.
From 1948 the ships name is Veinarrd, what ‘Lucky one’ means (bofkont in Dutch).

You are very welcome on the MS VEINARD surrounded by the vibrant city of Rotterdam. 

Esther

name: Boutique hostel in the middle of Rotterdam
description: In Hostel Ani&Haakien you find the real oldschool backpackers vibe, its definitly a place where you can meetup with others! If you come to study in Rotterdam for a while, this must be the place the build on your new social enviroment.
neighborhood_overview:
You won’t find us on a busy bar street — at Ani&Haakien you’ll get a good night’s sleep
But no worries, the young and bustling Central District area of Rotterdam with good coffee places, awesome design shops and bars are really nearby! Drop your heavy bags at the hostel, and let us tell you all about the cool stuff to do in Rotterdam. Hostel Ani & Haakien is the perfect hub for day trips! Just 10min to Delft / 40min to Amsterdam / 40min to Utrecht and 20min to The Hague!
host_about: We are Joyce & Danielle who run this cute small hostel in the centre of rotterdam already for 10 years :))) Both born and raised in Rotterdam and together with our superteam we love to welcome all travellers who like to get to know this awesome city!

name: Luxe Guest house in Hooimijt
description:
Sleeping in Rotterdam, but not in a hotel?
Our luxury Guest House is located in the former haystack of the oldest peat farm in Rotterdam. The Guest House is wonderfully spacious and fully equipped with its own entrance, garden and free parking in its own yard.
neighborhood_overview: The Guesthouse is located on the edge of the Schiebroekse park where you can enjoy walking, running and cycling. Families with small children will find within walking distance of Guesthouse Familiepark Plaswijckpark! In Rotterdam Hillegersberg you will find many nice shops and restaurants.
host_about: Sinds 2011 zijn wij samen met onze twee jongens de bewoners van dit bijzondere stukje in Rotterdam. Wij hebben tijdens de verbouwing van de oude veenboerderij een kleine twee jaar met heel veel plezier in onze hooimijt gewoond. Deze hooimijt hebben wij verbouwd tot een heerlijk luxe Guesthouse. Graag willen wij reizigers laten genieten van dit bijzondere stukje Rotterdam! Wij hopen jullie in ons Guesthouse te mogen ontvangen!

name: Groepsverhuur Luciana en/of Catherina te Rotterdam
description:
The Luciana with max. 22 sleeping places on the river in the heart of Rotterdam!
So not max. 16 people! The Catherina can sleep up to 18.
in the rustic shipping quarter in the sight of a super skyline, namely the "Manhattan aan de Maas".
Shopping center and nightlife areas are in walking distance.
The fast water taxi comes in front of the door.
Around New Year's Eve it is at least 3 nights rent.
Both ships are on AN agenda!!
So even though it looks like a period is occupied, the 2nd ship can still be free!
neighborhood_overview:
The historical shipping district is a beautiful village in Rotterdam city center.
Beautiful views, lots of greenery, nice hiking and going out.
host_about:
Uw gastheer was familievader en voerde als kapitein samen met vrouw en zonen de zeilrederij Vof Europe Sailing.
Ik woon nabij mijn familie op de te verhuren zeilschepen 'Luciana', 'Catherina' en 'Marie Galante' in de Veerhaven Rotterdam centrum.
Mijn favoriete reisbestemmingen zijn in Noorwegen en Portugal.
Ik heb weinig tijd voor boeken, maar lees graag reisverhalen en (maritieme)geschiedenis.
Bij slecht weer pak ik de Bios.

name: Casa La Rosa – B&B / Shortstay
description: Casa la Rosa is a fully equipped classical Bed and Breakfast / Short Stay facility located close to the inner-city of Rotterdam and good connected with public transport. Casa la Rosa has a private bathroom and separated kitchen and its own balcony.
neighborhood_overview:
ACTIVITIES
Rotterdam knows lots of summer festivals and other outings. Especially the smaller festivals are a good occasion to come to Rotterdam and stay at our B & B. In the mini apartment you will find all kinds of brochures, a map of Rotterdam and a calendar with lots of activities. In the park Heemraadsingel, around the corner from Casa La Rosa, the Singelding is located, a cozy place to drink a cup of coffee or to take part to the activities it organizes. In addition, keep yourself up to date with the workshops on healthy cooking that Fabiana organizes through her blog byebyesalsiccia.
host_about: We are a Dutch Italian family with two young kids.

name: Stylish apartment on Rotte canal with roof garden
description:
The literary haven: where hearts and bookshelves collide.
This urban oasis is as vibrant as the city itself.
From the exposed brick wall to the bookfilled nooks, every corner has been curated to embody the essence of Rotterdam's creative energy.
You have the entire apartment AND the coveted roof garden all to yourselves.
Imagine waking up in a chic, thoughtfully designed living space adorned with an eclectic mix of vintage finds, contemporary art and many, many books.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Rubroek, the hidden gem of Rotterdam that's just waiting for you to explore its delights. Get ready to immerse yourself in my neighbourhood where creativity, vintage charm and urban energy converge into a symphony of awesomeness.
As you stroll through the streets, you'll find artisinal coffee shops that rival the coolest cafes in the world. Grab a cup of meticulously brewed coffee or a unique herbal tea blend, and take a seat at a wooden table that's practically begging for your indie novel or sketchbook.
Vitage affecionados, this neighbourhood has your name written all over it. Explore thrift stores and boutiques that are filled with retro treasures waiting to be discovered.
And when the sun sets, the energy of Rubroek transforms yet again.
Imagine trendy eateries illuminated by fairy lights, bustling with laughter and conversation. Try unique fusion cuisine or savor artsanal pizza.
( list included in house manual).

name: Sleep by the bridge with great view
description:
Since the start in 2012 this B&B is very popular by expats, tourists and travelers. The apartment is located on the 5th (upper) floor and has a stunning view from the large balcony.
The rental is based on 1 person
Extra person 25€
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is multi cultural with a wide variety of shops, restaurants and take aways.
People are easy going and my quests are mostly positive surpriced.
host_about:
During my worldtrip in 2011, I got the idea to start a B&B. I try to give my guests a "feel free" feeling and give them information about the house and city.
Since July 2012 it was immediately a succes for travelers and expats. I like to meet different people from different countries.

TRAVELING IS A WAY OF LIVE

name: Rotterdam countryside like home & inhouse elevator
description:
Countryside like home in the Rotterdam, located at a quiet child friendly area with a playground around the corner. The subway station is only a 2 minutes walk. Two parking spots available on the premises and the city center is just a 5 minutes drive. The interstate highway A16 is reachable within just a few minutes.
Luxury home elevator the house is fully accessible - on every level - with the convenience to carry people with mobility limitations.
neighborhood_overview:
Kralingen is a chic gem set in the east of Rotterdam. With an expansive backyard, where the rest of the city is always welcome for a barbecue: the Kralingse Bos.

The east of Rotterdam boasts the city’s biggest park: the Kralingse Bos. This green oasis is a major attraction for everyone seeking to flee the busy urban streets for some fresh air and peace and quiet. Not that it’s always quiet; the Kralingse Bos is often humming with pleasant activity on sunny weekend afternoons. Nature lovers enjoy a stroll through the forest. Sun-worshipers bask on the lake’s small beach. Toddlers splash around in the wading pool or play at the petting zoo. Bigger children will love exploring the climbing park. People rollerblade, jog and cycle to their heart’s content around the lake and go sailing on the lake, while snacks are served at tables on the waterfront terraces.
host_about: Ejal Breeman has founded several ICT firms, all with a focus on innovation, hardware development, telecommunications and integration of existing ICT systems.

name: Family / garden home at the river
description: Our spacious (175m2) light and recently renovated house (2020)  offers you best of both worlds: in the middle of nature, with the river 'de Rotte' right in front of our door, with a huge garden to enjoy the sun, but still close enough to reach the city centre by bicycle (12 min) or by foot (only 25 min). Even our Rotterdam friends envy us for this perfect spot! We rent out the house when we are out traveling ourselves, so it's fully equipped with everything you need!
neighborhood_overview: Nature and water. You'll see a lot of sports practiced here: running, biking, rowing, horse back riding. The people living here are a mix of young families and older friendly people.
host_about:
Together with my two boys, I live in one of the most beautiful parts of Rotterdam, at the river the Rotte. It always feels like holiday at home, surrounded by nature, and only 15 minutes (by bike!) from the citycentre.

We all love to travel, and meet new people. And next to traveling, photography is my passion and (lucky me!) profession. 
To combine both of these beautiful things in life makes me a real lucky and happy women! 

Before we bought this house we went traveling for 15 months all over the world, so we know that to really get to know a place, you have to meet and stay with the locals.
That is why we think AirBnB is a perfect medium, both as a guest ánd as a host!

name: Rotterdam's coolest apartment
description:
The coolest apartment... on the coolest street... in the coolest city... in the Netherlands!

The perfect base of operations for a Rotterdam city break or vacation. This very spacious, newly renovated apartment is located right in the middle of the Witte de Withstraat and is ideal for couples, families, colleagues, or any group of up to 5 people.
neighborhood_overview:
The Witte de Withstraat is a very lively street in the city center, with cultural institutions, restaurants, galleries, cool shops, and bars.
The apartment is right in the middle, across from a former school building, which is now a museum/gallery space for modern art (Tent/Witte de With).

The street is on the so-called Art Axis (Kunst-as) between the museums on the Leuvehaven and the Museum Park (Boijmans Van Beuningen, Het Nieuwe Instituut, the Natural History Museum, and the Kunsthal). The park is a short walk from the apartment. Festivals and markets are held here all year round (including the Parade, Open Air Cinema, Swan Market, Museum Night, etc.).

New in town? There's no better place from which to discover Rotterdam than from this apartment. A must see.
host_about: American living in the Netherlands, freelance translator, mommy of 1...

name: Luxury penthouse overlooking the water - Rotterdam
description:
Luxury penthouse overlooking water - Rotterdam Hillegersberg.

Fully furnished, luxury penthouse (142m2) with direct water views in most populair area of Rotterdam: Hillegersberg. Idyllic with unobstructed views of the river and the park. Many boat rental company's.

Large living room with luxurious, open kitchen, bathroom, study, bedroom, full-width balcony and private parking. Supermarkets, restaurants, coffee
places within reach. Rotterdam citycenter is 10-15 minutes by bike/bus/car.
neighborhood_overview: All amenities are within easy reach, such as public transport, arterial roads (A20), catering establishments and the cosy Kleiweg Kwartier with all shops and supermarkets. Water sports club/ marina ''Aegier'' and tennis club ''Lommerrijk'' are a few minutes' walk away. By bike, you can be in the centre of Rotterdam in 10-15 minutes.
host_about: Always on the road! Love to discover new countries, cultures and meeting new people. Fluent in the English language, good in Spanish, German and French.

name: Spacious 3-room apartment in a relaxed area
description: A little 5-min walk from the central park called Kralingse plas, all convenient places nearby and only 15 minutes (bike, public transportation or taxi) away from the city centre. In an authentic house in one of the best and easy going neighbourhoods of Rotterdam. This perfect located house with all relevant amenities makes living here really a bless.
neighborhood_overview:
Kralingen is one of the highly recommended neighborhood of Rotterdam. Biggest part of Kralingen exist of old authentic houses and apartments constructed around (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). In Kralingen you will find a big park around 'de kralingse plas (lake)' where you can go for a drink, picknick, run or just a stroll.

- If you like to have a picknick in the park or just a walk, you are only a 5 min walk away from the Kralingse plas.
- If you don't want to cook, you will find different restaurants (Thai, Surinam, India, Italian, Chinese) around the corner of the apartment. But if you prefer to cook, the supermarket is only 1 minute away.
- Kralingen is a relative quiet neighborhood much different than the busy city centre, but still only 10 - 15 minutes away by subway or taxi.

name: Appartment in "centrum/west" (the place to be)..
description:
Luxury appartment with breakfast facilities in the heart of Rotterdam.

Located at the Heemraadssingel, the most beautiful canal in town with its wooden bridges, broadleave trees and weeping willows, you can find our well equipped appartment that can be rented for a long– or short stay.

Additionally, our appartment is available as Bed and Breakfast with good and organic food for only 25.00 euro.

The city centre is at walking distance. Bicycles are available to go about town “the Dutch way”.
neighborhood_overview:
History
In the past, members of the more wealthy middle class took up residence in our neighboring houses. Later, the monumental buildings were mainly used as offices or institutions. In the last 20 years the neighborhood is pleasently inhibited by an artistic and entrepeneurial crowd.

The former housemaid sleeping and living quarter in the semi basement was turned into a neat and comfortable appartment in 2011.

Bars, resto's and shops are available around the corner.

name: Spacious studio, near City Centre / Rotterdam CS
description:
Excellent starting point for trips in and outside the city.
Basically a one room apartment, with private bathroom (shower) and basic cooking facilities.
Located in a relatively quiet street with mostly enough (paid 9 a.m. - 11 p.m.) parking space.
A 10 minute walk from Rotterdam CS public transport hub, concerthall De Doelen, Theater De Schouwburg and the Blijdorp ZOO.
There is a roof terrace exclusively for our guests, with a 360° view of the city skyline.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood was developed in the twenties and thirties of the 20th century. The street is very atmospheric with large trees and broad sidewalks, and most of the time enough parking space. On one end of the street there is a free accessable sports ground. On the other side it runs into the Heemraadssingel, a spacious area with a canal and a childrens playgroutd.
Two blocks away, the lively Middellandstraat has a multicultural atmosphere and wide range of shops, supermarkets, espressobars and lunchrooms.
host_about:
A freelance graphic and online designer, living and working In Rotterdam with Hennie and our son. 
I like the cultural offerings of the city, such as the museums, theater and cinema's.
In our holidays we like to combine culture with nature, and love to hike and bike.

name: Nice apartment in Rotterdam South
description: I'm offering my cosy apartment in Rotterdam South, 10 minutes away from the city centre by metro, 10 minutes walk from the  shopping centre Zuidplein, the concert arena AHOY and 3-4 minutes walk from the best party spot in Rotterdam - Maassilo and a metro station Maashaven.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located nearby metro station Maashaven and a few steps away from the old factory Maassilo where every Saturday great parties are organized. There is also a big shopping centre "Zuidplen" in a walking distance and really easy access to the city centre (15 minutes to Rotterdam Central Station) or 10 minutes to Station "Beurs" that is located nearby the Witte DeWith Street or as I like to say the street that never sleeps :-)
host_about:
It's very difficult to describe yourself really. I'm just a next door guy who, together with my boyfriend loves travelling, discovering new places those nearby and those very far away and meeting new, interesting people :-)

My life is filled with music that in a free time I'm also "sort of" creating on my PC :-)

I also like cooking, reading books, watching movies, going to the theatre, playing computer games... etc, etc :-) Pretty weird combo I know, but I have many interests :-)

I think that's pretty much all I can say in a few words but if you have some questions, please feel free to ask.

name: Stylish studio near Central Station / City Centre
description:
Excellent starting point for trips in and outside the city.

Basically a one room apartment, with private bathroom (shower) and basic cooking facilities.

Located in a relatively quiet street with mostly enough (paid) parking space (free after 23 p.m. and on sunday mornings).

A 12 minute walk from Rotterdam CS public transport hub, concerthall De Doelen, Theater De Schouwburg and the Blijdorp ZOO.

There is a roof terrace, exclusively for the guests, with a 360° view of the city skyline.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood was developed in the twenties and thirties of the 20th century. The street is very atmospheric with large trees and broad sidewalks, and most of the time enough parking space. On one end of the street there is a free accessable sports ground. On the other side it runs into the Heemraadssingel, a spacious area with a canal and a childrens playgroutd.
Two blocks away, the lively Middelandstraat has a multicultural atmosphere and wide range of shops, supermarkets, espressobars and lunchrooms.
host_about:
A freelance graphic and online designer, living and working In Rotterdam with Hennie and our son. 
I like the cultural offerings of the city, such as the museums, theater and cinema's.
In our holidays we like to combine culture with nature, and love to hike and bike.

name: Comfy Room @ Historical Delfshaven
description:
Modern, spacious double bedroom with lots of windows, sunny mornings in a beautiful, renovated building.
Just a 7 min. metro ride to Rotterdam centre.
Public transport,taxi,supermarkets,nightshop,drugstores,market etc are right at your doorstep.
neighborhood_overview:
Visit the district of Delfshaven, located close to vibrant Rotterdam centre. In multicultural Delfshaven no one is an outsider. The people are relaxed and friendly.
Our house is situated on a lovely, little, lively square with benches, an organic shop and McDonalds next door. Around the corner left and right you will find drugstores, money exchange, teller machine, restaurants, pubs, hairdressers,internetcafe, nailstudio, fresh fishstore, butcher, a landromat and a large variety of other small stores.
In romantic, 16th century Historical Delfshaven, close to our house, you will find a small beerfactory, art studio's , a large poolcafé and various nice restaurants.
Across the street is a large supermarket (Jumbo, open from 08:00 - 21:00 seven days a week). On Thursday and Saturday there is a large market at a 5 minute walking distance from the apartment, where you can buy a variety of products. Across from the building there is an evening supermarket, open till midnight.
host_about:
In my free time i enjoy beeing with friends, going out and going to festivals. 
In the summer i love to travel with my old-timer camper and visit festivals in Europe.

name: Authentic, comfy appt with a stunning river-view
description: We have a classic authentic loft (since it hasn't complete separate rooms) with stunning views over the river, between the two famous bridges. name: Special&Spacious urban family house
description: Our special&spacious house with garden is situated in Rotterdam-West. We transformed the former 3 apartments into one spacious and modern house with special features like an industrial staircase, a monochrome blue bathroom and a ‘floating' kitchen.
neighborhood_overview:
Our house is part of a very special renovation project. Together with our 25 neighbors we got the houses for free from the local government and renovated them to everyones own wishes. There are a lot of creative people in our block; artists, designers and architects. The inner area of the block is a huge communal garden, making the place a green and quit oasis within the busy city.
The house is situated in the nice, vibrant neighborhood of Rotterdam-West. There are lots of shops, restaurants and coffee places in the direct area. It’s a 5-minute walk from the Van Nelle Fabriek (Unesco world heritage), which offers several events and art fairs during the year. For children there are playgrounds, a petting zoo, a park, the Blijdorp zoo and a very nice and unique ‘wild nature playground’ nearby. The stadium of the Sparta football club leis within the neighborhood; you can hear them cheer on Sunday afternoon.
The historic Delfshaven harbor is on a 5-minute walk, featuring centuri

name: Cute Room for Two in Amazing Historic Ship!
description: Welcome to Avontuur - the Ark for Healing, Wellbeing and Inner Growth. A historic clipper located in the heart of the city center of Rotterdam, one of the most exciting cities in the world for travelers! Avontuur is more then just a lodging space, it is an experience. An open ashramic space that offers yoga, meditation, workshops and concerts, as well as massage, coaching and an amazing spa experience. We have three beautiful spaces available, the Cute Room, the Cozy Room, and the Captains Hut.
neighborhood_overview:
You're right in the city centre. So all Rotterdam's highlights are within a 15 mins walk! Markthall, Erasmusbridge, Witte de Wittstraat, Tent, Meent, Coolsingel, Kunsthal, Lijnbaan, Booijman van Beuningen, and the list goes on and on...

There is a restaurant right next door, a big super market, and other small shops in the neighbourhood.
host_about:
I am an architect, urban planner and self development trainer.

Born on the East African equator at sunrise on the first day of spring, I was raised throughout Africa, Asia and the Caribbean and have travelled to the far reaches of the world exploring different natures, cultures and spiritual teachings. 

Since 1991 I am based in the Netherlands and have taken my students of architecture and city planning to slums and natural disaster areas across the globe researching and implementing sustainable development. 

I also offer self development workshops and sessions, and run holistic retreats in the Caribbean.

My life is devoted to the betterment of the planet and its peoples. I use my mind, body and soul to support the individual and collective consciousness.

Welcome to our home!

We offer you a comfortable room with private bathroom and toilet. The room is located in the attic and has access to our roof patio.

neighborhood_overview: We live in the middle of the Middelland-district next to the center of the city. It is a real Rotterdam neighbourhood, urban and not polished up for tourism. Ready to stay at a lovely decorated home in the centre of Rotterdam? Where your questions are answered by people who actually live there and have some great insiders tips for where to go?

neighborhood_overview: The Witte de Withstraat is very well known in Rotterdam. Art, culture, restaurants, bars, clubs, you find all of it here. name: Luxurious apartment downtown
description: Elegant bright apartment in a 19th century cityhouse in Rotterdam's Central District just 5 minutes walking distance from Central Station, theatres, cinema, shops and museums. Fully equiped.
neighborhood_overview:
Rotterdam’s Central District is the gateway to the city and home to many international companies and multinationals. The area buzzes with a constant stream of people coming and going, which can make you think of New York. A hive of activity. Rotterdam Central railway station is the Central District’s new landmark.

Central railway station, Concert hall De Doelen, Theatre Stadsschouwburg and Cinema Pathé are literally around the corner on a 3 minutes walking distance.

West-Kruiskade is a long shopping street with shops representing every corner of the world, from Chinese to Surinamese shops selling everything under the sun and from Dutch butcher’s to Turkish baker’s shops. Its many multicultural restaurants and snack bars make it the ideal place to find an exotic bite to eat. The West-Kruiskade is often compared similar to the famous Zeedijk in Amsterdam.

The Museumkwartier is a dynamic area where lots of museums, art institutions and galleries are based

name: Spacious family city apartment with garden (150m2)
description:
Our spacious 3-story (aprox 150 m2) city apartment/house includes 4 bedrooms (2 double bedrooms and 2 single bedrooms), 1 terrace-balcony and a lovely garden.

The house is centrally located in a beautiful, quiet street in the city centre of Rotterdam. It's an ideal location to explore the local neighborhood and to discover downtown Rotterdam and the rest of the city. Close to subway, bus and tram.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is centrally located in a beautiful, quiet street in the city centre of Rotterdam. It's a ideal location to explore the local neighborhood and to discover downtown Rotterdam and the rest of the city. The Nieuwe Binnenweg, the longest and most vibrant alternative shopping street of Rotterdam, runs parallel (one block north) to our street. The street is a perfect example of Rotterdam’s diversity. It features a surprising mix of original and authentic stores, local bakeries and coffee places, as well as many bar/restaurants with food from all over the world. Just around our corner are two well-stacked supermarkets (one of which organic). Also around the corner you’ll find one of the best and most relaxed coffee bars in town (Urban Espresso Bar West) and grand cafe (Westerpaviljoen), various great restaurants (Italians, Gourmet Burger, French, Surinam) and a jazz club just around the corner.

Tot snel!

description:
This spacious, recently renovated apartment in the most beautiful street of Rotterdam is the perfect place to stay. The luminous and clean rooms offer peace and quiet, and the comfort you need while discovering the lively West district -and the rest of the city.

Adjacent neighborhoods such as the picturesque Delfshaven and Centrum are within walking distance, as well as numerous bars and restaurants, various shops and supermarkets.
neighborhood_overview:
Rotterdam West is one of the liveliest and nicest neighborhoods in Rotterdam. The apartment is centrally located in quiet avenue with large trees. Within a 10-minute walking distance from the Central Station.

name: B&B BOAT NAUTILUS ROTTERDAM
description:
Comfortable Appartment in historic Salon-Cliper build in 1892 On a great location close to the city center.
The appartment: romantic sleep / sitting room, bathroom, toilet, deckhaus, private rear loungedeck with comfortable seats.
neighborhood_overview:
Just an exemple: The other Day with friends we walked to Hotel Newyork. A beatifull restaurant / bar with interesting vieuws over the River.

Ater a drink at the bar, we took the watertaxi to the nearby maritiem museum, which is also very Interesting for Kids.

From the museum we crossed the street to the Witte de With straat where we went to one of the many bars to drink a beer with a tipical Dutch snack, bitterballen.

From there we walked to the oude haven (old harbour) and took the watertaxi back to the Nautilus where we chilled in the comfortable chesterfields and hammack on the roofed deck.

What a great day

Other things you can find around the corner.
Restaurants, bars, take-away's, tramstation, trainstation, grocery stores, Erasmus bridge, kop van zuid, entrepot haven etc.

description: My place is close to parks, and restaurants, and eateries. My place is suitable for couples, solo adventurers, and families of small families.

name: MyPlace - Apartment in Central Rotterdam
description:
This apartment contains all modern conveniences and is centrally located, within view of the Erasmus bridge and close to both metro & tram.
The price includes Breakfast.

The Witte de With quarter is the cultural and gastronomical heart of Rotterdam and is only a 4 min walk away, and close to many Points Of Interest such as the Markthal, Schouwburgplein, Euromast, Spido, museums & shops.

The apartment is suitable for solo's, couples and business travellers, and has 24hr access via a key-safe.
neighborhood_overview:
Known as the StadsDrieHoek (City Triangle), you are right in the centre of the city with a view of the Erasmus Bridge.
A colourful and busy neighbourhood, more suited to singles, couples and trios or a couple with 1 child.

name: Cosy barnhouse surrounded with nature!
description:
The holiday apartment is located in an old stable.

The farm is located in the outskirts of Rotterdam in an old neighborhood called 'De Kandelaar'. Only 30 people live here and it is the perfect spot in the middle of nature between the (big) cities Rotterdam, Schiedam and Delft.

The perfect place to combine the city and nature!

Our farm is only 5km from Schiedam, 8km from Delft and 12km from Rotterdam and 30 minutes (by car) from the beach.
neighborhood_overview:
The old farmhouse is located in beautiful piece of nature in the middle of the big cities! There are only 20 houses and recently there is a delicious and cozy brasserie opened just a 5 minute walk.

It is a beautiful area for cycling and/or hiking. Also the old city of Delft is very close or the beautiful and modern center of Rotterdam. Both are easily accessible by bike.

The beach is also relatively close. In 25 minutes you drive to Hoek van Holland beach, or in 40 minutes to the boulevard of Scheveningen. Since the summer of 2023, it is also possible to take the metro from Schiedam to the beach of Hoek van Holland. You can park the bike or car near metro station "Nieuwland (Schiedam)". You get off on the boulevard in Hoek van Holland! For more information, you can visit the website of Ret or 9292ov (website or app on the phone)!
host_about: In 2016 kochten wij de boerderij over van onze (schoon) moeder Marlies (Co-Host) en starten wij onze AirBnB locatie. Arne woont al bijna zijn hele leven op de boerderij en in 2012 kwam Marieke daarbij. In 2014 voegden we hond Izzi toe en in 2017 en 2020 verwelkomden we onze dochters! Naast het vakantiehuis werken wij 4 dagen per week bij een werkgever, verbouwen en onderhouden we alles zelf en gaan we graag met onze camper op vakantie!

name: Peaceful place in the city center!
description:
Ground floor apartment, with a garden on the south, Living room with piano, kitchen (dishwasher, oven, blender, watercooker, fridge, refridgerator and you can use everything in there), bathroom with washingmachine and dryer.
2 double bedroom
There is WIFI.
The garden site is next to the Meent a nice street with bars/restaurants and a big market on Tuesdays and Saturdays. on the other (front door) side you have the more hip bars and restaurants.
neighborhood_overview: Its only a few minutes walk from the trainstation, so also very handy when you want to visit Amsterdam which will take you 50 minutes by train. Also a few minutes walk from the Markthal, cubic houses, metro and the Meent and Boogjes where you can find nice bars and restaurants. Because of the parc in front of the garden also a very quiet place. There is a big market every tuesday and saturday next to the parc. And in front and at the backside of the house enough parkingspace.

name: ♡  Room in pittoresk area with great vieuw!
description: The room has a great view over the canal and Historical Delfshaven. A very picturesque area in Rotterdam. On the same floor there's a big bathroom with bath & a separate toilet.  The area has very nice places to have breakfast, lunch and dinner. The centrum of Rotterdam is very nearby, only 15 min. walk. Tram and metro are 2 min. walk. Or you can easily rent a bike at several companies. You can also use the yogaroom. You can make your own coffee and tea. Feel at home!
neighborhood_overview:
Historisch Delfshaven is a 15-minute walk away on the longest shopping street in the Netherlands.
Historic Delfshaven is a unique piece of old Rotterdam With beautiful and special facade houses, you will feel like you back in time. And with all the nice restaurants nearby, you can enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner. Or with your picnic basket by the water. Or even rent a boat. The supermarkets and organic shops are within walking distance. You are also close to the Euromastpark and can be reached by water taxi e.g. to Hotel Newyork.
host_about:
We like to share this house wich others, in this beautiful neighbourhoud , with great vieuw and nice people. 

I'm a yoga teacher ( you can practise with me if you like) or use my yogaroom. I love the sea, i love animals, i love nature & i love to dance. Dimitri is a sporty man with great passion for kitesurf & Tai Chi.

name: Captain's Hut in historic city center
description: Welcome to Avontuur - the Ark for Healing, Wellbeing and Inner Growth. A historic clipper located in the heart of the city center of Rotterdam, one of the most exciting cities in the world for travelers! Avontuur is more then just a lodging space, it is an experience. An open ashramic space that offers yoga, meditation, workshops and concerts, as well as massage, coaching and an amazing spa experience. We have three beautiful spaces available, the Cute Room, the Cozy Room, and the Captains Hut.
neighborhood_overview:
You're right in the city centre. So all Rotterdam's highlights are within a 15 mins walk! Markthall, Erasmusbridge, Witte de Wittstraat, Tent, Meent, Coolsingel, Kunsthal, Lijnbaan, Booijman van Beuningen, and the list goes on and on...

There is a restaurant right next door, a big super market, and other small shops in the neighbourhood.
host_about:
I am an architect, urban planner and self development trainer.

Born on the East African equator at sunrise on the first day of spring, I was raised throughout Africa, Asia and the Caribbean and have travelled to the far reaches of the world exploring different natures, cultures and spiritual teachings. 

Since 1991 I am based in the Netherlands and have taken my students of architecture and city planning to slums and natural disaster areas across the globe researching and implementing sustainable development. 

I also offer self development workshops and sessions, and run holistic retreats in the Caribbean.

My life is devoted to the betterment of the planet and its peoples. I use my mind, body and soul to support the individual and collective consciousness.

name: Hotspot in Rotterdam,  eigen douche, wc, airco
description: Private room  in Kralingen, near forest, lake, shopping and EUR. Own shower and washbasin. Air conditioning. Room adjacent to studio by toilet which is shared only during workshops and lessons, mostly in the afternoon. Pantry in studio with coffee/tea, microwave, refrigerator, stove, pans and cutlery. Pantry is in the first instance for a workshop and, therefore, not always squeaky clean (paint etc). Own access. Metro 50 meters. 10 minutes to city centre. Brought bicycles can be stored indoors.
neighborhood_overview: Shopping street around the corner, town is very close (10 min with metro). Near the Kralingse plas and wood. Metro and tram 100 meters. Quiet. Near EUR. Centre of Kralingen. Historic district. A lot of restaurants are found here.
host_about:
Ik ben docent beeldende vorming en geef workshops en cursussen aan kinderen en volwassenen in eigen atelier. Ik maak zelf schilderijen in gemengde technieken.
Het atelier ligt achter het huis. Ik fiets, zwem en schaats graag, en bezoek vaak theater, film en concerten in Rotterdam e.o. Ik heb 3 dochters, die het huis uit zijn (vandaar de airbnb activiteiten). Sinds 2020 heb ik een geweldig leuke kleinzoon. 
Het huis waarin ik woon is uit 1903,wat enorm leuk is maar ook niet erg onderhoudsvriendelijk ;). En er zijn veel op en afstapjes. 
Verder heb ik sinds 2017 de ziekte van Parkinson maar daar ben ik nog niet erg door beperkt gelukkig. Veel bewegen (sport) helpt! Daarom af en toe tremor.

name: Loft studio
description:
Our studio is located in the famous and most vibrant street in the heart of Rotterdam, de Witte de Withstraat. Near the studio are various bars and restaurants, public transport, shopping area, supermarket,museum and much more. You’ll love my place because of the elegant and trendy interior, the city view, the location and the ambiance. My place is excellent for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers.

The studio will make you feel home away from home <3
neighborhood_overview:
Witte de Withstraat is the place to be when visiting Rotterdam. It has many restaurants that are open till late and amazing bars with seating outside. It is a two minute walk to the nearest tube station and three minute walk to the shopping district.

Furthermore it is nearby the Coolsingel which houses the Rotterdam City hall, and it's nearby the shopping boulevard of the city. If you don't like the big shops you can also visite the small boutiques on the Van Oldenbarneveldstraat, Karel Doormanstraat or de Meent.
If you have a panache for art, local products or like to buy things from local artists, entrepreneurs, hobbyist/amateurs, the Witte de Withstraat is dotted with (vintage and pop-up) shops/boutiques & galleries that sell these.

It's a 10 minute walk from:
- the newly constructed Markthal, which you really should visite to buy some local products or eat something at the venues.
- the Cubic houses
- the Eramusburg where you can explor

name: Cosy and spacious near city center
description:
Cosy apartment with three bedrooms, bathroom, seperate restroom, open plan kitchen and woodburner in the spacious livingroom.
The city center is 5-10 minutes away on bike or public transport, groceries at walking distance.
Situated in a stately lane near impressive Heemraadsingel, ample parking space available.
neighborhood_overview:
Dutch+English
Our part of the New West is quiet, with a large children's playground around the corner. The neighborhood dates back to the beginning of the last century and the street is full of monumental chestnuts.

Our part of the neighbourhood is quiet, with a large children's playground around the corner. The neighbourhood originates at the start of the 20th century and the lane is planted with stately chestnut trees.
host_about:
Enjoying life, married, working the Hague and Rotterdam. Love to have dinner with friends or just hang out. I'm a foodie who loves the cinema - but then who isn'nt?

We're both outgoing people interested in art, politics, the world. We spend a lot of time visiting theatre, music and bars.

name: HIDDEN GEM WITH PRIVATE SAUNA GREAT VIEW
description: My space is close to a new district of Rotterdam with palm trees, a wide beach and the waterskiing park, beach club, excellent restaurants and supermarkets. Subway 7 min walk. Enjoy the spacious, light bathroom with a big shower and bath, lovely view in the morning looking to the grass covered dike watching the sunrise, lots of space in the kitchen to cook and linger in the soft, leather chairs. Large lounge couches to relax after a long, active day. Suitable for couples or business travelers
neighborhood_overview:
Europes largest rowing course surrounded by vast nature, a lot of waterfowl and songbirds.
There's a wide beach and the waterski track at 7 minutes cycling distance at the lake which has many small islands where you can chillout in the sun or watch birds.
Beautiful cycling routes are at your doorstep, as our house is located along one.
We are a 10 minute drive away from boat and kayak rental in a recreation area, 'De Rottermeren'.
host_about:
To experience places of the world is what makes my world bigger. 
When I travel: Bringing home the best local food and habits of a country and share this with my friends and family is what I love to do, and I'm happy to return the favor to you. Discover this region while I'm away and share your experience with your friends!
Using Airbnb on my trips and travels is a great way to get to know the local people..
When I don't travel i live in Rotterdam Netherlands: Often I enjoy a walk around the lake and spot some beautiful birds. Every now and then I can't resist the best raw 'Haring' at the local shop. My garden is a place I feel happy to work in, love active relaxing : ) I work at our company that is specialized in installing luxury bathrooms. Tiling, wiring and administration are my share. And besides that I'm privileged to help people in my practice to get their vitality back by treating them with bioresponse. Very different activities but I like them both very much.

This appartment is centrally located in the hart of Rotterdam. On the 18th floor you have a beautiful view. The appartment is modern and has everything you'll need for a pleasant stay in Rotterdam.
It's very close (5 min walk) from: the Witte de Withstraat, the Markthal, the Erasmusbridge & the Coolsingel etc.
The appartment has a balcony, a very light and sunny living, a kitchen with everything you'll need, bathroom with bathtub and shower and a bedroom with a double bed.

name: Historical sailing ship in city centre
description:
Stay at this unique group accommodation at only 5 min walk from the train station. Markthal, Cubic houses, skyline, musea, watertaxi and barstreets are all on walking distance! Although situated in the centre of 'Manhattan at the Maas', it is really nice and quiet.

The ship has 26 beds. The mentioned price is for max 12 persons (the ship is exclusively yours). Your additional guests will be charged €35 pp. The rooms are hybrid: for 2, 3 or 4 persons. Questions? Pls contact me.

Welcome aboard!

name: Spacious, Cozy, Sunny Apartment in City Center!
description:
Our apartment is conveniently located in Rotterdam Noord, a walking distance from the Central Station, Metro Blijdorp, and a tram stop in our street.

The first floor has a large living/dining room, a kitchen and a toilet. The second has a bedroom, bathroom, and a toilet.

The apartment itself is very spacious with lots of natural light from windows on two sides of the apartment, as well as two balconies. It's fully equipped and with a homey vibe - a perfect find for a couple's week(end) away.
neighborhood_overview: Stately canals, quiet streets and the beloved Vroesenpark: the Blijdorp district is not just a protected cityscape. The green parks are popular with residents, who sunbathe and barbecue in the summer. The pre-war houses are very suitable for families and the neighborhood offers something for everyone, Diergaarde Blijdorp for the little ones (actually for everyone, of course), dog playground Bello for the four-legged friend and the Roel Langerakpark for the athletes among us. Both train and RandstadRail make the district very accessible.
host_about:
Hi there! I’m Sebastiaan and fond of traveling and hosting to travelers myself!

I’m tidy, respectful, and reliable. Oh and also a good amateur cook!

name: Groeps accommodatie "Marie Galante" in Rotterdam
description:
Large traditional sailing ship with 21 beds in 10 rooms (cabins) year-round in the heart of Rotterdam.
The ship all to yourself! Seating, sunbathing and BBQ on deck.
A cosy group accommodation!
All around, the shipping quarter is bustling.
Nightlife/centre, museums, and canal boats are within walking distance.
A fantastic unobstructed view of the river and "the head of south", the "Manhattan on the Maas".
NB: rent linen kit or bring sleeping bag; mattresses and pillows are freshly covered.
neighborhood_overview:
One can enjoy walking around the harbour to the Euromast(park), go sailing with the Spido harbor tour or have lunch at "Hotel New York" or wander the SS "Rotterdam" !
Museums and Euromast(park) within walking distance.
The monumental shipping district is home to many cafes and restaurants.
Bicycle rental within walking distance. (Schiedamsedijk; "Centrum bikes")
It is good to walk in the Witte de Withstraat! (400 meters walking), White Aap, NRC,then loose in the Maassilo, Skihut, BAR, Tofler, Beurs, Beurt, Rotown, Get Back, Villa Thalia, Zimmermann, Stadscafe, etc.
host_about:
Uw gastheer was familievader en voerde als kapitein samen met vrouw en zonen de zeilrederij Vof Europe Sailing.
Ik woon nabij mijn familie op de te verhuren zeilschepen 'Luciana', 'Catherina' en 'Marie Galante' in de Veerhaven Rotterdam centrum.
Mijn favoriete reisbestemmingen zijn in Noorwegen en Portugal.
Ik heb weinig tijd voor boeken, maar lees graag reisverhalen en (maritieme)geschiedenis.
Bij slecht weer pak ik de Bios.

name: Stylish, light & spacious apartment in city centre
description:
Welcome in our comfortable home! Situated in the centre of Rotterdam, within walking distance of many restaurants, bars, musea and public transportion, it is the ideal place to discover the city and surrounding area's. Upon request, we can offer a late checkout (17.00h) for an additional fee of 30euro.

Welcome to our comfortable home! Located in the center of Rotterdam, within walking distance of many restaurants, bars, museums and public transport this is the ideal location to discover the city.
neighborhood_overview:
Just a few minutes from our front door you'll find the vibrant Witte de With street, Nieuwe Binnenweg and Eendrachts-square on which many restaurants and café's are situated, for either breakfast, lunch, drinks or dinner. Throughout the past years we have been able to try many of these places and would love to share our (culinary) tips with you. Supermarkets, shopping area's, musea and other highlights of the city are all walking distance or easily accessible from our home.

A few minutes' walk away is the bustling Witte de With street, Nieuwe Binnenweg and Eendrachtsplein where many restaurants and cafes are located for breakfast, lunch, drinks and dinner. Over the years, we have been able to try out many nice (culinary) occasions in Rotterdam and surroundings, so we can provide you with insider tips. Furthermore, supermarkets, shopping, museums and other attractions are all easy to reach.

neighborhood_overview:
What does Rotterdam Noord have that other Rotterdam neighborhoods do not have?

The Vroesenpark: the place to picnic, barbecue, and soccer in summer.

Station Hofplein: under former train station Hofplein you will find unique shops with vintage clothes and furniture, coffee bars, restaurants and jazz club Bird.

The Zwaanshals and the Zaagmolenkade: two streets full of design shops and delicacies.

Diergaarde Blijdorp: one of the oldest and most beautiful zoos in the Netherlands.

host_about:
Your Host: My name is Sam. I work part-time as a psychologist. For the last 20 years I have been living in the apartment just below, on the ground floor. Besides in Dutch, I will be able to assist you in English, French and German. When you arrive I would be happy to offer more tips and tricks regarding the Delfshaven area and Rotterdam in general to ensure you have a pleasant stay!

De gastheer:
Mijn voornaam is Sam. In het dagelijks leven werk ik part-time als psycholoog. Ik woon al 20 jaar in het appartement eronder, op de begane grond. Naast Nederlands spreek ik, als je gastheer, ook Engels, Frans en Duits. Bij aankomst ben ik graag bereid je meer informatie te geven over de buurt, en over de stad Rotterdam, om je verblijf hier zo aangenaam mogelijk te maken!

L’hôte
Mon prénom est Sam. Je travaille à temps partiel comme psychologue. Depuis 20 ans j’habite l’appartement au rez-de-chaussée. Comme votre hôte je parle outre le néerlandais la langue anglaise, française et allemande. A votre arrivée j‘aimerais  vous donner de bons avis pour rendre votre séjour au plus agréable. 

Der Gastgeber:
Mein Name ist Sam. Im täglichen Leben  arbeite ich Teilzeit als Psychologe. Schon 20 Jahre wohne  ich direkt unter der Wohnung im Erdgeschoss. Neben Holländisch, spreche ich als Gastgeber Englisch, Französisch und Deutsch. Bei Ankunft gebe ich Ihnen gerne mehr Tipps und Tricks in Bezug auf die Nachbarschaft und Rotterdam, um Ihren Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich zu machen!

name: Cozy Apartment near Central Station.
description: This apartment near Central Station offers a unique and bright open-plan layout ideal for four guests. The spacious living room seamlessly connects to a fully equipped kitchen including a nespresso machine to start your day with a good coffee. Everything in the apartment is to ensure you of convenience and comfort during your stay. Experience a blend of comfort and luxury throughout your stay, with thoughtful amenities and a well-curated city guide to help you explore Rotterdam to the fullest.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in the area called Provenierswijk and is a haven of tranquillity, in spite of being within close proximity of the city centre. The public park 'Vroesenpark' is located near the complex and is a very vibrant place in the summer with locals getting together.

The area hides different excuisite restaurants like Dunya Locanta, Le Nord and for the pizza lovers there's La Pizza, the best pizza place in Rotterdam. For a coffee there are different great places in and around Central Station. Two supermarkets are on 4 minutes walking distance from the apartment.

Just on the other side of the Central Station is where the vibrant day- and nightlife starts. Different areas for a great night out like Central District, Stadhuisplein, Witte de Withstraat and Oude Binnenweg are within walking distance or easily reachable by public transport.
host_about:
Hi there!

Thanks for looking into my profile! :)
I am a 31 year old Dutch guy, living in the heart of Rotterdam. As I'm writing this (February 2017), I have used Airbnb only for my own travels. In March that will change. I will visit Peru for a month and I'd be happy to let my apartment be of use for you! I am quite thrilled about this trip, as I've never been to South America before and heard great stories about it.

When I am not travelling, I work as a coach for people who depend on a social benefit for their income and have a very long distance to the labour market. I try to help them to work on their problems by coaching them and by connecting them to the right professionals, projects and organizations. Besides work, I like to hang out with friends, travel, run, cycle, go to the gym and play football.

name: Wikkelboat Nr1 @ city centre with Spa
description:
This romantic and unique tiny house alike boat is located in the city centre, in the beautiful & upcoming Maritime District amid highraise buildings and an idyllic harbor.
It's purely Dutch design and you definitely will fall in love! Wikkelboat's smart interior offers you great comfort with airco & heating & is perfectly isolated. It has a luxurious jacuzzi on front terrace which is included. Public transport is nextdoor and we offer cycling, breakfast & boating as optional services.

name: Family apartment with rooftop deck & fireplace
description:
Charming two-story apartment (120 square metres) in a lovely neighborhood. It's nice and quiet, next to a lake, a park and a playground. And downtown is still pretty close.

The apartment has a large rooftop deck (just over 40 square metres) overlooking the surroundings, including the playground.

Also, it has an Apple TV and 3 HomePod Minis in the living room and 1 in the master bedroom. You can use voice control to turn the lights on and off, or to play music.
neighborhood_overview: Nice, quiet and green, with a large and enclosed playground just around the corner. And around the other corner there's a lake next to a large park with a classic old Dutch windmill. You'll also find shops and pubs less than 500 metres away. And there's a really nice and cosy restaurant just across the street.
host_about: I live in Rotterdam and love travelling, photography and camping.

name: Renovated app/ in city center with rooftop terrace
description:
This monumental property is a short walk away from downtown Rotterdam.
In front of the house there is a tram stop and Rotterdam Central Station is 5 mins away. The house is recently fully renovated and all is new.
The spaces are bright and spacious, there are 3 balconies and a great roof terrace (25m2) where to enjoy your meal or chill with a book and some sunlight. There are 2 bedrooms and a living room (40m2) at your disposal. 1 vd bedrooms is 2.5m x 2.5m.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is lively but not noisy. I live at a 'safe distance' from the city center but close enough to walk and be in the middle of 'the action'.
There are several restaurants close to my home, bars and clubs are mainly situated in the city center.
Close by there is a small shopping center with 2 supermarkets, a snack bar, utilities shop, a drugstore, florist, bakery etc. You will have all you need within hand reach.
if you are feeling like seeking up nature there is the Vroesepark withing 15 minute walk (very popular during warm days and perfects for barbeques) and the Kralingse Bos within a 10 minute drive.

neighborhood_overview:
Delfshaven is close to the centre of Rotterdam and has different faces.
My street is a small and quiet and children friendly street, with little gardens in front of houses. We are just around the corner of Heemraadsingel, which is one of the most beautiful streets in town. Shopping, supermarkets and restaurants are on walking distance. You can have a coffee and find Restaurants around the corner at the Middelandstraat/ Middelandplein, such as “de burgermeester”, and “ Marseille”.
You can reach the zoo within 5 minutes walking and the upcomming longest shopping street of Holland (Nieuwe Binnenweg) is 10 minutes by walking. There you find pups at the Heemraadsplein, such as STijn and Bakkeliet, vintage and nice flower shops.

name: The Artist studio, 65m2, sunny garden & 2 bikes
description:
Light studio appartement with sunny garden. The neighbourhood is known for it's many artists and has a very old (1800's) centre. The Maastunnel will take you 10 minutes on bicycle to historic Delfshaven and 15 minutes to the city centre of Rotterdam. Take the Ferry to Katendrecht (6 minutes) and you will find yourself in the urban industrial part of the city with many restaurants & bars.
The ‘Zuiderpark’ is at walking distance and grocery shops are around the corner.
Beach at 40min drive by car
neighborhood_overview:
Close to Ahoy, the Classic cruise ship ‘SS Rotterdam’, University Hospital Erasmus, Katendrecht (visit Fenix Food hall and try the craft beers of our city brewery ‘Kaapse Brouwers’), historic Delfshaven, Euromast.

The ‘Kralingse plas en bos’ (large lake and forest in the city) is 35minutes on bike and great to rent a boat or SUP.

If you like nature, visit the Biesbosch. A ferry takes you along the Maas river to Dordrecht. A quicker option is by bike and train. You can hire a boat or kayak to experience this beautiful area.
I can provide you all the info you need when you are here.

Being right next to central station, the neighborhood has quick access to almost any area of the city and it is close to the highways A20 and A13. It’s also one of the places to live in Rotterdam that benefits from a lovely parks: the Vroesenpark and Roel Langerakpark. The district is up and coming, with plenty of lovely shops and restaurants to visit.
host_about: My name is Evie Janssen, 29 years old and I live with my boyfriend in a charming house in Rotterdam. I have a fulltime job as an IT consultant within the FMCG business. I love to cycle, go out and travel around the world.

name: Central 350m2/ 6p river side design apartment
description:
This design apartment on the Maas quay is unique because of its location and design. Everything shows that it was renovated under the supervision of an interior architect. The 4 meter high ceilings and the enormous surface of 350m2 make this house feel very spacious.

Located in the center and historic district Delfshaven, there are many attractions within walking distance. Because the metro and tram stops are close to the house, the rest of Rotterdam is also quickly and easily accessible.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located on the quay of the Maas river in the historical Delfshaven district. Only 20 minutes from Central Station. There are many good and cozy restaurants in this neighborhood. Within walking distance is the old marina. In the old canal houses you can now find antique and curio shops, small distilleries, restaurants and some craft beer breweries.

Because this house is close to several tram stops and a metro stop, the rest of the city is well connected by public transport. You can be at the Museumpark in 10 minutes, at the Maritime museum in 15 minutes and at the boarding point for the boat trips in about 20 minutes.

The "Nieuwe Binnenweg", known for its many nice boutique shops, is only 10 minutes by metro and the Witte de With, the entertainment street with lively bars and many restaurants, is only 12 minutes away.

name: CHEZ ALET, Rotterdam centrum, Delfshaven
description:
At 6 minutes walk is nice and quiet, historic Delfshaven.
Nice to eat and drink.
Walking routes to the center I can recommend and easily accessible by public transport.
My apartment is, renovated, vintage furnished overlooking the Schie Canal.
Layout: living room, dining room, 2 bedrooms, 1 bedroom with very good double (M-line mattress) bed, 1 bedroom with bunk bed, fully equipped kitchen, washing machine, bathroom/toilet television and a balcony.
neighborhood_overview:
In the area are several cozy shops, restaurants, cafes and attractions.
At 500 meters is historically Delfshaven, an authentic piece of Rotterdam, including the Pilgrim's Church, where the "Pilgrims fathers" left in 1620 to the "new world". There is still a concept in the US.
The famous sea hero Piet Hein has left his mark in this area.
In Delfshaven there are inhabited flat floors and it is known for its picturesque facades. Furthermore, city brewery de Pelgrim is located here.
The Euromast and "The park" are 1.5 km from the apartment. This is a nice walk along the Schie and takes you to the Nieuwe Maas. Where the Port of Rotterdam becomes visible.
There are many tourist attractions in this area. Among other things, the Ferry Port, the World Museum, the Kunsthal, the Depot of Boijmans etc.
You can take the water bus to Dordrecht and Kinderdijk, take a cruise through the ports of Rotterdam with the Spido and admire "Manhattan on the Meuse".
host_about:
Hallo,
Als ik thuis ben en mijn koffie drink kijk ik graag naar de vrachtschepen die voorbij varen. Dit geeft mij het gevoel in een havenstad te wonen.
Ik maak graag wandelingen door de stad en drink mijn biertje in toeristisch Delfshaven wat 5 min lopen van mijn huis ligt. 
Hier ligt veel geschiedenis van de stad. Vanuit deze plek is Rotterdam min of meer uitgebouwd. Het is daar rustig en mooi. Het lijkt een beetje op Amsterdam met zijn grachten en pakhuiswoningen.

Ik ben een creatief persoon en ben graag fysiek bezig.
In mijn B&B zul je de sfeer van creativiteit kunnen proeven.
De inrichting van heel mijn huis heb ik in de stijl van het huis wat in 1924 gebouwd is. Bovendien is het een bewuste keuze om te recycelen.

Naast mijn benb vind ik het heerlijk om in mijn tuin te tuinieren.  Ik schilder graag en maak tassen. 
Ik help anderen hun huis te reorganiseren en opknappen.
Dus u zou mij in kluskleding aan kunnen treffen ;-)

Sinds kort bezit ik een camperbusje. Ik ben daar erg blij mee en ga graag naar natuulijke campings waar het vaak mooi, rustig en vriendelijk is. Bovendien is daar qua natuur veel te beleven.

This over 1 century old, restored quay house is located on the edge of the Noordereiland.
The center is within walking distance, there is a good bus connection and bicycles are for rent in the street. The stylishly furnished room is located on the top floor. Adjacent is a spacious roof terrace, with beautiful views over the roof of Rotterdam.
Optionally, the front room can be rented, with two extra beds.

name: Characteristic house in lush Kralingen
description:
This unique, modern and luxurious apartment has everything you need and more… much more! Everything in this high-end apartment is designed to fit your every need while enjoying Rotterdam. A lot of comfort can be enjoyed in the house during your stay because of the comfortable bed and living spaces as well as the balcony. The amount of windows provide beautiful light throughout the whole house.

You will find shops, eatery's and cozy restaurants all within walking distance.
neighborhood_overview:
Kralingen is traditionally known as the chiquer side of Rotterdam. Romantic villa neighbourhoods and elegant lanes dominate the cityscape here. Erasmus University Rotterdam is also located here, however, so the area is home to lots of students – and they keep Kralingen lively! Oostzeedijk boasts lots of popular pubs and restaurants where you can pick up a meal for a reasonable price. One of the oldest attractions in Kralingen is Arboretum Trompenburg. In addition to the lovely old trees here, these botanic gardens offer beautiful plants and flowers and a charming teahouse.

The biggest park in Rotterdam is nearby: the Kralingse Bos, a green oasis for everyone hoping to escape the city for a breath of fresh air and some peace and quiet. Visitors rollerblade, jog and cycle around the lake to their heart’s content. Sailboats skim across the lake, while tasty snacks are served at sidewalk cafés along the waterfront.
host_about:
Hi! My name is Renee, an energetic and positive woman, and I want to welcome you in my urban meets industry house in one of the most vibrant cities of the world. Rotterdam is my hometown and I love to tell you about my favorites local spots and the culture of Rotterdam.
I was born and raised in Rotterdam and I working in the sales department of our shipyard in Rotterdam, so I can tell you all about it!

name: Group accommodation Rooms on Water
description:
Rooms on Water is an atmospheric, beautiful accommodation in the hold of a former inland vessel (approx. 12 p.). You have a spacious living room, 6 bedrooms with 2 beds and bathroom en suite, kitchen and a roof(deck)terrace!
A top location and a very suitable accommodation for family and friends groups and also companies (meetings in combination with overnight stay).
Rooms on Water is located in the centre of Rotterdam in a unique location. Lots of hotspots and public transport are very close by.
neighborhood_overview:
Roms on Water is right in the centre, opposite the Maritime Museum, yet relatively quiet.
There are several supermarkets in the neighborhood.
A lot of hotspots are very close, such as the Martkhal, the Old Port, the Maritim museums and other museums, the Witte de Withstraat, the shopping streets, etc.
All public transport is very close (train, metro, tram and water taxi)
host_about:
Ik heb in 2017 het ruim van dit voormalig vrachtschip verbouwd tot luxe accommodatie. Ik verheug me erop u aan boord en in Rotterdam te verwelkomen. 

Voordat ik dit bedrijf begon heb ik jarenlang met mijn man op een tweemastklipper gezeild met gasten, runden we op dit schip (wat nu Rooms on Water is) een winkel en werkplaats waarin we traditionele schepen restaureerden en was ik schipper op een watertaxi.

name: Hip&modern studio on a vibrant street in Rotterdam
description:
Our studio is located in the famous and most vibrant street in the heart of Rotterdam, de Witte de Withstraat. Near the studio are various bars and restaurants, public transport, shopping area, supermarket,museum and much more. You’ll love my place because of the elegant and trendy interior, the city view, the location and the ambiance. My place is excellent for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers and even parents with a kid.

The studio will make you feel home away from home <3
neighborhood_overview:
Witte de Withstraat is the place to be when visiting Rotterdam. It has many restaurants that are open till late and amazing bars with seating outside. It is a two minute walk to the nearest tube station and three minute walk to the shopping district.

Furthermore it is nearby the Coolsingel which houses the Rotterdam City hall, and it's nearby the shopping boulevard of the city. If you don't like the big shops you can also visite the small boutiques on the Van Oldenbarneveldstraat, Karel Doormanstraat or de Meent.
If you have a panache for art, local products or like to buy things from local artists, entrepreneurs, hobbyist/amateurs, the Witte de Withstraat is dotted with (vintage and pop-up) shops/boutiques & galleries that sell these.

It's a 10 minute walk from:
- the newly constructed Markthal, which you really should visite to buy some local products or eat something at the venues.
- the Cubic houses
- the Eramusburg where you can explor

description:
Feel at home in this very nice corner house with garden, located on the green nature reserve of the Zevenhuizerplas. You can walk, swim, surf, sail and water ski here, play tennis or lie on the beach. Rotterdam city center is easily accessible by metro around the corner.

To make your extra home feel more at home, Femmetje will keep your cat company. She is very sweet and used to guests. All she needs is TLC (tender love and care) and some food and drink.

neighborhood_overview:
Blijdorp is a cozy age district in the further bustling neighbourhood in Noord

In North, there you have to be. This sprawling patchwork of a district is bursting with neighborhoods and neighborhoods, each with its own delightful character. The neighborhood has skyrocketed in recent years, as happens in so many cities, but without losing its old-fashioned glow. Old and new Northerners, families and students, young people and the elderly and people from countless cultures live together peacefully and that brings with it an atmosphere like nowhere else in the city. Noord is mondain and raw at a time. A potpourri of styles and tastes.

name: Iconic apartment with river view, near city centre
description: The spacious apartment (ca. 100 m2) has a unique ambience, located in a historic building right at the promenade in the heart of Rotterdam: on the famous Noordereiland, between both the iconic Erasmus bridge and the Willemsbrug. Hot spots in the centre such as the Markthal, Meent, Koopgoot and the Oude Haven are a walking distance away or accessible by bus (2 stops to 'Rotterdam Blaak'). South from the island, are the Kop van Zuid, Hotel New York, the Luxor theater, the Fenix ​​food Factory.
neighborhood_overview: Noordereiland is a cozy neighbourhood with beautiful views. Surrounded by water, you can enjoy a quiet environment, yet just a stone’s throw away from the city centre. The island itself offers an Italian restaurant, the café Koozie, and the pop up restaurant A la Plancha which floats on the water in the summer. A supermarket (SPAR) incl. a post office is around the corner; another one (Aldi) is a 10 min walk away.

name: beach house "Joyce" | near the beach
description:
"Beach house" just 5 minutes from the wide sandy beach of Hoek van Holland, Rotterdam.

We rent from Saturday to Saturday (only whole weeks!)

No pets!

For an unforgettable summer holiday, get a breath of fresh air in the fall or relax in the spring. Hoek van Holland is Rotterdam by the sea and everything is possible there!

It is a wooded area, ideal for cycling to Kijkduin, The Hague, the Maasvlakte... One of the largest ports in the world.
neighborhood_overview: The beachhouse is located on a large holiday park with a soccer field, tennis court, basketball field and a playground. During the summer holiday there are a lot of activities for young and old.
host_about:
Wij stellen ons graag even aan u voor.

Wij een ondernemers familie uit de omgeving van Rotterdam en in 2003 is Kick ons team komen versterken.

Als er een kind in je gezin komt wordt alles anders, vooral het op vakantie gaan. Je moet ineens rekening met alles houden, niet te warm, niet te koud, kinderbadje, tussen de middag slapen, kinderbedje, geen stijl in zee lopend strand, geen rotsen, geen hoge golven... en als de kinderen ouder worden; vermaken zij zich wel? Is er genoeg te doen? Zijn er wel vriendjes? Is er wel eten wat ze lusten?

Wij hebben de eerste jaren daar wel mee geworsteld, want je wilt het zelf ook naar je zin hebben op vakantie... je moet immers je het hele jaar al wegcijferen.

Onze vakantie ervaringen:

We zijn naar een resort in Turkije geweest...
Wij vonden het veel te massaal, heel de dag door buffetten en te ver buiten het stadje. Alle resorts staan in de middle of nowhere zodat je alles binnen het complex moet doen. En niet te vergeten het onvermijdelijke animatie-team die iedere avond een toneelstukje opvoert.

We zijn naar het "kindvriendelijke" Menorca geweest...
Het begon met een overstap op Ibiza (vliegtuig vol Ibiza-gangers die zich doodergeren aan de kinderen), geen strand (moerassig), onverwarmd zwembad (steenkoud) en saai... Het is niet kindvriendelijk..., er zijn alleen heel veel kinderen!

We zijn naar Tenerife (en alle andere Canarische eilanden) geweest...
Na onze ervaringen in Turkije en Menorca wilden we graag een hotel aan een boulevard zodat we 's avonds nog wat konden lopen en wat drinken...het hotel was schitterend, maar zodra je de boulevard op kwam... wat een armoe! Straten kapot, veel leegstand in de winkelruimtes, overal schreeuwende aanbiedingen voor een pint bier voor € 1,-

We zijn naar Club Med geweest (Tunesie en Turkije)...
Slechte accomodaties, wel goed publiek maar het concept dat het personeel  iedere keer bij je aan tafel komt zitten sprak ons niet zo aan.

Toen dachten we, als we nu eens een eigen huis huren met een zwembad in Spanje..., maar waar? Na wat ge (Hidden by Airbnb) kwamen we uit bij Moraira! Dit sprak ons meteen aan... authentiek, geen hoogbouw, niet te toeristisch, vissersplaatsje, jachthaven, veel winkeltjes, restaurantjes en terrassen, zandstrand, in een baai, strand loopt niet stijl in zee, altijd zon (320 dagen van het jaar), nagenoeg geen regen, goede temperatuur, genoeg vermaak in de buurt voor jong en oud, tennisbanen (ons zoontje tennist veel en graag), kortom dit moest het zijn!

Al deze informatie vonden we op de site van Xenofilia, twee Nederlandse broers die vakantiehuizen verhuren en er zelf ook wonen. Een groot huis, Xenofilia I... 4 kamers, 4 badkamers, verwarmd zwembad en een eigen tennisbaan... Dit is het!

Alle opa's en oma's mee en met z'n zevenen naar Spanje. We hebben een geweldige vakantie gehad, en van het plaatsje Moraira was niets gelogen, helmaal naar ons zin! Alles is er luxe afgewerkt, de straten, het meubilair, schitterende rotondes met kunstwerken. Wij hebben echt wel veel gezien, maar dit was fantastisch! Je zou dan aan st. Tropez prijzen gaan denken...niets is minder waar, een wijntje op het strand kost € 2,- en het eten in de restaurantjes en op de terrassen is zeker niet duurder dan in Nederland.

Inmiddels zijn we zo'n 15 keer terug geweest, nog een paar keer in Xenofilia I zonder opa's en oma's maar met een vriendje voor Kick.

Het enige nadeel van een huis is dat je alles met de auto moet doen... boodschappen, naar het strand en de kinderen zitten een beetje opgesloten in en om het huis. Dus, hebben we de laatste paar keren een appartement in het centrum gehuurd. Zo kon onze zoon, inmiddels 11, gewoon zelf naar het strand en weer terug naar het appartement. Ook hoefden we nu geen vriendje meer mee te nemen, er zijn genoeg kinderen op het strand, en daar is altijd zat te doen... Voetballen, volleyballen, vissen, krabbetjes zoeken, snorkelen, tegen de branding in springen en natuurlijk zwemmen. Wij vinden het lekker om als we van het strand komen op het balkon lekker een wijntje te drinken en wat tappaatjes te eten. Daar vind Kick natuurlijk geen bal aan en hij vindt tappas niet lekker. Hij gaat dan een pizza voor zichzelf halen bij de pizzaria 100 meter verder en gaat lekker even op zijn iPad een spelletje spelen. Iedereen blij! 

Wij zijn ook een keer in januari gegaan, en in de voorjaarsvakantie... hoe zou het dan zijn? Nou, ook gewoon 20 graden en zonnig en totaal niet uitgestorven!

Moeten we dan niet kijken of we hier wat kunnen kopen? Maar we hebben zelf geen tijd om vaak te gaan... kunnen we het dan niet verhuren als we zelf niet gaan?

De rest is geschiedenis... dus kom genieten van dit pareltje aan de Costa Blanca en geniet van ons luxe appartement. 

Welkom!

Robert, Joyce en Kick
