name: Central semiprivate floor great for solo travelers
description:
Simple room on semiprivate floor in centrally located apartment in up and coming Rotterdam-West.

The room, shared bathroom and toilet are situated on the ground floor of the apartment. The owner's living room, kitchen and private bedroom are situated on the first and second floor. As such you will have a lot of privacy.

There are loads of funky shops, restaurants and bars in the neighborhood. The nearest tram stop is just a 4 min walk. The nearest metro stop is a 7 min walk.
neighborhood_overview: Rotterdam-West is known for its cultural diversity. There are loads of funky shops, restaurants and bars around. Historical Delfshaven is within walking distance as well as architectural highlights like Euromast and the MVRDV designed Depot building of Boijmans Museum.
host_about: Hi, my name is Koko. I like exploring cities, hiking and visiting museums. I work as a researcher at a university. A quirky hobby of mine is learning Japanese. 日本語で話しましょうか？

name: Welcome to our lovely house in Rotterdam!
description:
A character-filled treasure in the West of Rotterdam. Three-level home with a front yard and a garden in the back, including a great glasshouse. Our basement is still under construction.
The house is big with lots of space, very suitable for 2 families. It is cosy at the same time, you will feel at home here! The property is in a lovely residential area of Rotterdam, but very close to shops, public transport and the city centre at the same time.
Hope 2 see you @ our place!
neighborhood_overview: Our house is 15 minute walk from the city. Although you can also find everything in West. For a good coffee and lunch you can go to the Urban Espresso or Roast. For organic grocery’s you have to be at Ecoplaza or Gimsel (bit more far). If you want to eat a pizza you can go to De Buffel or get your meal at Fou. For a drink in West you can go to Steyn, Bakeliet and Rijke en de wit. Enjoy!

name: Spacious townhouse in Rotterdam
description:
Spacious townhouse in Rotterdam (240m2), with large garden. The house has 4 bedrooms and 1 bathroom and is therefore very suitable for a large family up to 6 people.

Close to the center, 5 minutes cycling or 10 minutes by tram, train or bus. In the attractive district you will find some nice shops and restaurants. The Bergse Plassen (small lakes) are nearby (boat rental, SUP or swimming). Also go for a walk or bike ride along the river Rotte or in the Bergse Bos.

** Only Families **
neighborhood_overview:
The house is close to the center, 5 minutes cycling or 10 minutes in the tram. In the attractive district you will find some nice shops and restaurants. The Bergse Plassen (small lakes) are nearby (boat rental, SUP or swimming). Also go for a walk or bike ride along the river Rotte or in the Bergse Bos.

If you come with young children, you will find a large playground, a football pitch, a smaller playground, a nice children's book shop / coffee shop and a unique amusement park in the neighborhood: Plaswijck Park. We also have a lot of toys (girls).
host_about: Living in Rotterdam, The Netherlands, with our family of 4. Loves to travel the world in a sustainable way. Loves cycling and walking.

Cosy apartment at an excellent location! Very close to the city centre of Rotterdam and to the Central Station: both between 10/15 minutes walk! Tram stop around the corner. Supermarket, restaurants and shops are at 2 min. walking distance. Close to the highways A13/A16/A20.Parking garage around the corner (2 min. walk). 14 euro all day parking.

name: Stylish apartment for the great Rotterdam getaway
description: In the heart of Rotterdam lies this amazing apartment with views of Historic Delfshaven. With the usual hustle and bustle of the city, the apartment is surrounded by countless shops and restaurants. Within 10 minutes of biking or public transportation you can be in the shopping areas or the nightlife areas of Rotterdam. Discovering this beautiful city is an amazing experience and this apartment offers the warm comfort of relaxing and possibly even cooking a nice meal after a long day.
neighborhood_overview: Delfshaven is a great neighborhood to stay in in Rotterdam. It is the oldest remaining part of the city. From the 1700’s only 1 minute walk away. It is a 10 min walk to the city centre but also quiet enough to enjoy a nice walk along the river. There are multiple grocery stores within 600m walking from the house, besides that there are a lot of little shops, restaurants, kebab shops (for the late night snack) and other facilities.

description:
A nice bright place with a kingsize bed, bubble bath, home office, balcony, and home gym.
• Nearby the river, several parks, and the Kralingse Plas (a lake with a beach).

name: Boat apartment Rothor on top location (1-3 pers)
description: Welcome aboard the Rothor, located in one of the old harbours in the centre of Rotterdam. Private access, lovely view and deck terrace!
neighborhood_overview: Rothor is moored in the Haringvliet, one of the historic harbours of Rotterdam, located in the centre.  Next to the Rothor is the bridge to the Oude Haven (Old Harbour). In the Old Harbour you can sit and have a drink by the water. There are bars and restaurants. In the harbours, Leuvehaven, Haringvliet, Oude Haven and Wijnhaven are filled with classic Dutch boats. The area is a mix of very old warehouses, bridges, ships, bars and modern skyscraper apartment buildings. The very famous and striking Cubic Houses are just around the corner. A little bit further is the Markthal a very remarkable building, not to be missed when you visit Rotterdam!
host_about: I live on a boat and love living on the water. My boat is located right in the centre of Rotterdam. I can give my guests a lot of information about Rotterdam and its attractions. I love travelling, checking out new places.

name: Boat apartment Hoop
description:
In a nice and quiet !!! marine harbor on the 'kop van zuid' is situated this very nice and ancient / historical barge. This private ship takes up to 8 quests.

The city centre of Rotterdam is on only 10 minutes walking distance of the ship. The harbor is very spacious and has a great atmosphere. Free parking facilities are on 5 minutes walking distance.

De 'kop van Zuid' is the up-coming neighbouhood of Rotterdam. With it's theatres and good restaurants it is nowaday's the place to be!

Good shopping facilities and a FREE parking spot for cars are very nearby.

The ship is only rented for groups. So no sharing of anything: your own, unique floating house!

We come by to give a personel check in and show you around the ship and give info about the neighborhood and must do's in Roterdam

The harbor is situated in the very multicural and up coming neighborhood 'kop van zuid'

free carparking in 5 minut
neighborhood_overview: The harbor is situated in the very multicural and up coming neighborhood 'kop van zuid'
host_about: Hi, me and my wife are really boat lovers! This is the reason why we turned this beautiful old cargo vessel into a lovely nice city apartment / loft. This will give you the unique opportunity to live for a few day;s in an ancient vessel. As real Rotterdam people we can tell you about all the nice things the city of Rotterdam has to explore, such as good bars and food and culture. We are delighted to welcome you on board!

name: Family house near Historical Delfshaven
description:
Welcome in our house (built in 2010) which is located near Rotterdam's most popular Nieuwe Binnenweg street, with its many trendy lunch spots, restaurants, bars and galleries. 15 minutes walking distance to the Museumpark. The apartment is located near to historical Delfshaven. Nice to wander around and have a coffee or beer (made at the Pelgrim brewery). The Pilgrim fathers left for the States from the Old church.
Finally, my place offers enough peace and quiet to have a good night's rest.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is lively and has a great mixture of authentic and hot spots. The Binnenweg, has a variety of shops and supermarkets amongst others an organic/biological supermarket. Here you'll find Vlaams Broodhuys which serves great breakfast, lunch and coffee. Apart form the famous roti’s, Indonesian, Dominican, Thai, African food, there are many options in vegetarian and vegan food as well. Don't miss out on the vegan cupcakes at Heavenly cupcakes!. The house is located 15 minutes walking distance from many museums and other sightseeing spots for example the “Witte de Withstraat” with café’s, restaurants, museums and art galleries.

name: Cozy Oasis in Rdam with Balcony
description: Situated right in Rdam's center, behind central station. Own entrance, equipped with classy, homy interior, which makes living here so joyful. The bedroom & balcony actually open up to the south, which means sunlight floods the whole apartment! A glass of wine on the balcony with this view is a treat! The long corridor connects the space, which makes moving around very dynamic. Rain-shower, leather couch, kingsize bed, big TV, large dining table... as the name says, we like it cozy.
neighborhood_overview:
You live in blijdoorp (translated: happy village); a lush, authentic & dynamic neighborhood behind the city center.
Here you find several restaurants, pubs, supermarkets & everything you might occasionally need. With only 10 minutes walking distance from the city centre & Rotterdam's central station, so you have all the options. You can easily jump on a train to explore other beautiful dutch cities Utrecht, Amsterdam or Den Hague, or even go to the beach at Hook van Holland...
The house opens to a beautiful view. Where there used to be a monestry garden, there is now a small neighbourhood tennis court, surrounded by big trees. If it wasn't for the tiny bit of skyline, you would almost forget that you are in the city with the biggest haven in Europe!
host_about: Hi, My name is Luca and I like traveling, meeting new people and discovering new places and experiences. Don't hesitate to ask me anything. I am happy to help.

name: Wikkelboat Nr. 2 @ city centre w spa & bikes
description: This romantic and unique tiny houseboat  is located in the city centre, in the beautiful & upcoming Maritime District amid high-rise buildings in an idyllic harbor. It's purely Dutch design and you definitely fall in love! Wikkelboat's smart interior offers you great comfort with good airco & heating. Public transport is just a step away and you can use a luxurious Spa for free, same for  the 2 electric bikes. Optional services are (inter)continental breakfast, lunch & boating.
neighborhood_overview: The Maritime District is the most beautiful area of Rotterdam; it has it all: musea (Maritiem Museum, Mariniersmuseum & Comics Museum), loads of ho(s)tels, many highraise buildings and great restaurants. The area is very safe, peaceful and quiet at streetlevel.

name: Ruime, dubbele bovenwoning in Rotterdam Kralingen!
description: Special, authentic upstairs apartment near the center of Rotterdam, in the beloved neighborhood of Kralingen. Market hall at 7 minutes by bike (15 min. walk). The neighborhood gives you a village feel while staying in the middle of the city. Kralingen is also well known for its many pubs and restaurants. In our home, everyone feels very comfortable. Public transport: tram in front of the door and metro just around the corner. Liesbeth & Isabelle warmly invite you and make your stay memorable!
neighborhood_overview:
Kralingen is a beloved neighborhood in Rotterdam close to the center. Nice breakfast shops and various supermarkets at 5 min walk. Nearby public transportation or rent bikes and discover Rotterdam by bike........
Museums nearby and lots of beautiful nature. The Kralingse Bos is a 10-minute walk away.
host_about:
Wij zijn Liesbeth & Isabelle. 
Liesbeth werkt bij een gerenommeerd architectenbureau en Isabelle gaat in de buurt naar de allerleukste school!  Wij wonen met veel plezier in Rotterdam en kennen alle leuke plekken in de stad. We zijn gek op onze Peugeot oldtimer, houden van lekker, eerlijk en gezond eten (maken en nuttigen) en genieten van mooie kunst en cultuur. We verwelkomen je graag in ons zelf gerenoveerde huis, waar wij ook zelf wonen.

name: Fancy apartment with 2 rooftop terraces
description:
An amazing, light and sunny apartment on the sixth floor of the popular Timmerhuis building, with nice views over the city skyline.

The apartment has two terraces, both of 45m2, one on the east side and the other on the south/west side, both with a lot of plants.

The size of the apartment itself is 116m2.

In November 2023, the apartment was completely renovated: the wooden floor was replaced with tiles, and all the walls and ceilings were painted.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the heart of the city, just behind the City hall.

Shopping areas, restaurants and bars are just around the corner. All major sight seeings are within walking distance.

You won't find an apartment more centrally located than this one. Enjoy the city life!
host_about:
Hi, 

I am Saskia, single, lawyer. I have been living and working in Rotterdam for about 40 years. 
In July 2015 I bought the apartment in the Timmerhuis (casco), and I moved in at the end of 2015. The apartment has everything I could want, but the terraces are my pride and joy, and also the main reason for buying the apartment. I have what you call in Dutch "green fingers."

I look forward to hearing your experiences! 

Greetings, 
Saskia

name: Little oase in the city
description: Comfortabel and atmospheric house with garden and cat in a quiet street 5-10 min from the city centre. The livingroom with open kitchen and leads straight to the garden. There is a room with double bed. The hallway leads to the bathroom. There’s an extra room that can be used for luggage. Perfect house for a citytrip for two with all the comfort and facilities of a house. Supermarkets and restaurants on walking distance. Biep the cat needs to be fed every day, therefore there’s an ajusted price.
neighborhood_overview: Although the house is so close to the citycenter, this is a quit and friendly street. It’s close to Blijdorp with it’s nice park and restaurant. Everything is close and public transport nearby.
host_about: I have been living in Rotterdam for 25 years. I live with my daughter Isa (2009) in our cute little house, we’re in the north of the city (the area called: ‘Liskwartier’). I absolutely love this city and know it very well. I’m the no-nonense type of person. I love traveling, meeting people, trying new things, eating, friends, good Coffee, being outside, in and on the water, surfing, art, design and culture. I’m running a mobile catering (kitchen build in a oldtimer truck) were I’m also the chef. I mostly work on filmsets all cross the country, cooking from my mobile kitchen for the crew. I work hard, but I work to live, not live to work.

name: Need a break? Escape to a nice apartment for two
description:
Nice one-bed room apartment (80m2) with amazing view on the city. Living room is equipped with TV and sofa. Kitchen has all the equipment at your service, such as microwave, oven, dishwasher. There is a dry/washing machine available.

Main attractions are within walking distance such as Markthal (<5 min) and Maritiem Museum (5 min). Close to delicious restaurants.

One additional one person bed at extra cost (in addition to the 2 person bed) can be booked in advance to provide for more comfort.
neighborhood_overview:
Stay in the heart of Rotterdam. Wijnhaven is established in 1613 as part of the Water City plan. In the neighbourhood you can find the White House (one of the few buildings in this area that survived the WWII).
- Please check the Maritiem Museum for some history on the harbour and Dutch sealife.
- Go to the Markthal to discover local delicacies.
- Or go shopping in the city such as at the Koopgoot.
- Also a good start for trips further away, such as The Hague or Amsterdam (direct connection from nearby station Rotterdam Blaak)

Recommended restaurants:
- Sansan for spicy Asian food
- Hinoko for noodle soup
- Obba’s Foodbar for Turkish fingerfood

name: Iconic Cube House in heart of Rotterdam! Room 3
description: Welcome to the one of the most unique places in Rotterdam! Designed by Dutch architect Piet Blom, this residential complex are literally cubes, tilted over by 45 degrees. This results in buildings that look, feel and behave unlike anything you’ll find elsewhere in the world. Live it up like a local in the centre of Rotterdam.
neighborhood_overview:
Prepare to be charmed by neighborhoods full of fresh-faced bikers, exquisite architecture, and locals who may speak English better than you... ;)

You are very welcome to watch these inspiring videos, curtesy of Koen Samson, about the four seasons in Rotterdam!
Autumn - https://vimeo.com/150768299
Winter - https://vimeo.com/159932613
Spring - https://vimeo.com/171542577
Summer - https://vimeo.com/184653049

name: Centre city of Rotterdam
description: Townhouse in the center of Rotterdam (Bergpolder/Blijdorp).
neighborhood_overview: Family neighborhood in the center of rotterdam. House easily accessible by tram from Rotterdam Centraal train station. Public transportation easy to reach from the house. Tram 3 min walk. Metro a little further. City can also be reached by bicycle (1 bicycle available free of charge on request), if possible to rent bicycles, for example at the train station. Lots of shops, cafes and restaurants in the center. Recommended the Kop van Zuid with Hotel New York, and the Deliplein. De Witte de Withstraat is also nice for cafes and restaurants. For shopping including the Meent. The beautiful Blijdorp zoo is nearby. Several museums, including the Kunsthal. In addition, tourist attractions such as the cube houses and the Euromast. But don't forget the Erasmus bridge on the Meuse in the evening in the dark.

name: Authentic City App. with peaceful garden.
description:
Spacious and comfortable ground floor apartment including beautiful garden.
You will have a great stay in this characteristic over 100 years old mansion in the heart of the city only 900 meters from the central station, with lot's of cafes, terraces, galleries, restaurants and shops surrounding you.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in a very nice neighborhood behind Central Station. The station is about 900 meters walk and there you will find yourself in the hart of Rotterdam which offers the nicest cafes, restaurants, museums, galleries, shops and cinemas, the museum park with Museum Boymans and De Kunsthal, the authentic Witte the Withstraat, the Binnenweg, China Town with several small toko's is all within walking distance.

Exploring the city by electric scooter is the best way.
With the electric scooter you can go to the nearby parks such as Vroesenpark and off course a "must see" Kralingse Bos. You can go to the center or take a walk along the river Maas, cross the Erasmus bridge and go by watertaxi to different parts of the city.

With public transportation nearby you can reach all different parts of the city with their own charme and character.
Public transport is nearby with tram around the corner and a subway station within 5 minutes walk.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Harald and I live in the beautiful and upcoming city of Rotterdam. I love to travel and discover the world. But coming home after another adventure always brings a smile to my face. This is because this city is my home and my home is my sanctuary. I appreciate and enjoy it a lot and I hope you will too.
Life is short, so enjoy as much as you can!

description: My maisonnette is situated ground floor in a nice, quiet neighbourhood near the centre of Rotterdam. The Central Station is at 10-15 min walking distance., the center of Rotterdam at 10 min. walking. I  live in the apartment with 2 cats (and usually a roommate). I speak Dutch, English, and Spanish. The apartment is ground floor,  has a livingroom and 4 bedrooms and a little patio. Your room is next to the toilet and livingroom/kitchen.
neighborhood_overview: We like our house very much because it is near the centre and near the multi cultural aera Rotterdam Noord.
host_about: Ik geniet van alle verrassende en gezellige verhalen die de gasten meebrengen bij een kopje thee in de avond of bij het ontbijt. Iedereen beslist of en wat  hij/zij deelt. name: Best apartment in most vibrant street
description: This bright apartment is based on the bustling street Witte de Withstraat in the heart of Rotterdam. The apartment is equipped with a coffee machine, a kettle, a fridge, an oven, and a washing machine.  After a day of sightseeing in Rotterdam, you have plenty of choice from the nicest restaurants and cozy bars in the Witte de Withstraat. Within 30 meters from the apartment you will find the public transport such as the metro and the tram.
neighborhood_overview: The Witte de Withstraat in Rotterdam is a hip and very lively cultural nightlife street with many art galleries, popular cafés, restaurants and shops that are just different. The great atmosphere of the Witte de Withstraat is enhanced by the many terraces on the street. A must-see for those who visit Rotterdam.

name: Beautiful 1930’s en suite apartment in Rotterdam
description:
Welcome to my beautiful, cosy and characteristic apartment. This apartment is built in the 1930s and many of the original details are still intact such as the marble fireplaces and en suite doors leading to the bedroom.

The apartment is less than a minute's walk from the tram station Schieweg (line 125, which takes you to and from Rotterdam Central Station, the city centre and Kop van Zuid), a 10 to 15-minute walk from Rotterdam Central Station.
neighborhood_overview: Rotterdam Blijdorp / Bergpolder is a very friendly and affluent neighborhood.  Many children are raised here by young professional couples, and people are very open minded. On the corner of the street you will find your groceries, drugstore, florists and fun boutiques.  Across the street is a professional Beauty Bar where you can get a massage, solarium, or your nails done. One block away you can even get pierced or tattooed...! If I won’t welcome you personally, I will have the keys at Pleur, a concept store across of my apartment.
host_about:
Hi there!

My name is Daan, I am 29 years old and have been living in Rotterdam for the past five years. 

I love traveling to the Middle East, but my favorite city in the world is Melbourne! 

If you rent my apartment you will not only enjoy the happy spirit it carries, but also the many convenient facilities of my neighborhood. You are a 12 min walk from Rotterdam Central Station, the tram is just a footstep away and within 7 minutes you are at the Metro towards The Hague or Rotterdam South. And within three minutes you are on the highway to Amsterdam, Schiphol, Utrecht or Breda.

name: Stylish apartment, best location in Rotterdam!
description:
Stylish apartment with the best location in Rotterdam! Situated on one of the nicest streets, along a canal in the city centre. Beautiful view of the water as well as the modern central station, which is only a minutes walk away. The entire apartment is available for guests.

Apartment has spacious bedroom, 1.5 bathrooms, an open plan kitchen with dining room and living room. Cafes and bars and shopping district within walking distance.
neighborhood_overview: Located in the Old Dutch Quarter, one of the rare neighbourhoods not destroyed during the war. Beautiful Dutch architecture and canals. Top restaurants, cafes and bars are only 3 minutes walking.

name: Uniek Pension Schip in Rotterdam, Kop van Zuid
description:
Centrally located in Rotterdam.
Large and comfortable, secluded ship with generous cabins, large stays and equipped with all the comforts.
More than 16 guests, ask for the possibilities.
neighborhood_overview:
The ship "Castor" has its mooring on the Wilhelminapier in Rotterdam, also called the Manhattan on the Maas.
At 500 meters the Nieuwe Luxor theater.
At 150 meters the cruise terminal.
Near downtown and Ahoy.
Various restaurants are within walking distance.
host_about:
Hi!
Ik ben Mario en eigenaar van het schip te samen met mijn vrouw Eelke.
Wij exploiteren het schip zowel stilliggend voor de wal als varend.
Wij wonen ook aan boord met onze hond, maar hebben ons privé verblijf.
Wij hopen u graag aan boord te mogen verwelkomen en u een onvergetelijk verblijf te mogen bieden.

name: Beautyfull house, with super sweet cat.
description: The house is at the edge of a large park, in a quiet neighborhood. By bus/bike/car it is 15 min to Rotterdam Center. The rented space consists of a corner house. The ground floor is a bright living room with an open kitchen, on the first floor are two bedrooms and the bathroom, and in the attic is the third bedroom. The house has a nice front yard and sunny backyard by the water. You can swim there or take the pedal boat away. Parking is free. For rent with cat
neighborhood_overview: The house is adjacent to a large park, in the park there are several playgrounds and there is a deer camp. At 3 minutes walking distance is a large paid playground, the entrance is 0.50 cents per person. The shopping street with various fish, meat, bread, clothes, etc is 4 minutes by bike or in 15 minutes walking distance. Rotterdam/The Hague airport is 5 minutes away by car. Diergaarde Blijdorp is 10 minutes away and Rotterdam Centrum is 15 minutes away by bus, car or bike.
host_about: Ik ben Carmilla, ik woon met mijn gezin in ons heerlijk huis vlakbij het centrum van Rotterdam. We houden enorm van reizen en gaan er zo veel mogelijk op uit met onze camper. Als we op reis zijn verhuren we onze woning zodat andere van het heerlijke plekje kunnen genieten. We halen zo veel mogelijk persoonlijke spullen weg om je verblijf zo aangenaam mogelijk te maken.

description:
Large bedroom in a modern penthouse in the modern neighborhood Kop van Zuid with a great private terrace.

5 minutes to Rotterdam city centre by tram (tram stop in front of the building). Also metro station and train station within walking distance for travelling to Den Haag, Amsterdam and other cities.

name: Amazing location - Loft in City Center
description:
Welcome in the most green, charming & historical area of the city of Rotterdam. 🌱

Kralingen (next to city center Rotterdam)
is known because of its beautifull park with lake, restaurants and authentic architecture.

We ourself are sailors, on our way to the Mediterranean , which gave us the oppertunity to share our luxurious loft.
neighborhood_overview:
Kralingen is full of beautifull buildings and restaurant cuisines from all over the world.

Also it is only 7 minutes by bike from the authentic buildings of Kralingen, to the metropolitan city center of Rotterdam.

- The tram (stops 100m from loft), also availible for transport.

- Next to the loft there are two restaurants which serve amazing breakfast, lunch and diner.

- For further tips have a look in the “Book of answer” which will be provided after you make an reservation.
host_about:
I love Rotterdam and this exquisite neighbourhood. I rent my charming loft as I like traveling. The surrounding is just perfect. Two blocks from the lake/forest and lots of international restaurants. The Erasmus University is very close by as well as the metro and tram.
My loft has a Dutch old & modern style as well as my garden.
Welcome to Kralingen!

name: Spacious and sunny apartment with skyline view
description:
Beautiful sunny apartment adjacent to the center in the city center in the Stadsdriehoek district.

My 3-room apartment is located in the Stadsdriehoek neighborhood. The apartment is 75m2 and has a sunny balcony and also located in a very central location. The apartment has a great view over the city skyline. It is fully furnished, has an elevator and is equipped with all the comforts. Paid “Anytime” fitness next to the entrance of the flat.
neighborhood_overview: My apartment is very centrally located. It is less than 500 m from the famous Markthal and Cube homes (the Cube Houses), and a 5-minute walk from Blaak train station. 100m away from the Maasboulevard where you can walk or run along the river the Maas. Erasmus University is 3 stops by metro or 10 minutes by bicycle.
host_about: Wij zijn Vincent & Tessa. Een spontaan, ambitieus en ondernemend stel. Sinds juli hebben wij een dochter waar we heel happy mee zijn. Wij houden van reizen en vinden het leuk om andere AirBnB plekken te ontdekken. Wij werken in finance en als interieurstylist in Rotterdam.

name: Cozy, artistic, vintage hotspot in populair area
description:
Cozy, artistic, vintage appartement in one of the most popular (creative) neighbourhoods in Rotterdam. Hipster coffeeshops and bars around the corner (just across the street), 15 minute walk to centre, 15 minute walk to central station, 10 minute walk to famous Bird (disco, bar) and good restaurants. Bakery and grocery store around the corner.

It is my goal to make you feel comfortable, welcome and safe while staying in my appartement! I want you to have an awesome and memorable time!
neighborhood_overview: This neighbourhood is very popular because it has some great area's: a park on top of an old trainstation in the sky and an airtunnel (a must see! And a nice walk), little stores and galleries at 'de hofbogen', hipster coffeeshops, vintagestores, Vroezenpark and much more!
host_about:
Hi! 

Nice to meet you! 

My name is Gwen. I work as a freelance creative and researcher for television and documentary film. My work is my passion. I love people, cultures, art, design, journalisme and basically I really enjoy life! Sounds cheesy doesn't it .. sorry I cant help it .. I just do!

I hope my cozy and vintage-art house will give you as much inspiration and joy as it gives me. And that Rotterdam will be an experience you will always remember. 
I live in a neighbourhood that is one of the hotspots in Rotterdam. Creatives and artist live her. It's filled with nice coffeeshops (the ones with coffee! ;)) and quality restaurants. 

A few of the finest bars and discotheques are in 5 minute walking distance and the city is a 10 minute walk! Where you find even more places to party or have dinner or a drink. 

I hope my house is a place where you feel comfortable, welcome and most of all inspired. 

Hope  to see you soon!

name: Luxury Modern Home in City Center
description:
Welcome to our beautiful two-bedroom, 90 m2, apartment nestled in the heart of vibrant Rotterdam! Situated just a leisurely 5-minute stroll from the Central Station, this gem of a space is perched on the twelfth floor, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the city's magnificent skyline.

Upon entry, you'll encounter a tasteful interior featuring high quality design furniture. Despite its prime city-center location, the apartment offers a peaceful haven, where you can unwind and relax.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the heart of Rotterdam! Theater de Doelen and Theater Rotterdam Schouwburg, and the Pathé cinema are right around the corner.
There is a grocery store in the building. And if you don't feel like cooking, there are countless restaurants in the neighbourhood.

neighborhood_overview: We live in a friendly neighbourhood in Rotterdam West, close to the Witte de Withstraat and Nieuwe Binnenweg, where you can find a lot of the nice bars and restaurants Rotterdam has to offer. name: Luxurious heritage lodge at lakeside - Studio 2/2
description:
Studio 2/2

Next to one of the old spice mills "De Ster", you’ll find the former miller’s house, which has been redeveloped into two luxurious heritage studios at the lakeside (Ground floor studio & First Floor studio).
neighborhood_overview:
The heritage lodges are situated in the middle of the Kralingse Bos (forest), a green oasis in the heart of the city of Rotterdam.

Right next to the lodge you’ll find a nice restaurant which offers breakfast, lunch and dinner. The Kralingse Bos is a wonderful recreational area with all sorts of things to do. There’s for example a small beach, a sailing school, petting zoo, deer park, golf club and climbing park. And if you feel like popping into town, the centre of Rotterdam is just 3 metro stops away.

name: Light and cosy Apartment
description:
The apartment is very light and cosy, the interior. Free parking is a few Blocks away. Or for 10€ a day in my street. The balcony has morning and evening sun and there's one room for yoga/meditation. There are quite some plants.
The neighborhood (charlois) is lively and multi-cultural and filled with dutch, turkish and polish supermarkts and shops.
The museum square and Katendrecht are on 10 minutes by bike, central station 15 min. by bus
neighborhood_overview:
The reason i wanted to live in this area is because it is very international. There is several bruin cafe's (dutch pubs) in the area and many different restaurants, Surinam, italian, turkish, Dutch, polish and many supermarkets.
Besides that there is a brandnew 50 m swimming pool and also a Japanese centre (Shofukan) nearby that hosts teaceremonies in their teagarden on request.
There is the huge 5 km wide Zuiderpark on 5 minutes walking.
The historical Delfshaven is on a 10 minute bikeride, through the bikingtunnel under the river that is quite an experience for most foreigners.

name: Modern and cozy central apartment
description:
This is a modern and cozy apartment, which is perfect for one or two people coming to Rotterdam for work or pleasure. The area is just a few minutes away from the city centre and is well connected to restaurants and shops. The apartment has got anything you need for a pleasant and resting stay. If you also like to cook or chill with your friends enjoying a glass of wine, I am sure you will immediately feel at home here!
Please contact me for any information -- great local tips included!
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in the neighbourhood of Bergpolder, in Rotterdam Noord. This is a green and residential area, which is is very safe and silent at night. The area is located at 6 minutes walk from the Eudokiaplein department store with restaurants and supermarkets. To reach the centre, you can either bike (5 minutes) or take the tram 25 for three stops.
host_about: I am a young professional from Italy living in the Netherlands. I love sports, travelling and reading

description:
A beautifully renovated apartment situated in Kralingen, one of the most attractive old quarters of Rotterdam. The street is quiet and peaceful and lies near the 'Kralingse Plas' Lake. The apartment is located on the second and third floors and has two terraces.



ps
Free-Wifi included🥰
neighborhood_overview:
On top of all this there are two free bikes you can use, to frequent the lively neighbourhood with many lovely restaurants and bars.
The television is available for those rainy days and comes equipped with a Sonos speaker system as well as an apple tv box.
host_about: Proud citizen of the world!

name: Cottage in secluded garden near center Rotterdam
description:
Welcome to our nice cottage, situated in a spacious garden. It’s only a five-minute walk to the subway station and two stops to Rotterdam Central . It’s the perfect place for exploring the city and surroundings. The cottage is fully modernised. You can rest and relax here, taking a nap in the hammock between the trees or have breakfast at your own terrace.

If you want to know there is a discount available don't hesitate to contact us.

We have free bikes available! / Free parking
neighborhood_overview: It's a very quiet part of Rotterdam.  It's considered  one of the most desirable places in Rotterdam. You find lots of trees and green and some lakes and the river De Rotte. It's part of Hillegersberg.  Traditionally here you would find the more upscale houses and villas. The neighborhood had transformed to a mixed place with lots of nice shops and restaurants.

name: Single Room near Heart of City & Rotterdam Station
description:
Welcome to our compact single room at Hotel Milano in the heart of Central Rotterdam, the perfect place for a comfortable stay!
- Enjoy modern amenities including a work desk, AC, television, free WiFi, and more.
- Located in the city centre, with easy access to public transportation, the best restaurants, local supermarkets, and nearby shops.
Experience the vibrant atmosphere, beautiful views, and magical canals, ensuring an unforgettable stay in this beautiful and vibrant city.
neighborhood_overview:
Situated in the vibrant heart of Rotterdam, our property offers the perfect base to explore this dynamic and modern city. Known for its cutting-edge architecture, bustling cultural scene, and diverse culinary offerings, Rotterdam is a city that seamlessly blends history with contemporary living.

Whether you’re here for sightseeing, business, or to experience the local culture, you'll find everything you need just a short walk or drive away.

Nearby Attractions:
Euromast Tower - 1.2km (15 min walk). Enjoy panoramic views of the city from this iconic observation tower, complete with a restaurant and thrilling abseiling opportunities.
Museumpark - 0.8km (10 min walk). A cultural hub home to several museums, including the Boijmans Van Beuningen Museum, Kunsthal, and the Natural History Museum.
Witte de Withstraat - 0.6km (8 min walk). A lively street known for its eclectic mix of bars, restaurants, art galleries, and boutique shops.
Markthal (Marke

name: Historic apartment very close to city center
description:
Discover a piece of Rotterdam's history! Our restored 1903 house in West offers the perfect urban base. Quietly located, with shopping street and parks around the corner, 10 minutes to the city center. The beach is 30 minutes away by metro - ideal for explorers.

Modern comfort in a historic building, with all amenities for a perfect stay. Characterful and cozy, with an authentic atmosphere that lets you feel Rotterdam.

House rules: No parties, no smoking
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very much alive. We’re right next to the ‘nieuwe binnenweg’, which is a street that goes all the way from city center to Delfshaven. It’s 1,5 kilometers of funky shops, bars and restaurants. We guarantee you won’t get hungry here ;).

name: Bright and spacious multi-level apartment
description: Our spacious (96m2) and light multi-level apartment is located next to the popular neighborhood "Blijdorp" (walking distance 2 minutes) which is known for all its nice restaurants and cosy bars. The tram that departs next to our apartment will take you to all the good things in the city center of Rotterdam in only 5 minutes. Also, the nearest beach is only 11 km away and if you want to visit Amsterdam it will take you around 40 minutes by train. Central station of Rotterdam is a 10 minutes walk.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood has a lot to offer, like restaurants, bars and of course "Diergaarde Blijdorp" (the Zoo). We will provide you with a list of our favourite restaurant and places to hang out.
host_about: I travel for work all the time but love coming home. I rent out my house to let people experience Rotterdam in the same way I do!

description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place. Close to Tram (front of the door), Trein ( 1 min) and metro ( 1 min). Gym is in the building, ground floor free of use. Reception 7:00-24:00. Balcony is available from the living room and also access from the bedroom to the balcony. name: Warm and spacious apartment
description:
This place has it all ❤️
Quiet but still close to many highlights of Rotterdam. Wooden floors, authentic interior and a great B&O vintage soundsystem which will play your own spotify playlist.

A warm and comfortable place to stay. Enjoy your breakfast during summer outside in the sweet little green garden, cook a culinair dinner in the well outfitted kitchen, or just get yourself a delicious indonesian take away just down the street ;)
neighborhood_overview:
The appartement is located just around the corner of public transport (bus, tram and metro) and a 10 min. walk to the city center.

There are some bars and restaurants close by and you can rent a bike just around the corner.

name: Room in the heart of Rotterdam, Central Station
description: The apartment is situated on the first floor, the bedroom it is 14m2, it has a kitchen, bathroom and separate laundry room. The kitchen contains all required appliances, including dishwasher, microwave and fridge. Very close to Rotterdam Central Station. You can walk to the center. Near the  canal and wonderful bars and restaurants. In the front and the back there is lots of green (especially in spring and summer) (max.2 guests).
neighborhood_overview: The Provenierswijk has a stately and rustic character and is characterized by the two beautiful pre-war canals and beautiful mansions. You will find all conceivable city amenities nearby. Walk around the corner and discover nice hotspots in the Proveniersstraat. The city center is very easy to reach (within 5 minutes by bike).

name: Rotterdam centre 10min, behind Eurovison song 2020
description:
PAY ATTENTION: when renting the whole apartment is yours.
My house is a duplex apartment of 2 floors, on the 1st floor. Is the living room with an open kitchen. Through the open kitchen, you can continue to the balcony. There is a toilet on the first floor. Also on the first floor, there is a sofabed.
on the 2nd floor is the room+ private balcony. 2nd fl. bathroom with a shower cabin and a sink with mirror and cupboard under the sink.

Partying is forbidden, there is a fine here! 🚫
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in a cozy and quiet area where the neighbors know each other well. At 3 min walking distance there is a shopping street with supermarkets, a butcher shop, bakery, laundromat, cigar farmer, post office, Kruidvat, bank/ATM ING.
At the beginning of the street there is also an ATM from the ABN AMRO it is very safe because the ATM is located on the village road. Opposite the ATM are fast food restaurants (halal) : burger shop, Turkish dining tent and a chicken restaurant. Across the street is a small supermarket and a butcher, this is a cozy street with a lot of atmosphere. At the end of the street, there is a Chinese takeaway restaurant a Surinamese toko and a self-service laundromat.
host_about:
Welcome, travelers and adventurers
I'm a woman with a passion for traveling. 
As an Airbnb host, I offer more than just a comfortable place to stay; I offer an opportunity to see the world through my eyes - a world steeped in colorful cultures, and unforgettable encounters.

I'm a guide, a friend, and a bridge between cultures. With my social and vibrant personality, I create an atmosphere where guests feel at home.

name: Stijlvol appartement met dakterras (+ lieve kat)
description:
Welcome to our modern 2-floor apartment with an amazing roof terrace boasting a metropolitan view! The open kitchen and living overlooks a small green park, offering a tranquil ambiance. The house (85m2) features characteristic details such as glass en-suite sliding doors and a wood stove. We also have a lovely cat named Luna.

Our apartment is located behind Rotterdam Central Station (4 minutes by foot) and close to the city centre with nice cafes, restaurants and shops.
neighborhood_overview: There are two supermarkets located just around the corner. For the main attractions, like Markthal, Euromast Tower, Erasmus Bridge, Kunsthal you can take the public transport (tram or metro) or a 20-25-minute walk. If you are arriving at Schiphol Airport – there is a direct train to Rotterdam Central Station (25 minutes). There are enough parking facilities nearby the apartment.

name: Modern studio + two bicycles in cozy Liskwartier!
description: Willebrordus is a modern studio (with 2 bikes) in one of the cosiest areas of Rotterdam: the Liskwartier! The studio has a front and back room. In the front room, the garage door has been replaced by a large glass door. Here you will find a bar and the pantry with dishwasher and fridge. In the back room there is a double bed (180*210cm), smart TV, a wardrobe with a seat, the shower and the toilet. The front and rear rooms can be closed by means of a sliding door.
neighborhood_overview: The Liskwartier is a lively neighborhood with many catering facilities. Within walking distance (<10min) are several hotspots to drink coffee, have a bite to eat or have a drink!

name: Bright and Spacious 100 sqm Duplex in the city !
description:
Welcome to our spacious and bright duplex apartment! With an area of 100m2, our home offers ample space for you to relax and unwind. Nestled in a peaceful and quiet area, you'll enjoy a serene stay while still being conveniently close to all the amenities you need.
Our apartment enjoys a prime location on the border of the center, providing easy access to the city. If you prefer biking or taking a tram, Central Station is just a quick 10-minute ride away.
Experience authentic Dutch living!
neighborhood_overview:
Located close to a vibrant neighborhood, you'll find a variety of shops and restaurants within a 3-minute walk on Nieuwe Binnenweg. Some highlights include:
Multiple supermarkets, including an organic option for those seeking healthier choices.
A wide selection of restaurants and bars catering to various tastes and preferences.
Conveniently situated just 400 meters away from the 'Dijkzigt' metro station and Erasmus University.
Excellent access to tram and metro services, with stations just a few minutes away, ensuring effortless transportation.
host_about:
Salut, Hi, Ola, Ni hao, Hoi, I'm French and my close friends call me Jon. I have an IT background. I love football and discovering new places and foods from all around the world. 
As a host, guests say that I'm quick to answer and always available for any requests or questions. Make yourself comfortable at our place as long as you keep it tidy and clean. Our place is nice, well located but for that price don't expect luxury because the simplest things are the best.

name: Lovely Loft
description: Spacious loft apartment with all the comforts and very luxuriously provided in one of the most vibrant streets of Rotterdam. A king size bed comes with a king size bed. The living room is spacious and equipped with a double sofa bed. In the street there are nice restaurant and bars where you can go for breakfasts, lunch and dinner. All public transport nearby and also the shopping center and attractions are close by. The spacious jacuzzi bath makes this sleeping in this loft a luxury experience
neighborhood_overview:
Lovely loft in best street is in central location in Rotterdam.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat screen TV, and a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, fridge, washing machine and oven.

The apartment has a hot tub.

“Lusthofstraat” offers grocery stores, shopping, and things such as hair dressers and beauty salons. It’s about 3 to 4 minutes walk.

The Erasmus university and Brain-park are about 800m away, and can easily be reached by foot/bike within several minutes.

Flex-bikes, something similar to Airbnb but then to rent bikes per minute, are frequently stationed just around the corner. Making it easy to rent a bike for a small fee when you need it.

name: Light spacious family house in quiet neighbourhood
description: We welcome you in our modern home with your family or group of friends, located in a quiet neighborhood, only 5 minutes from metro/buses/trains, supermarkets and a big shopping mall. Here you can relax, watch a movie on the projector, take a bath, use the fully equipped kitchen & have a good sleep, in just a short ride to the city centre with all its attractions. Rotterdam itself has much to offer but is also the perfect base to visit the cities, nature, beaches & other attractions in the area.
neighborhood_overview:
Prins Alexander is a family friendly residential area in the east of Rotterdam, between the Kralingse Bos wooded park and the Zevenhuizerplas lake and its many recreational opportunities.

Convenient: from the Prins-Alexander station, you can easily catch a train to Utrecht or get the metro to Rotterdam City Centre.

• Pietje Bell adventure playground: the ultimate outdoor play area in Prinsenland, with ponds and playground equipment.
• Nesselande beach: an expansive sandy beach stretching 800 metres along the Zevenhuizerplas.
• Alexandrium Shopping Centre: 140 shops focusing on fashion and interior decoration.
• Kralingse Bos park is popular with joggers and inline skaters. On and around the lake, you can sail, swim, or just relax in the sun beside your barbecue.

neighborhood_overview:
Rotterdam’s passion for work and dynamic energy are unleashed to their fullest here. This area is all about working hard and playing even harder. The area used to see a constant flow of passenger ships arriving and departing. Lloydkwartier has been transformed into a modern area where people live and work, with a strong focus on the creative sector. The historic warehouses, old port monuments and modern buildings house a wide range of design agencies, advertising firms, architects, photographers and audiovisual companies. Interested in meeting these creative spirits? Grab a cup of coffee at Stroom, a former power plant that has been transformed into a hotel and restaurant. This is where the local creative entrepreneurs have their appointments and source their daily shot of high-octane caffeine.

-The famous ‘Witte de With straat’ with a lot of nice bars and restaurants is just within 5 minutes walking distance.
-Museums you will find on various places in Rotterdam but all very easy to go to by foot, bike or public transport.
-The supermarkets are around the corner within 5 minutes by foot.

name: Cosy '30's house near Rotterdam city centre
description:
A beautiful house from the 1930's with good vibes, close to the city center of Rotterdam. Located in a quiet and historical neighborhood, near highway exits and public transport.

It's a family house, safe for small children. We have one bedroom with twin bed and and one bedroom with a children’s cot. A single bed bed can be placed extra in that room for bigger children or an adult.

We live in this house and you’re welcome to visit for the true Rotterdam experience!
neighborhood_overview:
Historical neighbourhood, built mainly in the 1930’s, with beautiful nature on walking distance. There are several supermarkets, bars and restaurants nearby and playgrounds for the little ones. You can also find one of Rotterdams most authentic multicultural shopping streets with local stores and restaurants at 15 minutes walking distance.

Public transport is also easy to find, which brings you quickly to the city center.

There’s paid parking in the streets but there is free parking on a ten minute walking distance.
host_about:
We are a married couple with one child and moved to this house a few years ago. We renovated it all by ourselves and really enjoy living in it. We are born and raised in Rotterdam and love this city! It's people are very open, mixed and direct. A great combination :)

We like to share the experience of our house and city with you!

name: Beautiful apartment + garden close to city centre
description: Are you looking for the perfect stay in Rotterdam; look no further! This apartment is located in the most popular neighbourhood of Rotterdam: Blijdorp. Everything you need is within walking distance: supermarket, metro station, Rotterdam Central station, restaurants, nature. Blijdorp has it all!
neighborhood_overview: This apartment is located in one of the best areas of Rotterdam; Blijdorp. It's an urban and modern neighbourhood in the north of Rotterdam. Many young families and starters are situated here. It's super close to basically everything; 1 min walking distance from a supermarket & Blijdorp metro station. Within 5 min walking distance, you can find many other hotspots, such as 'Het Vroesenpark' - a large city park, several coffee places and more. One of Rotterdam's most visited tourist's spots is the Blijdorp Zoo, which is also very close. Furthermore, you are super close to the city centre: 1 metro stop to Central Station (2 min), 8/10 min bike ride or 20 min by foot.
host_about:
Who am I? I am 29 years old, I live in Rotterdam together with my boyfriend and I work for myself as a sustainability consultant and yoga instructor. 

I LOVE to travel, I LOVE the sun & I LOVE animals (especially dogs). I think this is basically the three things I love the most ;) (Besides my boyfriend, family & friends of course). 

I like doing yoga and living in the moment. I love nature and being surrounded by people who enjoy life and simply smile at whatever comes their way. 

Food: Italian & Indian
Travel (tops): New Zealand, Australia, Vietnam,  Sri Lanka, USA. 
Books: The power of Now 
Music: everything :)

Welcome to Hoogvliet!
Your room is located in the quiet Hoogvliet, a neighborhood in Rotterdam South. 2 metro stations are 8 minutes' walk away. amenities: ["Host greets you"]

name: Cosy & stylish small bedroom
description: Welcome to our cosy home! After traveling and living all over, we decided to settle in the great city Rotterdam. We were really lucky to find this beauty just out of the city centre. It is perfectly tranquil, but with the center around the corner. With a lot of sweat and love to detail, we tried to make the house homely. Our spare room is the room you would stay in, with all amenities you can image. We will share the 1,5 bathrooms and feel free to use our kitchen or relax in our living room.
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a lively and multi-ethnic neighbourhood that feels a little bit like a small, international village within Rotterdam. You have literally everything around the corner from a bakery to supermarkets, a flower shop and many restaurants.
Our favourite cafe is Wolf on Wolphaertsbocht with great breakfast and cakes.
A small hidden secret is Koffie Ambacht with its lovely people and music or art performances.
The big shopping mall at Zuid Plein is a 15 min walk. There is also the new theater with a lovely big terras and nice other restaurants where you can enjoy the sun till late in the evening. (Lisa is our favourite)
You can see the top of the trees from Zuider Park (the largest park in Rotterdam) form our living room window, or can walk to Ahoy or the water front.
Katendrecht and Wilhelminapier with its iconic buildings is only 2,5 km away.
The city center is 15 min by public transport.
The historical bicyle tunnel is open again after constr
host_about:

name: Huge 300m2 river side design apartment
description:
This design apartment on the Maas quay is unique because of its location and design. Everything shows that it was renovated under the supervision of an interior architect. The 4 meter high ceilings and the enormous surface of 350m2 make this house feel very spacious.

Located in the central and historic district Delfshaven, there are many attractions within walking distance. Because the metro and tram stops are close to the house, the rest of Rotterdam is also quickly and easily accessible.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located on the quay of the Maas river in the historical Delfshaven district. Only 20 minutes from Central Station. There are many good and cozy restaurants in this neighborhood. Within walking distance is the old marina. In the old canal houses you can now find antique and curio shops, small distilleries, restaurants and some craft beer breweries.

Because this house is close to several tram stops and a metro stop, the rest of the city is well connected by public transport. You can be at the Museumpark in 10 minutes, at the Maritime museum in 15 minutes and at the boarding point for the boat trips in about 20 minutes.

The "Nieuwe Binnenweg", known for its many nice boutique shops, is only 10 minutes by metro and the Witte de With, the entertainment street with lively bars and many restaurants, is only 12 minutes away.
host_about: I m 64 yr man from Amsterdam, work in the national theatre and arts Executive director

name: Whole apartment in Rotterdam. FREE parking!
description:
This appartment is from Samantha, she likes to travel a lot (probably the same as you! :) ) so when she does she rents this appartment.

The appartment is in Rotterdam-Alexander
- Highway A16 and A20 5 min
- With the car it is 15 min. to Rotterdam Centrum
- Metrostation 5 min.
- Busstation 2 min.
- Closest trainstation 10 min.

Distance to
- Supermarket/restaurant/cafe 1 min
- Alexander shopping center 5 min
neighborhood_overview: Rotterdam Alexander is a quiet neighbourhood, with excellent public transportation to the city center and the highway A16 and A20.
host_about:
Ik Stefanie (Nederlanse, getrouwd, momenteel 57 jaar) reis meestal samen met één van mijn dochters Samantha en Brigitte (28 en 31 jaar), aangezien mijn man niet zo van culturele reizen houdt. Ik geef de voorkeur aan een betaalbare accommodatie ter plaatse boven een hotel, vanwege de huiselijke sfeer en de mogelijkheid om eventueel andere mensen te leren kennen. Ik ben geen veeleisende bewoner en zal goed met uw spullen omgaan. 

Mijn stijl van reizen is low budget, ik maak graag gebruik van hostels en dergelijke, kamperen is echter niet mijn stijl. Ik kom graag in contact met plaatselijke bewoners om te horen hoe zij hun leven ervaren en hun mening te horen over deze wereld.

In het verleden heb ik op diverse reizen naar Zuid-Afrika ook vrijwilligerswerk gedaan (samen met één van mijn dochters) in de townships van Port Elizabeth. Ik vind het belangrijk om te proberen mijn steentje bij te dragen in de leefbaarheid voor andere mensen op onze aarde 

Mijn hobby's zijn lezen, handwerken, reizen met mijn kinderen en mijn werk op de klantenservice van een energiebedrijf. 

I am Stefanie ( Netherlandish , married , currently 54 years) usually travel with one of my daughters Samantha and Brigitte (25 and 28) , as my husband does not like cultural tours . I prefer an affordable accommodation spot above a hotel, because of the homey atmosphere and the opportunity to get to know any other people. I'm not a demanding occupant and will properly handle your belongings.

My style of travel is low budget , I like to use hostels and such , camping is not my style. I like to come in contact with local residents to hear how they experience their lives and hear their views on the world.

In the past I have also volunteered on several trips to South Africa (along with one of my daughters) in the townships of Port Elizabeth. I think it's important to try to do my part in the quality of life for other people on earth

My hobbies are reading , crafts, traveling with my children and my work on the customer service of an energy company.

neighborhood_overview: We live in a complex named Heliport. Back in the days this used to be a helicopter platform until the arrival of Rotterdam airport. It is like a small village in the city center, which is why we love it here! We will send you a detailed map to explain where you have to be, because you have to know your way around. There are elevators, but you need a tag, which we will leave in the house. The neighborhood is very quite and pleasant with mix of people (from young singles to families and everything in between).

name: Spacious private room in trendy loft
neighborhood_overview: My loft is situated in Rotterdam Delfshaven, which is in the western part of town, very close to the city center. Delfshaven is a very multicultural part of Rotterdam, the pier where I live is known for its port activities. Usually, there are one or more commercial boats moored close by. Depending on the season, one or more cruiseships sail by every week on their way to either the city center or back towards the North Sea and often people drive up here just to see them sail by.
host_about:
Hi!
My name is Jolie. I'm a clinical psychologist who moved to Rotterdam 8 years ago. I'm the first owner of my loft and have designed the interior myself with great care. I enjoy living here very much. After some nice experiences with Airbnb as a guest, I decided it would be selfish to keep my spare bedroom all to myself, especially since it has such a great view of the Rotterdam skyline. I look forward to meeting you!

name: Unique Cube House in heart of Rotterdam! Room 2
description:
Welcome to the one of the most unique places in Rotterdam!
Designed by Dutch architect Piet Blom, this residential complex are literally cubes, tilted over by 45 degrees. This results in buildings that look, feel and behave unlike anything you’ll find elsewhere in the world. Live it up like a local in the centre of Rotterdam.
neighborhood_overview:
Prepare to be charmed by neighborhoods full of fresh-faced bikers, exquisite architecture, and locals who may speak English better than you... ;)

You are very welcome to watch these inspiring videos, curtesy of Koen Samson, about the four seasons in Rotterdam!
Autumn - https://vimeo.com/150768299
Winter - https://vimeo.com/159932613
Spring - https://vimeo.com/171542577
Summer - https://vimeo.com/184653049

We really like cycling.

name: Luxurious Central Studio in Monumental Warehouse
description: The centrally located luxurious studio is in the most beautiful area of Rotterdam, the Scheepvaartkwartier, where historic sailing ships gently float on the water. The studio is in a monumental building from 1860 and completely renovated in 2020. Public transport options like tram, metro & watertaxi are 3 min away. Relax in The Park, enjoy many of the atmospheric restaurants, enjoy breathtaking views from the Euromast or stroll along the Maas River. All a few steps away!
neighborhood_overview:
The Scheepvaartkwartier is a protected cityscape. Stately mansions on classic avenues bring the rich shipping history of Rotterdam to life. A romantic location for couples, who like to be immortalized by a photograph against a picturesque backdrop. Anyone who feels like a glass of wine and a tasty dinner can go to atmospheric restaurants such as Loos, Zinc or Louise Petit. The amazing Bar Berta is just next door, where you can have the best tapas outside Spain!

You’re steps away from many of the Rotterdam highlights like the Euromast Park, the Maas River, historical Veerhaven, Erasmusbrug, Markthal and cultural destinations like the Kunsthal Museum.

The Park is a popular place to relax and picnic in the summer. Moreover, all kinds of festivals and events take place. The park is home to the Euromast, the highest observation tower in the Netherlands. A restaurant with a panoramic view of the city and harbor is located at an altitude of 100 meters.
host_about: I love meeting people, music, travelling and my home town Rotterdam. I'm an Airbnb fan from day one! Next to being an Airbnb host myself I love using it while travelling. I'm very relaxed and super-positive!

name: PENTHOUSE PRISON (in) THE HEART OF ROTTERDAM
description:
Penthouse Prison, located in the heart of Rotterdam situated on the top floor of the former PoliceBuilding.
A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE FOR FRIENDS AND FAMILY

Penthouse Prison is part of a social project, called Heilige Boontjes. The basic idea is that young Rotterdammers - that have a so-called distance to the labour market - will be helped and trained to get and hold a job in the cafe, restaurant on the ground floor and the Bed&Breakfast on the top floor.
neighborhood_overview:
Penthouse Prison is located on Eendrachtsplein (Union Square) It is located in the very heart of Rotterdam with the North-South axis connecting Centraal Station with the Art area (o.a. Museum Boymans and Kunsthal) to the South and connecting the Lijnban shopping area with the up-and coming Oude Westen area.
The hustle and bustle nightlife in the Witte de Witstraat and the serenity of The Park are within a ten minute walk.
YOU WILL NOT FIND A LOCATION MORE CENTRAL.
host_about: We are part of Heilige Boontjes, a social project to give Youngsters In Rotterdam a second chance.

name: Beautiful big house with lake view
description:
Beautiful light house overlooking the Kralingse Park, in the lively monumental neighbourhood of Kralingen, which is full of small pubs and restaurants, only 10 minutes from the Rotterdam city center.

Kralingse Park is a recreational area with boating, playgrounds, BBQ area.

The house has 2 bedrooms on the first floor and another 2 bedrooms (which are joined) on the 3rd floor. In the souterrain are another 2 spacious bedrooms.
neighborhood_overview:
Kralingen is traditionally known as the city’s chic district. You’ll find romantic villa neighbourhoods and elegant lanes lined in town houses with beautifully manicured gardens. Many students from Erasmus University Rotterdam live here, which adds a lively note to a fairly quiet area. A number of popular pubs and restaurants are situated along Oostzeedijk and Oudedijk.

The city centre are just 10 minutes by bike, tram or subway.

The green oasis of the Kralingse Bos, is a major attraction for everyone seeking to flee the busy urban streets for some fresh air and peace and quiet. Not that it’s always quiet; the Kralingse Bos is often humming with pleasant activity on sunny weekend afternoons. Nature lovers enjoy a stroll through the forest. Sun-worshipers bask on the lake’s small beach. Toddlers splash around in the wading pool or play at the petting zoo. Bigger children will love exploring the climbing park. People rollerblade, jog and cycle to their heart’s cont
host_about: We are an active family with three kids. Two active teenage boys  and a sweet girl. Living in Rotterdam east (Kralingen) has the great combination of living in a village with a 10 min cycletrip to the centre. We love to hang around in and around de Plas (lake), apart from that we like travelling and plunging in other cultures.

name: Classic townhouse with nice singel views in centre
description: Our townhouse in Rotterdam centre is of 1893. This one-floor unit suits 1-3 singles, 1-2 couples sharing utilities, children incl, for 3-7 days. We prefer stays for work/study. On 2nd floor, 40 steep steps, with own access. Views of a meandering canal. One bedroom. The main space is 12 meters deep. It is split into a lounge (front),  a dining area, and a 2nd sitting area. Near tram & metro with places for toasting/dining. Close to Erasmus Medical Centre, Museum Park, river New Meuse, Welkom!
neighborhood_overview: Rotterdam Centre is a vibrant modern area with a great mix of people and places, with young artists, start-ups, and owner-run shops. The townhouse is walking distance from medieval Delfshaven, The Park near the river, and the larger Museumpark, near the Erasmus Medical Centre.
host_about:
I am born in The Netherlands and my partner in the UK and we feel European. We both are active in international and national health and wellbeing. We have two homes: one near Liverpool and one in Rotterdam. Our interests and travels include cultures & religions in Asia. We enjoy our friends across the world and love to welcome new ones in our homes.
PS. Baltimore reviews are on an apartment that is sold.

name: Apartment next to de Kuip & near the city center
description: Beautiful spacious apartment on the 9th floor with amazing sights and in lively neighborhood with lots of entertainment and next to the football stadium ‘de Kuip’. Also ideally located only 5 kms away from the city centre. And public transport is a 2 minute walk away from the apartment. The water taxi is also next to the building and a fun experience in Rotterdam!
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in the middle of lively neighborhood with lots of entertainment. So take the elevator to the ground floor, walk out of the building and you are a few steps away from the cinema, a game hall, bowling alleys, 6 (!!) restaurants with a lot of varieties of world food, fast food chains and the football stadium "de Kuip" (home of football club Feyenoord).

Furthermore it is only 10 minutes away from the city centre and a few minutes away from the beautiful Wilhelminapier (the Manhattan of the Netherlands).

name: Rotterdam centre skyline appartment
description: Modern sunny apartment with windows and balconies all around. Huge roof terrace with Rotterdam skyline view and lush green. Close to metro, citycenter, central station and zoo. National monument from the 1930's and completely renovated in 2010.
neighborhood_overview:
Blijdorp is a lush green laidback residential neighborhood directly next to the Central Station and city centre.

In our street you find Vroesenpark with the relaxed Parkpavillion for food and drinks in the sun. The park is great for jogging and has outdoor fitness facilities.

A short walk along the romatic Singel waterway you get to the entrance of Blijdorp Zoo.

Around the corner you can have breakfast at Sajoer juice bar or grab a beer at Statencafé.
host_about: We are Emilie and Kris, two architects, with daughter Roos. We're fond of veggies and fruits from our allotment garden, our oldtimer Mercedes, sailing. We love to receive you in our self-renovated house.

description:
Complete, one bedroom apartment of 50 square meters. Includes a kitchen with an induction stove (not pictured). The apartment is cosy, bright and with a clear view.

name: Large & Bright Cozy Beach Townhome
description:
A spacious, sunny 3-bedroom townhouse in a very quiet residential area, just a 15-minute walk from the beach.

With a private yard and terrace, you’ll have plenty of space to relax.

Surrounded by parks, playgrounds, outdoor gyms, and canals, this 120 square meter home is ideal for families & couples of all ages

Note: Accommodates up to 4 adults & 2 children. We welcome small toddlers, but do not have baby gates!

Check the full description for more house details and local tips.
neighborhood_overview:
This area is a hidden gem and I hope you enjoy it as much as we do.

There are various beach cafes/clubs and restaurants to choose from within 15 min walk whether you need space for your kids to run around and play on swingsets or a quiet corner for a date, or you want to spend the afternoon in a cabana.

There is also a gorgeous restaurant [with great terraces] on our street called Viersprong which is a 2 minute walk.

host_about:
Hey Everyone, 

I am so excited to be a part of the AirBNB community. Im Canadian and spent 10 years living and working in Vancouver, Canada as an investigator and have recently relocated to the Netherlands.

My background is in law enforcement and I currently work in football (soccer). During my time in North America, and occasionally in Europe, I work in film and TV.

I live a very and active healthy lifestyle and also train Brazilian Jiu Jitsu, CrossFit and travel frequently to study and train. 

I use AIRBNB a lot to travel with my boyfriend Ronald as well as he moves around a lot between Europe, North America and Australia in the horticultural industry for long durations.

I am a very easy going, happy person who is respectful, enthusiastic, friendly and polite and promise to make your visit as enjoyable as possible and/or to treat your homes with the utmost care.

I am always looking forward to using airbnb to travel and host to experience new cultures, meet new people and see the world.

name: Nature & city life. Your vacation & home office
description: Urban, spacious and sunny apartment in Blijdorp - one of the popular areas of Rotterdam. 76m2 meters with a big living room, open kitchen and lovely garden with both a terrace and lounge spot to enjoy sun. name: Knus Tinyhouse in R’dam, dichtbij het centrum!
description: Very cozy and cozy cottage (Ibiza style) close to the city center of Rotterdam. The cottage is fully equipped; you can easily lock up for a weekend to relax for a weekend (we have lived there ourselves for a year with a lot of fun:), but if you still want to go to the terrace, shopping, culture sniffing or eating out, by bike or by metro you are in the city center in no time.
neighborhood_overview:
Our place is unique in Rotterdam! Surrounded by water with lots of greenery (and lots of nice water birds). Every day there are a number of birds of cozy neighborhoods! Especially the large swans are very imposing! And there's peace! You don't feel like you're so close to the center of Rotterdam.

The Kralingse lake is a 5-minute bike ride away, and if you cycle a minute further, you are in the center of Kralingen with its cozy bars.

If you cycle the other way, you will be in 20 minutes (including the pound) in Kinderdijk, with all its beautiful mills!

And it remains a nice idea that you are so in the bustling heart of Rotterdam with bus, tram and metro (the latter is located a minute bike ride away)!!

name: Authentic 30's house in the South of Rotterdam
description:
Entire house in the south of Rotterdam. The house comes with a fully equipped open kitchen, a fire place, two bedrooms, a cinema room, a record player and a little garden. The house was built in 1935 and a lot of the old elements are still there, it has a warm vintage look and will make you feel right at home.

The south of Rotterdam is accessible from the city center by metro (10 min) or bike (15 min and possible to use ours) or watertaxi :)

Very close to Ahoy, Katendrecht and Wilhelmina pier

name: Studio with private entrance and balcony!
description: This off the beaten track comfortable 1930's private guest room, with it's own entrance and private balcony, is conveniently located near all mayor transport such as the central railwaystation, the airport, tram and the subway. Its situated in the lovely old (1930's) trendy north part of Rotterdam with lots of local eatery's, parks and bars. It's only a 15min. walk from the city centre!
neighborhood_overview:
Situated only 10 min. from Rotterdam city center in the old and lush green part of Rotterdam. With an architectual national monument (Bergpolderflat) right on the doorstep! The neighbourhood has some cozy restaurants, shops and parks to explore.

You're in the center within moments. Here you can visit 'the Markthal', 'Cube houses', 'Witte de Withstraat' and many museums or architectural highlights. If you cycle the other way, to 'Kralingen' you will find the ever and green 'Kralingse Bos' where you can take a soothing walk or rent a boat for the day to explore Rotterdam by water.

name: Dutch River Family Cottage
description: Ons Huis Terbregge is an old historic dyke house. Located along the river "De Rotte" in a wonderful neighborhood. Built in 1869 and continues through one family since 1875. Adorable A frame home with garden house guest room. Wonderful courtyard and private patio for guests to enjoy the views of the river. Located near a large park and a 20 minute bike ride to Rotterdam city center. A lovely restaurant located on the corner.
neighborhood_overview: Terbregge is a wonderful family neighborhood with a snack bar and lovely restaurant.  Also includes a community center with a children's playground. Enjoy a bike ride along the river and jump in for a swim. Lovely walks to a nearby park with a pancake house and lake. Where you can feed the ducks or rent a paddle boat.

name: Central garden apartment on a lush boulevard.
description:
Situated 3,5 min walk from Rotterdam Central is this stunning apartment in a 120 year old building with many of the original features and high living room ceilings still intact.

Facing a green and lush boulevard with water, this is your perfect tranquil home base in a bustling city. You can escape the madness on the balcony or in the large garden.

The city is full of contrast. The apartment is located in one of the finest old streets of the city. The renowned modern architecture is never far.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is one of Rotterdam’s greenest and quietest. However, it is lined with cute pubs and hip coffee places. Also, you are never far away from downtown, where there is an abundance of food, drink and art culture.

Right from the doorstep is a boulevard which can be followed for miles. To the city center, or away from it to the park.
host_about:
Hi! I am a Dutch airline pilot with knack for traveling. I’m probably booking last-minute, because when on holiday I don’t plan ahead most of the times! Most often I travel together with Lotte, my girlfriend of 7 years. We live in Rotterdam.

Love music, reading, hiking, living with intent.

We have decided it would be fun to live in a different city for a few months, and therefore we rent out our apartment to reduce our own costs of staying somewhere. There are no reviews of the apartment itself as of yet, but I have been rated highly while travelling, and mean to perpetuate this while renting out. 

If you look at the map and the pictures you can see it’s a superb apartment. We are looking forward to meeting you.

Same accommodation as Groupaccommodation Rooms on Water, but with 4 bedrooms (max 8 people) with private bathroom.
With this number of people you can stay relaxed on my beautiful ship in the center of Rotterdam with your family, group of friends or company.

Unique experience for your overnight stay in Rotterdam, for both business visit, city trip or theater visit.
The ship has 5 x four person rooms and 3 x single rooms.
An overnight stay will take you back in time to the way the sailors lived on board in the 1940s to the early 1980s.

You share the sanitary facilities with any other guests.

description:
NEW! With the pedal boat (100 m) you arrive at a beautiful wooden cabin, tastefully furnished and equipped with every comfort.

On 46 m², you'll find a kitchen, dining bar, and lounge sofa with a home cinema. The house has underfloor heating and a wood burning stove! There are 2 bedrooms with both access to the bathroom and to the terrace.

The cabin has everything you need, such as bed and kitchen linen, firewood, coffee from The Coffee boys and herbs, oil, soap, and dishwasher cubes. You won't be anything!

Within walking distance to Rotterdam Centraal Station and just a short drive from Rotterdam The Hague Airport (RTM) you are located in the vibrant area of Rotterdam North.

Set along the banks of the Nieuwe Maas River, Rotterdam is Europe’s biggest port and offers diverse dining, shopping, and entertainment options. Explore the charming streets of this once-medieval city and be sure to visit modern landmarks like the soaring Euromast observation tower, Erasmus Bridge, and The Markthal.
