name: Architect's Hideout. Bright, Comfy, Central Luxury
description:
***Check out my other Architect's Apartment Check my Bio ***

12pm 'Extra Lazy' Check-Out, 24/7 Self-Check-in.

Sitting proudly in Rotterdam’s sought-after inner West, a 6 min bike ride to Central Station, this freshly finished Architect’s apartment was designed purely with luxury, fun, and hotel comfort in mind.

100% Egyptian Cotton Hotel Bed Linen, Underfloor Heating throughout, Nespresso Coffee, Cereal Provided, Netflix, Spotify, voice-controlled lighting & Private Garden Terrace.
neighborhood_overview:
Utterly bursting with life, and outside the usual tourist trail, the street and immediate neighbourhood has an addictive atmosphere. A One-of-a-kind fusion of Asian street culture, European indulgences, and Middle Eastern food-market energy.

In 1 minute you can be relaxing on the bank of one of the widest and most magical canals in Rotterdam, the “Heemradsingel”. Wake up to the smells of the Bakery next door, and within a 30 second walk in either direction of the front door you have brunch and coffee hotspots, wood-fire Pizza, a truly unique fine-dining experience, and a beautiful open grassed ’square’ where the locals hang out on the grass as they soak up the vibe.

Located in a quite area in Kralingen-Crooswijk, next to the city centre of Rotterdam within walking distance. Hope to see you soon!

The city center of Rotterdam, with its bustling shops, restaurants, and nightlife, is easily accessible within a short distance. Rotterdam Central Station, a major hub for train, tram, and metro transportation, is also easily accessible from Blijdorp.

Blijdorp boasts a diversity of architecture, with beautiful historic buildings, modern apartment complexes, and charming streets. The neighborhood offers an attractive mix of residential, commercial, and recreational spaces, with various shops, restaurants, and cafes in the vicinity.

description: on the 3rd floor, a trendy studio 57m2 is located in the heart of Rotterdam. Complex is only 3 years old and looks well-maintained. All hotspots are within walking distance. neighborhood_overview: As a resident of the Van Vollenhovenkwartier, you'll enjoy the grandeur of the monumental district of Het Scheepvaartkwartier every day. The Scheepvaartkwartier, also known as New Work, is a characteristic and versatile neighborhood. The maritime atmosphere, the impressive historic buildings and the many greenery make the neighborhood an attractive piece of Rotterdam. The nice thing about the location is that it is surrounded by the classic allure and look of the Scheepvaartkwartier while the bustling city center is easy to reach. Whether it's the Markthal, the Museumkwartier, Rotterdam Centraal, the Nieuwe Maas or the Wilhelminapier. All the hotspots are close. Stops for tram, bus, water taxi and the metro are within walking distance. In the neighborhood you will find catering including top restaurants, delicacies, an AH, museums, you can have drinks in the beautiful historic Veerhaven or relax in the Park. Atmospheric, unique and historic living in one of the best city locations in t
host_about: As a resident of the Van Vollenhovenkwartier, you can enjoy the grandeur of the monumental Het Scheepvaartkwartier district every day. A neighborhood known for its nearly 100 national monuments and as one of the richest neighborhoods in the Netherlands. In a few steps from your home you will find top restaurants and museums, you can have a drink in the beautiful historic Veerhaven or relax with friends in the Park. The other Rotterdam pearls are also at your feet. Whether it concerns the Markthal, Museum Quarter, Rotterdam Central or the Wilhelminapier. All hotspots are close by and also easy to reach by public transport and water taxi. Furthermore, the district is car-free and there is no through traffic.

description: My appartment is close to the highway, Erasmus University and within 5-10 minutes of the city centre. It's an modern appartment with a balcony from where you can see the river. The tram to the city center is within 100 meters and will take about 10 minutes to get you to the center of the city. For couples and expads with high standards who need to stay little longer in Rotterdam, this is your go to.
neighborhood_overview: De Esch is a neighbourhood on the outside of the city center. It is peacefull en serene. De advantage is that you don't have the noise of the city center. It's mostly modern appartmentbuildings. The people who live in it are primarely working appartmentowners and students from Erasmus Univesity. There are nice walking routes down the riverside and there is a beautifulll park which will make you relax after a day of work or study.
host_about: I'm a passionate kitesurfer. I work at a vocational school in Rotterdam. I love my homecity and when there's wind you can find me on the beaches of Zeeland and Hoek van Holland.

name: Historic and bright apartment (125m2)
description:
Welcome to our home!

Unwind at this stunning house in the heart of lively Rotterdam. The house was lovingly built with wooden floors, high ceilings and original details for a luxurious yet charming feel.

The house is located in the hip neighborhood of West, with the picturesque Heemraadsingel and the historic Delfshaven just around the corner. Although shops and restaurants are only a five-minute walk away, the area feels peaceful and secluded.

name: Moderne en stijlvolle kamer met een privé badkamer
description:
Our home with private bedroom and bathroom is located in a quiet neighborhood close to the center and the highway. Please note, there is no kitchen. Your private bedroom and bathroom is situated on the 3rd floor of a 1934 property in the characteristic Charlois. The staircase is shared, but otherwise you have complete privacy. The modern bathroom is all the comforts to freshen up after a long day out.

If there are any additional requests, please feel free to let us know.
neighborhood_overview:
It is a quiet old district in Rotterdam Zuid. A pearl and oasis within a busy city. You will be in the city by bike, public transport or car within no time.

It is also a characteristic neighborhood that has an old village center and village church. Narrow streets and bricks in Charlois are a stark contrast to the city's new and high-rise buildings.

name: River ArtHouse - unique apartment with the view
description:
Light, spacious and cozy 1 floor apartment located on the river side with a gorgeous view to the water.
The house contains some original elements, like old marble fire places and has a spacious living room with vintage design furnitures, a sunny bedroom, a modern kitchen and a freshly renovated bathroom.
It is a place with the soul and if you listen carefully, you may hear the stories carried by the seagulls and boats passing by.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in multicultural Delfshaven, few minutes walk to the metro station, the historical Delfshaven neighbourhood and immediate vicinity of public transport that can take you anywhere in the city, various shops, nice restaurants and recreational places. At walking distance there is Van Nelle Fabriek (UNESCO World Heritage Site), Euromastpark, Erasmus Medical Centre, museums and many many more.
Great Food Market at the Visserijplein - 2 times a week (Thurs & Sat) - with vendors for fruit, vegetables, cheese, meat, clothing, shoes & housewares.

If you have any particular interests, just ask, I might have some tips ;)
host_about:
I'm a performing artist based in Rotterdam City. 
My work takes me all over the globe, so travelling is a familiar state of mind.
I enjoy simplicity, good food, quality music and fun conversations :)

name: Bohemian apartment with garden in Rotterdam
description: Welcome to my beautiful and light bohemian home on Noordereiland. An unique space in the heart of Rotterdam . You'll be staying in my 75m2 apartment on the ground floor, including spacious modern kitchen and living room, 2 bedrooms (1x king-size bed, 1x childbed with slide ;) and a bathroom with bath and shower, sunny balcony and 50m2 garden on the south-west. And oh: my worm bin (yes, do my own composting ;).
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is based in the hart of the city on the Noordereiland, an island that lies between the Meuse, right between the three iconic Rotterdam bridges. From the window you can see the river and the big white bridge (Erasmus bridge).

The neighbourhood is a very laid back place in a city that is vibrant and urban, with very nice people (so are my neighbours :). There is little car traffic as people hardly pass the island itself to get somewhere. There is a small Spar supermarket, two coffee and lunchrooms, a pop-up restaurant and several kids playgrounds in the middle of the island.
host_about:
My name is Sabine. I am an entrepreneurial anthropologist, living & working in Rotterdam.  I started my own company in 2015: BlueCity: based in a former swimmingpool in Rotterdam (Tropicana). Its core business involves sustainability and showing what we can do with waste :-)...
And my little son Jan and I have created our own paradise in the city! 

My interests are social entrepreneurship, social innovation, surfing, circle economy, systemic thinking, more, more and ever more sports and (online) large scale interventions & sustainability.

The world is my number one country :-!  But aside from all that, I love to learn! About you, about the world and about your world!
So hope to meet you soon :-)!

name: Midtown Rotterdam Duo Deluxe
description: Stylish and spacious studio for up to 3 people in the center of Rotterdam. There is comfortable double bed, a spacious bathroom with shower, toilet and sink. An extra bed can be placed for a third person. The Hofplein is around the corner and Rotterdam Central Station is 150 meters away. The studio has a kitchen with cooking facilities and a dishwasher.
neighborhood_overview: When you step out the door, you are right in the center of Rotterdam. Nice coffee corners, lunchrooms, restaurants, shops and sights and the well-known Hofplein are right around the corner. The central station is located 150 meters from the accommodation. You can also visit the Markthal within 15 minutes walking distance for some delicious food.
host_about:
We are Natasja and Mylan -  a couple who live in Amsterdam and own several small businesses in the direct area and in Rotterdam.  

We started in 2012 with our B&B -Charming Apartment with Canal View!  In august 2015 we opened a small pension Hotel Midtown Amsterdam. In May 2021 our brend new accomodation in Rotterdam opend. Now we have 4 studio/apartments in Amsterdam and 4 studio/apartements in Rotterdam. We would love to welcome you in both city's! 

We enjoy living in Amsterdam, just 5 minutes from the hotel in Amsterdam. 

Our goal is to offer comfort, good mattresses, privacy, a clean apartment and a good location to access all the main attractions of Amsterdam/Rotterdam culture.

We would like to welcome you and hope to offer more accomodations in the Netherlands in the future.

Wonderfully quiet 2-person apartment right in the bustling Rotterdam west. De Nieuwe Binnenweg is one of the most famous, oldest streets in Rotterdam and also the longest shopping street in the Netherlands!

name: Bel-Etage in the city Center
description: In a building from 1888 the bel-etage is the floor above a raised basement. It's in the most lively part of the city with a great  variety of shops and restaurants out the front door and a green oasis with a balcony at the back. The metro station at just 150m from the front door takes you straight to the beach at Hoek van Holland.
neighborhood_overview: Within 250 meters there’s a huge variety of things that you want nearby: shops, breakfast places, restaurants, cafes, a night shop, the Emergency Room of the Erasmus University Hospital the Depot of the Boijmans Museum and stops of the main lines of the metro, trams and buses. There are four supermarkets and the best vinyl record shops of Europe within 700 meters.
host_about: We love to travel and have done so through over 80 countries mainly over land. In Rotterdam we have a company in the hospitality industry called City Safari in which we invite people to visit the superdiverse Rotterdamers in their homes, houses of worship or civic initiatives. This way we help organizations build their diversity program by actually meeting the people who make up the city in person and we invite individuals to explore the city by meeting these people and going places outside the city center.

Apartment in the nicest neighborhood of Rotterdam!
Bergpolder, between Blijdorp and the Oude Noorden, is an up-and-coming and cozy neighborhood. Within 5-10 minutes by bike you are in the city center.

name: Wikkelboat 2 @ Floating Rotterdam Rijnhaven
description: Staying at one of our Wrap Boats in the Rijnhaven is definitely memorable! In a prime location, located between the metropolitan Head of South and the hip Katendrecht and close to the bustling center. Wrap boats are very comfortable tiny houseboats which are multifunctional and sustainably decorated. Relax, hanging in the double hammock under the porch and/or enjoy the beautiful view around you from your spacious terrace on the water...bet you will be enchanted?
neighborhood_overview: This Wikkelboat is part of the project "Floating Rotterdam", a new initiative in the Rhine Port of Rotterdam. You are literally right next to Rotterdam's nicest cinema, LantarenVenster and have plenty of restaurants and theatres and plenty of water sports nearby. It's not that this is called the new hotspot of Rotterdam. After a beautiful and highly recommended walk across the Erasmus Bridge of 10 minutes, you are in the center of Rotterdam.

name: House on the river!
description:
Atmospheric dike cottage on the river De Rotte!
Very cozy cottage with nice jetty and lovely swimming water in front of the door!

The entire ground floor with living room and kitchen has been renovated with a new wooden floor and sofa which makes the cottage very comfortable and cozy.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is situated in Hillegersberg, a nice and quiet neighbourhood nearby Rotterdam. So especially in the evenings there can't be a lot of noise.
In Hillegersberg there is a small and cosy centre with soms shops and restaurants. The supermarket is also nearby.
In front of the house is a river, which is going to several lakes.
There are also some possibility's to rent a boat.
The centre of rotterdam is 15 minutes drive and the beaches from Den Haag/ Scheveningen till Hoek van Holland are 30/45 minutes drive.
host_about:
We live 100m. from the house ourselves also in front of the River with our 3 lovely daughters. We really like this place to live because it's very quied and relaxing. 
I am working as an interieur architect.

name: Private modern studio, quiet street in city centre
description:
Enjoy our modern and neat studio; the perfect base to discover the city centre of Rotterdam. a 10 minute walk from Rotterdam central station, and 8 minute walk from Erasmus MC. Popular city highlights nearby: Markthal, Erasmus bridge, plenty bars & restaurants, Euromast, old Delfshaven, shopping area, city parks.

The apartment is ground floor, so also very suitable for guests with mobility challenges
neighborhood_overview: Quiet street in city center. Many restaurants, museums, coffee places and bars around to enjoy.
host_about:
We, Laura and Joshua, are a couple living in the city of Rotterdam. During our travels we have often made use of the accomodations offered through Airbnb, which gave us much more than staying in hotels! Now we have the opportunity to be hosts ourselves, offering our studio to people who want to get to know our beautiful city. We live nextdoor to the studio, so if you have any questions, we're just a text message away to help you out :) 

We took care of the renovation and furnishing of the studio ourselves and tried to create a cozy but also stylish appartment. We very much hope you will enjoy your stay at our studio.

name: Spacious apartment on the Binnerotteplein hotspot
description: On the 3th and 4th floor in the city centre of Rotterdam the spacious apartment overviews the Binnerotte with the Laurens Church and the Markethall. It's located behind the ''Meent'', one of the most popular and high end streets of Rotterdam, with shops, restaurants and the best ice shop of Rotterdam. From here it's a 5 minute walk to the train station Blaak where you can take the train to all the other big city's and tourist hotspots. Rotterdam central is a 15 minute walk or 3 tram stops away.
neighborhood_overview:
Our house is located on one of the most popular streets of Rotterdam (de Meent). There are bars, restaurants and shops. The Market hall, Blaak, cube houses and Laurens Church are within walking distance.

On Saturday and Tuesday there is a big outside market on the Binnerotte. In front of our house the terraces are always filled with laughing people even on rainy days. True Rotterdam city life can be experienced here.
host_about: I’m 38 years old and I usually travel with my partner Danny who is 43 years old. We’ve been to many countries and intent to visit a new country every year. We have a baby boy that was born in 2021 so our traveling will change a bit ;)

name: Cocondo
description:
Take a dive under nature in in the first bunker of Cocondo! In Hoek van Holland an old German telephone bunker has been transformed in to a holiday home for two adults and two children.

You will be staying in the nature reserve and national monument ‘Vinetaduin’. Beneath these dunes lie about 70 bunkers that originate from four layers of military history of the 20th century. The telephone bunker lies in the northern part, near the villa district and entrance to the beach.
neighborhood_overview: The town of Hoek van Holland originates from digging the Nieuwe Waterweg in 1872. In the following century, thousands of defenses were built on both banks to defend this new channel. These influences have been decisive in shaping the landscape of ‘the Hook of Holland’. Even today, the Hook is continuously subject to the influence of Rotterdam and the North Sea. If you pay close attention, you will notice this everywhere. A highlight is taking a walk along the Noorderpier or the Zandmotor at Ter heide.
host_about: Originally from Hoek van Holland and co-founder of the Cocondo concept. For the pilotbunker I will be your (online) host if you need any assistance!

name: Idyllisch Tiny House op Boerderij Driebergen
description: An idyllic "Tiny house" in the yard of an extraordinary historic farmhouse located on the Schie in Rotterdam. Wibbine Kien, owner of - and programmer for - this great place has this tiny house - the "pipowagen"  - built to give people the opportunity to enjoy the unique countryside around Rotterdam. The tiny house is located in the middle of an ancient orchard with apple, pear and walnut trees and is the perfect place to unwind.
neighborhood_overview: Overschie is a small, quiet, suburb in Rotterdam. Residents talk about “the village.” The immediate area of the farm is quiet, but should you want to look for the hustle and bustle: the dynamic center of Rotterdam with countless museums, restaurants, and clubs is 8.5 km away. Also the cities of Delft (6 km) and The Hague (14 km) are nearby.

name: Stijlvol appartement Rotterdam
description:
A beautiful, spacious and stylish apartment on the westside of the city centre in Rotterdam.

You will enter the house in a spacious living room with a fully equiped and open kitchen. During the romantic summer nights you can dream away on the little balcony.

Next to the living room there is the spacious master bedroom with a top quality queensize bed. Sleeping in won't be a punishment here.

In the office room you have a large desk for an effective workday and a sofa bed suited for a child.
host_about:
Hello folks!

A few years ago I fell in love with traveling after my trip through South East Asia and after my year abroad in Madrid especially with Spain!

What I love most about Airbnb are the people who rent the places. They make it more than just a place to sleep. They trust you with their own homes which make me really feel at home.

That's exactly what I'm looking for while traveling, not just seeing things, but really get to know people.

name: Chalet "Kick" | near the beach
description:
"Beach house" just 5 minutes from the wide sandy beach of Hoek van Holland, Rotterdam.

We rent from Saturday to Saturday (only whole weeks!)

No pets!

For an unforgettable summer holiday, get a breath of fresh air in the fall or relax in the spring. Hoek van Holland is Rotterdam by the sea and everything is possible there!

It is a wooded area, ideal for cycling to Kijkduin, The Hague, the Maasvlakte... One of the largest ports in the world.
neighborhood_overview: The beachhouse is located on a large holiday park with a soccer field, tennis court, basketball field and a playground. During the summer holiday there are a lot of activities for young and old.
host_about:
Wij stellen ons graag even aan u voor.

Wij een ondernemers familie uit de omgeving van Rotterdam en in 2003 is Kick ons team komen versterken.

Als er een kind in je gezin komt wordt alles anders, vooral het op vakantie gaan. Je moet ineens rekening met alles houden, niet te warm, niet te koud, kinderbadje, tussen de middag slapen, kinderbedje, geen stijl in zee lopend strand, geen rotsen, geen hoge golven... en als de kinderen ouder worden; vermaken zij zich wel? Is er genoeg te doen? Zijn er wel vriendjes? Is er wel eten wat ze lusten?

Wij hebben de eerste jaren daar wel mee geworsteld, want je wilt het zelf ook naar je zin hebben op vakantie... je moet immers je het hele jaar al wegcijferen.

Onze vakantie ervaringen:

We zijn naar een resort in Turkije geweest...
Wij vonden het veel te massaal, heel de dag door buffetten en te ver buiten het stadje. Alle resorts staan in de middle of nowhere zodat je alles binnen het complex moet doen. En niet te vergeten het onvermijdelijke animatie-team die iedere avond een toneelstukje opvoert.

We zijn naar het "kindvriendelijke" Menorca geweest...
Het begon met een overstap op Ibiza (vliegtuig vol Ibiza-gangers die zich doodergeren aan de kinderen), geen strand (moerassig), onverwarmd zwembad (steenkoud) en saai... Het is niet kindvriendelijk..., er zijn alleen heel veel kinderen!

We zijn naar Tenerife (en alle andere Canarische eilanden) geweest...
Na onze ervaringen in Turkije en Menorca wilden we graag een hotel aan een boulevard zodat we 's avonds nog wat konden lopen en wat drinken...het hotel was schitterend, maar zodra je de boulevard op kwam... wat een armoe! Straten kapot, veel leegstand in de winkelruimtes, overal schreeuwende aanbiedingen voor een pint bier voor € 1,-

We zijn naar Club Med geweest (Tunesie en Turkije)...
Slechte accomodaties, wel goed publiek maar het concept dat het personeel  iedere keer bij je aan tafel komt zitten sprak ons niet zo aan.

Toen dachten we, als we nu eens een eigen huis huren met een zwembad in Spanje..., maar waar? Na wat ge (Hidden by Airbnb) kwamen we uit bij Moraira! Dit sprak ons meteen aan... authentiek, geen hoogbouw, niet te toeristisch, vissersplaatsje, jachthaven, veel winkeltjes, restaurantjes en terrassen, zandstrand, in een baai, strand loopt niet stijl in zee, altijd zon (320 dagen van het jaar), nagenoeg geen regen, goede temperatuur, genoeg vermaak in de buurt voor jong en oud, tennisbanen (ons zoontje tennist veel en graag), kortom dit moest het zijn!

Al deze informatie vonden we op de site van Xenofilia, twee Nederlandse broers die vakantiehuizen verhuren en er zelf ook wonen. Een groot huis, Xenofilia I... 4 kamers, 4 badkamers, verwarmd zwembad en een eigen tennisbaan... Dit is het!

Alle opa's en oma's mee en met z'n zevenen naar Spanje. We hebben een geweldige vakantie gehad, en van het plaatsje Moraira was niets gelogen, helmaal naar ons zin! Alles is er luxe afgewerkt, de straten, het meubilair, schitterende rotondes met kunstwerken. Wij hebben echt wel veel gezien, maar dit was fantastisch! Je zou dan aan st. Tropez prijzen gaan denken...niets is minder waar, een wijntje op het strand kost € 2,- en het eten in de restaurantjes en op de terrassen is zeker niet duurder dan in Nederland.

Inmiddels zijn we zo'n 15 keer terug geweest, nog een paar keer in Xenofilia I zonder opa's en oma's maar met een vriendje voor Kick.

Het enige nadeel van een huis is dat je alles met de auto moet doen... boodschappen, naar het strand en de kinderen zitten een beetje opgesloten in en om het huis. Dus, hebben we de laatste paar keren een appartement in het centrum gehuurd. Zo kon onze zoon, inmiddels 11, gewoon zelf naar het strand en weer terug naar het appartement. Ook hoefden we nu geen vriendje meer mee te nemen, er zijn genoeg kinderen op het strand, en daar is altijd zat te doen... Voetballen, volleyballen, vissen, krabbetjes zoeken, snorkelen, tegen de branding in springen en natuurlijk zwemmen. Wij vinden het lekker om als we van het strand komen op het balkon lekker een wijntje te drinken en wat tappaatjes te eten. Daar vind Kick natuurlijk geen bal aan en hij vindt tappas niet lekker. Hij gaat dan een pizza voor zichzelf halen bij de pizzaria 100 meter verder en gaat lekker even op zijn iPad een spelletje spelen. Iedereen blij! 

Wij zijn ook een keer in januari gegaan, en in de voorjaarsvakantie... hoe zou het dan zijn? Nou, ook gewoon 20 graden en zonnig en totaal niet uitgestorven!

Moeten we dan niet kijken of we hier wat kunnen kopen? Maar we hebben zelf geen tijd om vaak te gaan... kunnen we het dan niet verhuren als we zelf niet gaan?

De rest is geschiedenis... dus kom genieten van dit pareltje aan de Costa Blanca en geniet van ons luxe appartement. 

Welkom!

Robert, Joyce en Kick

name: Cosy apartment w/ kingsizebed in citycentre
description:
Hi, welcome! We live in this house for a large part of our time and therefore you immediately feel at home. Everything has been lovingly decorated. Think of beautiful furniture, souvenirs from abroad and a quiet but warm atmosphere.

It is an entire home in the centre of Rotterdam.

The accessibility is top: a 12-minute walk to Rotterdam Central Station, and the tram stops in front of the door.

You will find cozy coffee shops, (wine)bar, restaurants and a supermarket around the corner.
neighborhood_overview: Lively and cozy!
host_about:
Hi! My name is Manissa (33) and I fell in love with Rotterdam about 10 years ago. Since June 2020 I was lucky to be able to buy a beautiful house in the city centre. 

In my free time I love to run and hang out with friends (when the sun is out you can find me on a terrace immediately). I am a huge fan of having breakfast outdoors and exploring new places :-)

Hope you’ll love my house much as I do and hope to welcome you soon!

name: Kleurrijk & sfeervol appartement met werkplek
description: Welcome in this colourful apartment with an open kitchen, comfortable bed (2p), your own office and a garden! I decorated the house with taste and warmth so that you will hopefully immediately feel at home. Around the corner you'll find a delicious Italian restaurant and in Rotterdam North you'll have plenty of places to discover. The train station is only 750meter away and you can easily reach the Rotte, Bergse plas or Kralingse plas within cycling distance. A combination of city and nature!
neighborhood_overview: Liskwartier is an cosy, friendly neighborhood in Rotterdam North with nice restaurants and cultural spots nearby, and you are in the city center in no time. In addition, it is a good base to discover Rotterdam's nature, cycling along the Rotte, or taking  a nice walk in the Bergse Bos or along the Kralingse plas.
host_about:
Hi, 

My name is Hester and I live in Rotterdam. I love to travel, meet new people that enrich every experience and bring unique stories back home. 

I am originally from Rotterdam and since a while I moved back to this great city. I love the down to earth vibe in the city, the ever growing skyline, the wide river in the middle of the city and the parks and forest it has to offer close to my house!

name: Complete woning met tuin in een historische school
description:
A spacious house with garden close to downtown. In a historic school building with a high ceilings, there is a lovely spacious house.
The metro is 5 minutes walk, Katendrecht 10 minutes walk, the Maassilo 2 minutes walk and 2x a week a bustling market around the corner.
The city is nearby, 15 min by bike or 5 min by metro.
A spacious kitchen, two bathrooms and 3 bedrooms so very suitable for a family or group.
In the green garden there is a dining area and a bbq available.

Bedrijvige multicultural neighborhood with a commodity market right around the corner on Wednesdays and Saturdays.

name: Mooi appartement in het hartje van Rotterdam
description:
From this centrally located apartment in the center of Rotterdam, everything is within reach. Located on the Oostplein with a great view over the Rotterdam skyline, everything in the city center is easy to walk to.
With the cube houses and Blaak 300 meters away, you can walk within 5 minutes from the apartment to the city center of Rotterdam.

neighborhood_overview:
Because the apartment is centrally located on the Oostplein in Rotterdam, everything is within walking distance. For example, walk to the historic Oude Haven or the cube houses and the market hall within 5 minutes.

In addition, the apartment is located at a 2-minute walk from the Meuse so you can take a beautiful walk under both the Willemsbrug and Erasmusburg which gives you a unique view of Rotterdam and where you end up in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods of Rotterdam de Veerhaven.

The apartment is also a 2-minute walk from the Hoogkwartier. A bustling and trendy up-and-coming neighborhood full of cute bars and eateries.

name: Spacious apartment close to Central Station
description:
Welcome to our spacious and open apartment with direct sunlight in each room.

Located on a quiet & green street in the beautiful neighbourhood of Liskwartier, this is one of Rotterdam's original buildings with over 100 years of history. The heart of the place is the spacious living room including an open-plan kitchen and a dining table that can fit up to 12 people.

Perfect for work-from-home with 2 separate work stations & fast speed internet, and ideal when traveling with a baby or toddler
neighborhood_overview:
This house is located in the popular Liskwartier, which is characterized by leafy avenues, canals and characteristic old buildings. It is a quiet place to live while the urban amenities are easy to reach. This quiet residential area borders the trendy Oude Noorden, with design shops and restaurants on the Zwaanshals and under the arches of the former Hofplein line. The Vroesenpark, the Kralingse Bos and the Plas are also located nearby.

Located within walking distance of shops, restaurants, public transport and within cycling distance of the center and Central Station. Quick access to highway A20 and A13.
Sufficient parking space in the immediate vicinity and in front of the door.
host_about:
I have lived 5 years in Cape Town, South Africa and have now settled in Europe again. Previously I have rented my apartments in Cape Town and Vienna and now my partner and I also want to welcome guest into our beautiful home in Rotterdam.

I love a good documentary, a great innovative idea or concept and exploring the vintage shops of the city.

description:
We offer our apartment in the center of Rotterdam for rent on Airbnb! Because we normally live here ourselves, it is a fully equipped room, fully equipped.

The location is very convenient: the central station, city center, Markthal and Ahoy are all easily accessible by public transport (trams and buses around the corner). At the end of the street is the Heemraadssingelpark, where many nice cafés are located.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the Het Nieuwe Westen district and part of the Delfshaven district. This district contains a beautiful park (Heemraadssingelpark), two versatile shopping streets (Vierambachtsstraat and Nieuwe Binnenweg) and a number of spacious squares (Heemraadsplein and Mathenesserplein). There are many supermarkets, restaurants and cafes in the neighborhood. The city centre can be reached quickly via the Nieuwe Binnenweg and the 1st Middellandstraat.

name: Lovely apartment near Rotterdam city centre!
description:
The perfect base to explore Rotterdam!
The apartment is close both to city and nature. The apartment is located on the 3rd and 4th floor. On one floor you'll find a bedroom with a kingsize bed, a bathroom and a separate toilet. On the other floor there is the living room with kitchen containing all the tools and a seating area, including sofa bed. From the roof terrace, you look out on the city skyline. This apartment has everything in store to make your stay in Rotterdam a success!
neighborhood_overview:
It is located is in a lively and green neighbourhood with a bakery and a coffee/lunchroom/diner (Regina) on 1 minute walking distance. There is also a compact supermarket (Aldi) nearby. The apartment is close both to city and nature. With tram and bus you are in the city in less than 10 minutes! There is also a beautiful forest (Kralingse bos) on walking distance from the apartment.
From the bedroom and living room at the front you have an unobstructed, green view. From the roof terrace you have a view of the Rotterdam Skyline!
At the end of the street public, open air sports facilities for football, basketball, tennis, jeu de boulle and fitness are available for you.

name: Cozy apartment in historic Delfshaven, Rotterdam
description:
I love to offer you my cozy appartement in historic, multicultural area Delfshaven in Rotterdam. My house will be temporarily your house. So you don't have to share the house with me or other guests. I truly hope you will feel welcome.

Supermarkets, shops metro/bus/ tram station are at a 350-500 meter distance. Within 8 minutes by metro you are at the center of Rotterdam. It's super easy to go to different places in Rotterdam, but also to visit other places like Delft, The Hague, Amsterdam.
neighborhood_overview:
Delfshaven is a melting pot of cultures with a rich history. A picturesque medieval harbour is surrounded by lively shopping streets, trend-setting architecture and creative breeding grounds. Experience the dynamics of the water, the ships and the bridges, discover charming neighbourhood parks, cosy terraces and meet 70,000 residents of 170 nationalities.

And talking about parks. Across my apartment is a small park. Perfect place to have a picnic or a BBQ during spring- and summerdays. Every Thursday and Saturday there is a local market where you can buy fresh vegetables, fruits, fish, nuts etc.

I also live next to a school. Maybe good to realize that around 8.30 am the kids will be brought to school and that they sounds very enthusiastic so see other kids again.
host_about:
Hi there!

Welcome at my page!:)
My name is Mirjam, I'm a Dutchie, in daily life I'm a social worker. In my spare time I love to visit new places, nature, singing, a sucker for good coffee,  going out for walks,  try to play guitar ( with the emphasis on 'try'), do my best to give some love to my plants, like to cook and ofcourse... traveling!

Since I was young I already liked traveling.  I remember my family and I were traveling by campervan. Such a joy we had. I continued traveling when I got older. I've been to countries within Europe, but also outside Europe, like: the US, Indonesia, South Africa, Brazil, Curacaõ, Laoh and Thailand.  I've stayed more than a year in Thailand where I've worked on voluntary base as a counselor. 

When I travel I would like to have that feeling of 'home'. That's why I  love to host and to give my guests that feeling of 'home' as well. 

That feeling of traveling and meeting new people, makes me come alive. 
So why not meeting new people, travelers, in my city Rotterdam?

I hope to get to know you a bit as well:)

10 MIN WALK TO CENTRAL STATION
We love to share one of our floors with people visiting Rotterdam. It's a studio floor with a kitchen & toilet in the living room. Studio room is facing beautiful green canal. Our home is located in the great neighbourhood 'Oude Noorden' with many new nice places. Guest capacity is ifor 2 people with double bed. Bathroom is shared. neighborhood_overview:
Super close to central station 10 min walk away. The location called Oude Noord
'Het Oude Noorden' is the most rising neighbourhood of Rotterdam with many hip cafe & restaurants. You can find super nice cafes with Western & Eastern food and small little pubs & breweries. And it’s surrounded by beautiful green canals. It's a peaceful neighbourhood not too much night noise and not much traffic.
host_about:

We also travel the world via AirBnb and thanks to our good experiences we also decided to share our own place. 
You are more than welcome to our place.

neighborhood_overview:

You can be quick in the middle of the city. Here you can visit the Markthal, ''Kubuswoningen'', Witte de Withstraat and many museums or architectural highlights. If you cycle in the opposite direction you will arrive at the ''Bergse Plassen'' where you can take a lovely walk in nature.

name: Comfortabele dijkwoning aan rand stad en natuur
description:
At first glance, this comfortable dike house looks small on the historic dike located on the Rotterdamse Schie, but conceals a spacious, modern family home.

The house is centrally located on beautiful cycling routes that introduce you to nature or show you the way to Delft or Rotterdam.

Experience the peace and nostalgia of the dike in the old village center and taste the vibrant life in Rotterdam.

Easily accessible by car (free parking), public transport (bus) and bicycle.
neighborhood_overview:
LOCATION
You have a continuous holiday feeling in this comfortable house located on the Rotterdamse Schie. Overschie gives you the feeling of a village in terms of space and greenery, while you are still part of the metropolis of Rotterdam.
Discover the rich history of Overschie, visit Museum Oud Overschie and take a walk through the Overschiese village street and along the Schie on the Delfshavenseweg where our family home is located.

STORES
In Overschie you will not lack amenities, there are several shopping streets with local shops and various supermarkets, among others. Lidl, Plus and the Dirk. Rather go to the bustling heart of Rotterdam, take a bike and in fifteen minutes you can enjoy shopping here, have a drink on a terrace or immerse yourself in the Rotterdam nightlife.

MUSEUM
Museum Overschie is that hidden gem in the old village, the rich cultural-historical area of ​​Rotterdam. In this surprising and versatile museum you can experie
host_about:
Wij, Joey en Linda, wonen met veel plezier in ons prachtige huis aan de Schie. Het beste van beiden werelden zeggen we vaak tegen elkaar; op fietsafstand van onze geliefde stad Rotterdam en aan de andere kant de rust en ruimte van het dorp, wonen aan het water aan de rand van de natuur.

Zomers verblijven wij op onze Volkstuin op steenworp afstand van onze woning. Hier genieten we door te tuinieren, te klussen en te relaxen midden in het groen.

name: Nice & cozy place near Rotterdam center!
description:
Welcome to our apartment near the center of Rotterdam.

The apartment is on the 3rd floor (no elevator) of a quiet building in a nice and multicultural neighborhood. The city center is within 7 min by tram or a nice 20 min stroll.

Two bedroom apartment, max three adults. Kitchen with dishwasher, very comfortable beds and a (rain)shower.

Be aware! Parties, events and receiving non-paying guests is absolutely not allowed!

On request and availability we provide parking for €15 a day.

We are a couple living in Rotterdam.
In our spare time we love to travel, cook and explore restaurants in our own city and the rest of the country.

We love to host guests and help them having a wonderful time exploring the neighborhood and the city center.

name: Studio floor with own kitchen & toilet - central
description:
10MIN WALK FROM CENTRAL.
We have 2 floor apartment and we are renting out our upstairs which is a complete studio.
Our flat is located 10 min walk away from Rotterdam central station in front of a peaceful canal.
The studio is 25 sqm & located upstairs and entrance is through the changing room. Upstairs toilet has it’s own kitchen at right handside & private toilet. There is king size double bed and TV (with chromecast) in the bedroom, and desk & chair and also wardrobe area.
neighborhood_overview:
Super close to central station 10 min walk away. The location called Oude Noord
'Het Oude Noorden' is the most rising neighbourhood of Rotterdam with many hip cafe & restaurants. You can find super nice cafes with Western & Eastern food and small little pubs & breweries. And it’s surrounded by beautiful green canals. It's a peaceful neighbourhood not too much night noise and not much traffic.
host_about:
We are a young couple living in Rotterdam both working in corporate. I am Turkish and my boyfriend is Dutch, we are hospitable & clean couple. We love sharing our place & meeting with new people. We also travel the world via AirBnb and thanks to our good experiences we also decided to share our own place. 
You are more than welcome to our place.

name: Creatieve woning tussen bos en stad
description:
This beautiful house (150 m2) was completely refurbished in 2017 and is beautifully centrally located, 5 minutes by bike from the city center and 3 minutes by bike from the Kralingse Bos.

The tasteful decor and spacious layout give the house a very spacious and free feeling and the green city garden (30 m2) is a nice relaxing place.

The yellow front doors and green facade planting will ensure a cheerful entry. Had a long day? Take a bath!
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in a cosy street, with nice neighbours, in a very relaxed and safe neighbourhood. From monday-saturday you can buy fresh bread around the corner, there's a coffee/lunch bar around the corner and a supermarket right behind our house.

In a 5 minute walk you can find the 'Zwaanshals', which is a creative and colourfull shopping street with small (vintage) shops.

name: Cozy and light apartment close to city centre
description:
Planning to come to Rotterdam for a couple of days? Welcome in our cozy apartment!

The apartment is situated in a neat 1950's flat on the border of the city centre in Noord, with a train station and tram stop nearby, aswell as grocery shops and restaurants at walking distance.
It is a 4th floor apartment without elevator, but once you enter it's a great place to relax. Quiet, light, comfy and stylish.

It has a decent size kitchen, a spacious terrace, a kingsize bed and a great shower.
host_about:
Hi my name is Johan, I'm 44 and have been living in Rotterdam for 21 years now. I love living in this city, but I also love to travel and see other places. What I enjoy most in hosting is to meet people from all around the world and make them feel at home.
I'm a parttime social worker and parttime gardendesigner. I hope to welcome you soon in my cozy apartment. 
Nice to meet you!

Contribute to Rotterdam’s biodiversity!

Stan & team

name: Renewed Private No-Smoking bedroom in Delfshaven
description: Book now for comfort & warm hospitality in our LGBTQI+ 🏳️‍🌈 friendly No-Smoking and Drugs-Free Airbnb. Located in a charming setting that seamlessly blends history & urbanization, our cozy retreat is surrounded by an array of shops, restaurants, supermarkets, bakeries and bars. Capture delightful moments as you explore the picturesque streets & enjoy the convenience of being in close proximity to downtown Rotterdam. 🏙️ Seeking relaxation or adventure? Our peaceful sanctuary awaits!
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood offers tranquil environment and has a moderate safety rating. However, it is advisable to remain vigilant against pickpocketing, especially in crowded outdoor areas and public transportation like the metro.

Historic Delfshaven . . . . . . . . . 1 minute🚶🏻‍♂️
Downtown of Delfshaven . . . 2 minute🚶🏻‍♂️
Downtown of Rotterdam . . . .7 min 🚇 or 30 min🚶🏻‍♂️

Nice pictures can be captured in the historic part of Delfshaven, which still has old remaining buildings that go back as far as the 13th century.

The main street (Schiedamseweg) has a lot to offer, supermarkets, night shops, low-range($) restaurants, "brown" cafes.

Rotterdam also offers Free Walking tours which I'd recommend if you’re interested to know more about Rotterdam, its history and its hidden gems. Offered in multiple languages and usually very quick availability.
host_about:
I am 27, gay, love traveling, and getting to know other people’s cultures with an open mind and heart. I have been hosting nearly 2 years on Airbnb now.

"Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, humanity cannot survive." - Dalai Lama

My hobbies/passions are: playing guitar, bikes, languages, clubbing, cooking, playing Xbox and mark as many countries and places possible on Skratch :D

Very quiet, but great located 108m2 apartment to yourself, with 2 Bedrooms that have double beds. Also, a separate working room and a fully equipped kitchen. The Apartment is on 2 floors, with each having a balcony and a toilet.

About 12 minutes walk to Rotterdam Centraal and 3 minutes walk to the tram. There are several supermarkets, drugstores, bakeries, restaurants, a night shop and pharmacy, all around the corner.

Please note, it is on the third floor with no lift and steep stairs.

name: Bergpolder House - with patio
description:
This house offers you everything you need.

A nice air conditioning, to keep the sleeping area cool, design furniture and a big 8k Samsung television.

Kitchen is fully furnished to provide you with luxury. For example, there is a cooker to immediately make a nice bowl of tea, a luxury coffee maker and various other extras.

All equipment is from Atag.

The house is equipped with 3 balconies, so you can always drink your cup of coffee or tea in the sun.

2 bedrooms for up to 4 persons
neighborhood_overview:
The Bergpolder has a lot to offer, it is located in a bustling part of the city with lots of greenery and parks nearby.

There are nice coffee bars, lunch/breakfast bars and great restaurants.

It is a 20-minute walk from the city centre and a 15-minute walk from Central Station.
host_about:
My name is max Koetsenruijter, my girlfriends name is Hilde. 

We have 2 amazing boys one of 2 and one of 1 year old. 

I’m a maritime engineer and hilde is working in art/design industry. 

We both love the beach, the sea, to travel and go around in the world. 

We own some property’s which we rent out so now and then on Airbnb, so feel free to see the reviews. 

Feel free to ask us everything you would like.

name: Spacious and relaxing apartment in Rotterdam
description: Welcome to our cozy home! It's a modernised 1930's apartment with a lot of character, art and quirky details. With 3 floors our home is quite spacious (120 square meter) and it breathes a calm and relaxing atmosphere due to our minimalist but colourful style. You will love cooking in our fully equipped wooden kitchen. While you cook its very tempting for others to join you at the 'bar' side of the kitchen island.
neighborhood_overview: We live in the heart of the cute neighbourhood Oud-Charlois, which is a stones-throw away from the large Zuiderpark, Zuidplein with a huge indoor swimming pool, a theatre and a mall and Ahoy for concerts. We are also close to the 'Maastunnel' which is accessible for both bikes, cars and pedestrians which connects our part of Rotterdam (South) to the centre of Rotterdam. The neighbourhood is friendly and residential. We love and appreciate (after living in noisy streets) how quiet it is here!

name: Mooi Appartement in Rotterdam
description: This stylish and spacious apartment in a beautiful mansion from 1904 offers enough space for 4 adults and two little ones. At the rear is a cozy covered veranda. The spacious living room consists of a front room with sitting area and a dining room with a large table and kitchen that is fully equipped. Upstairs are the bathroom with shower and bath, and 2 spacious bedrooms with double beds and a baby room. Public transport Tram and train in front of the door.
neighborhood_overview: Hillegersberg-Zuid is centrally located and adjacent to a water area. The Kleiwegkwartier, the western part of Hillegersberg-Zuid, generally has an urban character with some large connecting roads. Many homes date back to the 1920 ’s. The north side homes are generally luxurious. The Rotterdam Noord train station is a 1-minute walk away, and the tram towards the city center is also literally in front of the door. Several supermarkets and nice restaurants within walking distance.

name: Spacious, trendy private apartment with 2 bedrooms
description:
Feel welcome in our complete and spacious apartment, nicely located with trendy contemporary interior design. We have one large living room with connected kitchen, two bedrooms and two balconies with midday and evening sun.

The apartment is located in Oude Noorden. 15 minutes walking to Coolsingel in the city centre or to Rotterdam Central Station.

Several nice stores and cafes can be found nearby. Every Saturday there is a fun market on Noordplein with lots of food. Check our guides for more!
neighborhood_overview:
Noordsingel and the river Rotte are around the corner. Fancy cafes like Mecca, Snoei, and Containerbar Noord, but also classic pubs, are close by. Cafes have lots of space for terraces to enjoy the sun.

You’re close to shops and supermarkets on the Zwart Jan Straat and Eudokiaplein. Vintage shopping street Zwaanshals is also on walking distance.

description:
Modern apartment (rennovated in 2022), in one of the nicest quiet neighborhoods in Rotterdam
Modern kitchen with bar, dinner table, living room with large couch & tv
Balcony on the south with lots of sun in the summer
Large bed comfortable bed (2x2m) & TV in bedroom

500m from train station Rotterdam Noord & tram
13 min bike ride/20 min tram ride to the city center
Close to plenty of cool places in the North of Rotterdam
Walking distance to river & a lake/nature
On the 2nd floor - no elevator
neighborhood_overview: Hilligersberg is one of the most beautiful neighborhoods in Rotterdam. Quite quietly located, beautiful houses and a lot of greenery but also close to the center. The apartment is close to the clay road: here you will find an Albert Heijn, restaurants, nice shops. At the end of the street, the river is rotten, which you can follow towards the North for a nice walk around the Bergse Plassen. In the summer, you may also rent a boat here. Plenty to do!

name: Stijlvolle woning in populaire wijk Blijdorp.
description: In the popular Blijdorp district, within walking distance of the city center, Tiergaardde Blijdorp and the beloved Vroesenpark, lies this tastefully decorated house that has been recently renovated. On the 1st floor of this duplex house is the living room, which is adjacent to the open kitchen with many desired amenities. Here is also the 1st bedroom incl. bunk bed for 1 adults or 2 kids. Upstairs are the bathroom and again two bedrooms, one of which is adjacent to the beautiful roof terrace.
neighborhood_overview: Blijdorp is one of the most beautiful areas of Rottedam. Downtown Rotterdam is close by, and many other amenities are right around the corner: the beautiful swimming pool "Van Manenbad", zoo "Diergaarde Blijdorp", tennis park Blijdorp, the Vroesenpark with the "Vroesenpaviljoen" where you can have a nice lunch and breakfast, ice cream parlor "Di Gelato" with the most delicious ice cream flavors and a lot of nice cafes and restaurants with a diverse offer. In the neighborhood, you'll find old and young, from families to students and starters to retirees. In spring and summer, the neighbors meet at the Statensingel or in the Vroesenpark to barbecue or sit and have a drink along the water. Supermarkets, snack bars, old-fashioned and modern pubs, secondhand shops and so on...in Blijdorp you have them all. Blijdorp is just very nice and definitely worth visiting!

6 person apartment in center of Rotterdam on a more than 100 years old cargo ship. This is unique!!! The location is very quiet at night, but still spot on. Next to the famous Erasmus bridge. Just 5 minutes walking to the center of town. This apartment is very nice for families and small groups who want something special. Big living room with fully equipped kitchen and dining table. Heat up the fire in the winter and enjoy this warm and cosy ship.

This boat has two sleepingrooms with each three beds. There is also a sofacouch in case you prefer to sleep alone. The big livingroom has a fully equipped kitchen and and a cosy fireplace. You can sit with max. 8 people at the diningtable. Ideal for families or big groups. Families with 2 kids or more can stay with a maximum of 8 people, but only on request.

name: Historisch zeilschip Luciana
description:
In the heart of Rotterdam, in the shipping district, overlooking Erasmus bridge, the Maas and the most beautiful skyline in the Netherlands, you will find this unique, cozy sailing ship.
In the summer, she is' under sail 'at sea, but in the winter, she accommodates cozy groups in her home harbor.
The water taxi has a boarding spot right next door and shops, best restaurants and nightlife are in walking distance.
We have 22 sleeping places aboard so for groups this accommodation is ideal.
neighborhood_overview:
Luciana is located in the Veerhaven in the Scheepsvaartkwartier. This romantic piece of town is a protected cityscape with stately mansions of classic avenues that make Rotterdam's rich shipping history live on. One of the most beautiful places is the Veerhaven, where historic sailing ships gently on the water. It is not only a very picturesque neighborhood with a lot of history, also if you like a glass of wine and good food you are in the right place.
The neighborhood is located in the heart of Rotterdam, close to many beautiful museums. Arts and Culture lovers can get to their heart's content in Rotterdam. But you are also great for other activities here. The Euromast is really just around the corner. And would you prefer to shop, visit to the famous Markthal, or go out? This is all within walking distance too!
host_about:
Ik ben Hieke en woon samen met mijn man Xander in het Friese Oudehaske (nabij Heerenveen). Samen hebben we 6 kinderen die ondertussen bijna allemaal de deur al uit zijn. We hebben er nog twee thuis wonen. 

Sinds kort zijn wij de heel erg trotse eigenaar van het prachtige historische zeilschip 'Luciana' waarmee we heerlijke avonturen hopen te gaan beleven.

Haar thuishaven is Rotterdam en daar zal zij in de wintermaanden liggen. Wijzelf zullen daar ook geregeld te vinden zijn maar uw gastheer zal meestal Pieter zijn.

Pieter Boot woont met zijn gezin nabij de te verhuren zeilschepen 'Luciana', 'Catherina' en 'Marie Galante' in de Veerhaven op zijn woon/vergaderschip de 'Schoneveld'. 
Bij een verblijf op een schip gaat veiligheid voor alles en dus is Pieter dag en nacht mobiel bereikbaar. 
En zijn levensmotto is dat wat hij in werktijd mag doen zijn hobby is! 

Voor mij geldt dat ik dol ben op water, de natuur, dieren, rust en de ruimte. Ook hou ik van (buiten) sporten; ik ben in mijn element op het water maar ook in de sneeuw of op het ijs, op de mountainbike of hikend in de natuur met mijn hond. 
En uiteraard hou ik ook van gezelligheid!! Ik hoop u dan ook te ontmoeten in Rotterdam!

name: Spacious luxury home in city center neighborhood
description: Welcome to our beautiful and spacious house, located in the heart of Rotterdam on a charming and cobbled street that is surrounded by historic houses dating back to the 1700s and 1800s. Recently renovated with love and attention to detail, our home offers the perfect combination of modern amenities and historic charm. Major attractions are easily reachable by foot, by tram (next door), or by bike.
neighborhood_overview: The Oude Noorden is full of surprises and with its urban hotspots hip, hipper, hippest! Streets such as Zwaanshals and Zaagmolenkade have a great range of fashion, food and design and thanks to the many catering establishments you can discover something new every evening. From special bistros, restaurants and coffee shops to your own beer brewery: there is something for everyone. Oude Noorden has several squares where events are regularly organized, such as the Rotterdam Harvest Market on Noordplein and sports and games facilities on Johan Idaplein. The Hofbogen, full of creative entrepreneurs, is also nearby. With a roof of 1.9 km long, the Luchtpark de Hofbogen is a unique experience for lounging in the open air. You don't have to look for green for long with the proximity of the Kralingse Bos and the banks of the Rotte. The house is close to supermarkets, schools and nurseries. Moreover, the city center is nearby (10 minutes by bike) and public transport (Rotterdam Noord station, tr
host_about:
Good day!✌️

I am a passionate traveler and Airbnb guest/superhost, having been in the industry for years. I understand the importance of a great experience for both myself and my hosts and strive to make my stays as comfortable, clean, and accurate as possible. Originally from the Netherlands, I have lived in several countries including Australia, the United Kingdom, South Africa, the United States, and Argentina, and now call Copenhagen, Denmark my home. 

When it comes to travel, I love to experience different cultures and local lifestyles, and I truly appreciate the conversations and interactions I get to have with hosts and other guests. I am not very needy, but I do expect the accommodation to be as described. In my free time, I enjoy photography, scuba diving, aviation and cultural visits. neighborhood_overview:
Blijdorp is one of the best locations in Rotterdam.

The city centre is 15-17 min walk.

The train station Rotterdam Centraal is 10-12 min walk. From Rotterdam Centraal station, it’s a 26 min train to Schiphol and a 41 min train to Amsterdam Centraal Station.

The metro station Blijdorp is just 150 meters from the house, 2 min walk.

Several supermarkets, canals (Statensingel and Heemraadssingel) and Vroesenpark, are all on just minutes walking distance.

name: Spacious art room with bay window
description: You are welcome to the house in the great location in Rotterdam West! I have a lovely atmospheric room with a sofa bed (181*105) with extra matras for your  comfortable sleep. Shared bathroom, toilet and equipped kitchen are on the 1st floor.  I live on the 3d floor. The house is in a quiet street, thus you have a good rest. Also, the house has 1GB fast fiber internet.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the New West, which was designed in the early 20th century by Gerrit de Jongh. All city centre main tourist points, restaurants and bars are accessible within 5-10 minutes cycling. I can share with you my second bike or help you to rent your own.
A neighborhood is a mix of stately and wide streets with canals interspersed with less busy streets. The central position that the New West occupies is also a huge plus. You are right behind the parks and if you walk through them or use the small ferry, you will already be at the door of Diergaarde Blijdorp. The green character of the New West is also reflected in 'de Spoortuin'. Here local residents maintain a piece of wilderness with beautiful flowers and plants.
Around the corner from the apartment you will find various shops, restaurants, entertainment and cultural entertainment. The center is nearby and there is more than enough to experience in a metropolis.
host_about:
It’s always fascinates me to meet new people from different parts of the world! 
Short about myself - I work full time, do yoga and fitness, love reading books and of course watching tv series ☺️

name: Zonnige en ruime maisonnette in kunstenaarswijk
description:
Accommodation close to AHOY!
Enjoy Rotterdam in this spacious, relaxing accommodation.

In this old artist district you will find my maisonette home. Rotterdam is a beautiful city and from Oud-Charlois you can easily explore the area and the city by bike or public transport about 20-30 minutes away. Nearby (within walking distance) you will find small studios, a working mill, petting zoo and organic lunch tents. Ahoy is +-5 minutes away (bike/bus).
neighborhood_overview:
The former village of Charlois forms the charming historical core of the Oud-Charlois district. The neighborhood is bordered by the Nieuwe Maas in the north, the Dorpsweg to the east, the Kromme Zandweg in the south and the Waalhaven to the west.
The power of Oud-Charlois is in the characterful and green environment and in the passionate residents. Today, the neighborhood is home to over 150 artists and creative entrepreneurs.
Within walking distance, you'll find a working mill, petting zoo, organic lunch tents, and studios by local artists.
Note: the apartment is 20 minutes by bike or 25-30 minutes from the city center by public transport.
host_about:
Hi,
Ik ben Celine, 31. Woon en werk in Rotterdam, Nederland. 
Ik werk in de kunst / cultuur sector en ben bezig met mijn Master Sociologie.

Crooswijk is an authentic, real Rotterdam neighborhood, on the outskirts of downtown. Within 5 minutes walk you are in the nice Rotterdam North and within 10 minutes in the center. There is a supermarket within walking distance.
host_about:
Hi,

I am Joost, I live in Rotterdam and I love to travel and explore the world for work as for pleasure. That's why I can sometimes rent out my cosy apartment in the centre of Rotterdam. Throughout my travelling career I have always used Rotterdam as my base. This is the city where I grew up, studied and most of my family & friends live whom I meet up with for dinner & drinks in the weekend. I hope you will enjoy Rotterdam as much I do. The city has a great vibe with lots of contemporary architectonical buildings and cool bars. In the street of my apartment are many bars and restaurants to be found. I hope you will enjoy yourself. 

Cheers,
Joost

description: In this centrally located and stylish city apartment, everything for your family is at your fingertips. Rotterdam Zoo (Diergaarde Blijdorp) is a 10-minute walk away. In front of the door you can park for free(!) for free. We are just off the A13, so you are also by car in Delft (20 minutes) The Hague (35 minutes) or Amsterdam (1 hour).

name: Apartment Heart of Rotterdam
description:
Would you like to be in the lively city center of Rotterdam? Then this 3-room apartment is located in the heart of Rotterdam for you.
The home has been totally renovated in 2023 with new furnishings with quality design and solid equipment. Stylish and comfortable.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is quiet but in the center of Rotterdam. You will experience the lusts of the city but not the burdens.
Close to metro station Oostplein, the Hoogstraat, market hall and supermarkets in the area. With its hip shops and trendy bars on the Meent, binnerotte, everything is within walking distance.
host_about: As a resident of the Van Vollenhovenkwartier, you can enjoy the grandeur of the monumental Het Scheepvaartkwartier district every day. A neighborhood known for its nearly 100 national monuments and as one of the richest neighborhoods in the Netherlands. In a few steps from your home you will find top restaurants and museums, you can have a drink in the beautiful historic Veerhaven or relax with friends in the Park. The other Rotterdam pearls are also at your feet. Whether it concerns the Markthal, Museum Quarter, Rotterdam Central or the Wilhelminapier. All hotspots are close by and also easy to reach by public transport and water taxi. Furthermore, the district is car-free and there is no through traffic.

neighborhood_overview:
The Tour de France Femmes 2024 starts on Monday, August 12 with an opening stage from Rotterdam to The Hague. The sprinters in our political capital smell their chance to conquer the Tour's first yellow sweater. A day later, the riders run two stages on the same day.


TOUR DE FRANCE FEMMES

TOUR DE FRANCE FEMMES | EVEN MORE PRESS ON DEMI VOLLERING WITH TRAIL ON

First, there is a flat drive from Dordrecht back to Rotterdam. That same day, the peloton completes a time trial of 6.3 kilometers in the Dutch port city. The trail is almost identical to the time trial of the Tour in 2010 and takes the riders along the Erasmus bridge, the Coolsingel and the Willems bridge.

name: Charming townhouse/loft near the city center
description: A beautiful, charming, and spacious townhouse of 130m2 in the picturesque Old Charlois. The high ceilings and tall windows create a sense of space and brightness. Moreover, within 5 minutes through the Maastunnel, you find yourself on the other side of the city, enjoying the city center. If you're looking for a cozy, inviting, and roomy home to truly feel at home, feel free to get in touch
neighborhood_overview:
Oud-Charlois, a historic neighborhood in Rotterdam, exudes a unique atmosphere that reaches far into the past. This charming area, located on the south side of the Maas River, offers a mix of historical architecture, green squares, and a lively community. Within 10 minutes, you can reach the most exciting area of Rotterdam city center.

One of the special features of Oud-Charlois is the beautiful Zuiderpark, a green oasis in the heart of the neighborhood. Here, residents can enjoy relaxing walks, picnics on the grass, and various cultural events. The park provides a welcome escape from the hustle and bustle of the city, making it a beloved spot for both the young and old.

Public transportation in Oud-Charlois is excellent, with good connections to the city center and surrounding neighborhoods.

name: Unique private studio in city centre.
description:
This stylish design studio is furnished with a unique combination of furniture and colors. The room has a tall ceiling with beautiful original ornaments.
The studio is located in a historic townhouse and is located behind Central Station (a 7-minute walk) and is the perfect base for exploring Rotterdam!
Door-to-door you can reach Ahoy within 25 minutes by metro with a direct connection.
neighborhood_overview: The Proveniers district is currently one of the nicest and most popular districts in the city, and the Provenierssingel is perhaps the most beautiful street in the neighborhood. Within walking distance are nice espresso bars, restaurants and of course the Central Station.
host_about:
Hi, we are Carmen and Marcus! 
Oh how we love our city Rotterdam. It is the only city in the Netherlands with a metropool feel. However, this city also has beautiful old areas.
We love art and design. Our house is filled with colourful art and design furniture. Not one wall is painted white! 
And we love food... Good food! I made a sport out of it to find the very best restaurants everywhere we go. Check out my Restaurant Guide for Rotterdam!

name: Room in luxury home in city center neighborhood
description: Welcome to our beautiful and spacious house, located in the heart of Rotterdam on a charming and cobbled street that is surrounded by historic houses dating back to the 1700s and 1800s. host_about:
Good day!✌️

I am a passionate traveler and Airbnb guest/superhost, having been in the industry for years. I understand the importance of a great experience for both myself and my hosts and strive to make my stays as comfortable, clean, and accurate as possible. Originally from the Netherlands, I have lived in several countries including Australia, the United Kingdom, South Africa, the United States, and Argentina, and now call Copenhagen, Denmark my home. 

When it comes to travel, I love to experience different cultures and local lifestyles, and I truly appreciate the conversations and interactions I get to have with hosts and other guests. I am not very needy, but I do expect the accommodation to be as described. In my free time, I enjoy photography, scuba diving, aviation and cultural visits. I'm also an efficient traveler, so I won't be spending all my time in the accommodation.

Moreover, within 15 minutes walk you can find the park with a famous lake (where you can swim during the sunny days), a kids swimming pool, little animal farm, a deer farm, in forest climbing activities, great barbecue and picnic zones.

Our lovely, old and authentic house is very light, has high ceilings, a big garden, where you can sit in the sun from late morning untill evening. The bedroom and bathroom are on garden level and very quiet and comfortable!

Hotel Milano has been a household name in Rotterdam since 1950. The family hotel is known for real Rotterdam hospitality for a fair price. We are happy to make it easy for you. You will stay in one of the spacious rooms with an extensive breakfast buffet in the morning, included in the price.

name: Cozy family home in trendy neighbourhood
description: In this centrally located accommodation everything is within reach for you and your family or friends. Our home is cozy, practical and no nonsense.
neighborhood_overview: We adore the neighborhood we live in. It has a cosy and communal vibe, but at the same time breathes the cosmopolitanism and vibrancy of Rotterdam. On Saturdays there is a lovely organic farmer's market at Noordplein (5 minutes walk). The river 'de Rotte' is a 2 minute walk and leads you to some beautiful green spots in the city. At Zwart Janstraat (2 min walk) you find everything you need in terms of groceries, little supermarket, fresh bread, nuts, lovely Moroccan breakfasts and more. At Zwaanshals (1 min walk) you find some of the most interesting and creative stores in Rotterdam, as well as various lovely second hand clothes shops. The house is close to various cafés like Tom's coffee, Hopper, Bonza and all-day breakfast at Wolly. Restaurants are also well-represented in the neighborhood ranging from the hip and delicious middle-Eastern Mecca to Spanish tapas at Destino, Italian delicacies at Mangiare, top (and relatively cheap) pizzas from Salerno.
host_about: Belgian/Dutch couple with Zambian/Portuguese roots. Temwa is a sociologist and house father for our two small children. Temwa is a surf/skate enthousiast and loves 60s and 70s rock 'n roll. As a host he is friendly, welcoming and delicate. His partner Melissa is an anthropologist and works as assistant professor at University.

name: The cat & the kettle
description:
Adjacent to a balcony with birdsong, this sunny, spacious room provides calming comfort in the vicinity of all the liveliness Rotterdam has to offer. It is situated on the fourth floor of an apartment complex at the beginning of the town's longest shopping street, only a ten-minute walk from the central station.
There is no elevator, just a stairway. In the apartment lives a cat.
neighborhood_overview:
Lots of hospitality businesses, music venues, visual art institutes and shops, a few museums and cinemas, and the municipal theatre are all just a stone's throw away from the room. If you want to go further, you can easily hop on a tram in front of the complex, a metro just around the corner, a train at the nearby central station or a bus.
Bordering the CBD (and the area that was bombed during WW II), this neighbourhood is very residential by nature. I dare say it's the most lively neighbourhood outside the CBD in Rotterdam.

neighborhood_overview: The Witte de Withkwartier is the beating heart of the Rotterdam art scene and known for its sparkling nightlife. Because the Witte de Withstraat connects the Museumpark and the Maritime Museum, it is called the Rotterdam Art Axe. Erasmus Bridge, Euromast, Spido and the most beautiful part of Rotterdam; the Veerhaven and the Park are within walking distance.

Charming apartment in Kralingen, Rotterdam. Ground floor living space with bamboo garden at rear.

House was built in early 1900s, giving it style and character. Quiet and safe street with abundant amenities and transport links nearby.

name: Stunning Renovated Apartment (1st floor)
description: Welcome to your dream home in the heart of Rotterdam! This exquisite apartment, located in the most sought-after street in the city, offers the perfect blend of modern comfort and elegant design. With two toilets, a spacious living room, a luxurious bathroom, a cozy sleeping room, and a fully equipped kitchen, this apartment is the epitome of contemporary living.
neighborhood_overview:
Location and Nearby Attractions:

This apartment boasts an enviable location with everything Rotterdam has to offer just a stone's throw away. Immerse yourself in the vibrant nightlife on the most popular bar street in the city, mere steps from your doorstep. Enjoy the convenience of walking to every corner of the city, with fantastic restaurants, cozy cafes, and cultural hotspots within a 50-meter radius. And for burger lovers, the best burger restaurant in the Netherlands is a mere 100 meters away, promising a delightful culinary experience.

Cultural Gems and City Essentials:

Discover the city's rich cultural heritage with the renowned Booijmans museum close by. Hop on the Water taxi, located conveniently nearby, for an exciting journey to the breathtaking windmills of Kinderdijk. The Cityhall is just an 8-minute walk away, adding a touch of historic grandeur to the neighborhood.

Convenient Transportation:

Getting around Rotterdam

name: Urban city apartment [free parking available]
description:
Located in the urban and popular “old North” you will find this apartment.
Coffeebars, restaurants and shops on your doorstep, as well as tram 4&8 (4 stops to Central Station)

You can walk past the boutique shops, along the Rotte river towards the main center (de Meent) in about 20 minutes. Or 5 minutes in the bike.

Lakes and woods are also nearby for you to enjoy a walk or jog.

A car parking is available for 15 eu a day (normal parking is daily from 9-23 o’clock for 6€)
neighborhood_overview:
It’s a desired neighbourhood with bars, breakfast spots, supermarkets and more around.
The Rotterdam highline is a 5 minute walk (hofbogen). Also if you are into running; many runningroutes towards the lakes are a good option from here.
host_about:
38, living in Rotterdam with the fam.

I like travelling to ''exotic'' places, such as Japan, Mongolia, China, but also the closer destinations, such as Spain and Italy.
I travel together with my partner, and our 2 kids 10&7 yrs old.

Other than travelling, i like to exercise; basketball, running, cross fit.

We are quite easy going, and like to use our common sense :)
We like to explore things on our own, and see where we end up being.

name: Vintage modern, spacious apartment. Amazing view!
description:
Escape to our charming third floor, 80m2 apartment nestled on a green street lined with huge trees 🌳

Unwind in its cozy ambiance, perfect for relaxation, cooking, yoga sessions🧘‍♀️, and productive remote work.

Drink your sunrise coffee ☕️ while gazing at boats against Rotterdam's skyline. And enjoy sunlit lunches and dinners beneath the trees.

And enough to discover around the house! Stroll to trendy natural wine bars🍷, classic brown cafes, and indulge in the city's finest Neapolitan pizza.
neighborhood_overview:
Navigating our neighborhood is a breeze, offering you convenient access to various attractions and amenities. While our house is a leisurely 25-minute walk from Rotterdam Central Station 🚂, there are efficient transportation options to make your journey even smoother.

The tram lines 🚃 24 or 23 present a quick alternative, getting you to the Delfshaven tram stop or the Mathenesserbrug stop in just 15 minutes. A brief 4 to 5-minute stroll from there will bring you to our doorstep. Additionally, the metro system is easily accessible, whisking you to the city center in a mere 8 minutes.

When it comes to dining and entertainment, you're spoiled for choice. A mere 3-minute walk lands you in historic Delfshaven, home to a variety of exceptional bars and eateries. One such gem is Café de Sluis, a cozy brown café with friendly bartenders and reasonable beer prices 🍻. The Pelgrim is another highlight, boasting its own brewed beers. description:
This stylish design home is furnished with a unique combination of furniture and colors. The apartment has high ceilings with beautiful original ornaments.
The house is located in a historic townhouse and is located behind Central Station (7 minutes walking distance) and is the perfect base for exploring Rotterdam!
neighborhood_overview: The Provenierswijk is currently one of the nicest and most popular neighbourhoods in the city and the Provenierssingel is perhaps the most beautiful street in the neighbourhood. There are nice espresso bars, restaurants and the Central Station within walking distance.
host_about:
Hi, we are Carmen and Marcus! 
Oh how we love our city Rotterdam. It is the only city in the Netherlands with a metropool feel. However, this city also has beautiful old areas.
We love art and design. Our house is filled with colourful art and design furniture. Not one wall is painted white! 
And we love food... Good food! I made a sport out of it to find the very best restaurants everywhere we go. Check out my Restaurant Guide for Rotterdam!

name: Cosy apartment in Rotterdam West-Center
description:
Lovely & calm apartment in Rotterdam West-Center and in front of the river.
You can enjoy a lovely view of the canal or the gardens from the balcony. Nice spot for a run around the river, rent a boat (Kaptein company), or go to the beach directly with the new metro in 30mn!
A cat lives in the apartment (not for allergic people)
neighborhood_overview:
Rotterdam West-center offers various to do:
-with the old neighbourhood Delsfhaven (the only part of Rotterdam still authentic before the bombing of WWII), where you can enjoy coffee and restaurants, yoga, or rent easily a boat for a tour of the river (I recommend a nice sunny apero-boat on the river^^)
-the more alternative and underground area close to Marconiplein for artistic experience, bars, (keilekafe, Brutus, Weelde).
-Nieuwe Binnenweg with many shops, coffees, restaurants and local bars for a hipster experience

name: Unieke tot woning getransformeerde winkel met tuin
description:
This playful house (built in 1916) has been transformed from fruit and vegetable shop to house. The high ceilings and huge windows make this house bright and spacious.
Located on a quiet square but around the corner begins the bustling city life!
We have a large open kitchen with 6 burner gas stove, dishwasher and espresso machine.
The sitting area has a projector where you can watch 4K movies/series.
The bathroom has a lovely bathtub and shower.
Tram to the center and station at 250 meters.
neighborhood_overview: We live in a quiet little square in a nice Rotterdam neighborhood with many families (Nieuwe Westen). Around the corner begins the city life with cafes, restaurants and coffee shops. You can also enjoy walking in the beautiful Heemraadspark, where there is also a large playground. Very convenient to central station (6 minutes by bike) and from the city center (5 minutes by bike).
