The apartment is located between two yacht ports, at the feet of the famous Erasmus bridge, which crosses the river “nieuwe Maas”.
Within 5-10 minutes walk, you can find lots of restaurants and bars at the waterside.
The great thing is that the building is in a peaceful quiet place, but once you crossed the street, you will be in de city which is alive day and night.

Nearby you can find shops, public transportations, ferries, and a view on the beautiful skyline of Rotterdam.

Recently they started to make a recreational zone with a city beach in the “Rijnhaven”,a place to swim, and hang out around the water and enjoy a fee bars. It takes 5 minutes by foot to get there.

2 supermarkets within 5 minutes walk reachable.

name: 19th Century Family Home in Vibrant District
description:
This recently renovated cozy family home from 1897 is our nice home for two years. Great quiet terrace with a large garden in the middle of the city.
The ground floor has an open character with a dining area, cooking island and a living area with fireplace.
The first floor has two children's rooms and a bedroom with walk-in closet. The bathroom is with walk-in shower and a bathtub.
The third floor has two bedrooms. This floor has a balcony, bathroom and laundry room.
neighborhood_overview: Looking for a hip and lively neighborhood where there is something to do? Then Oude Noorden is a neighborhood for you. In Old North, time seems to have stood still. Here you will still find the folk district of yesteryear, with its 19th century houses and picturesque squares. The river Rotte, the namesake of the city, rises here and emphasizes the typical character of the district. Over the years, the Old North has evolved, partly by entrepreneurs who wanted to put the area on the map. Today, it is one of the hippest neighbourhoods of Rotterdam. Locals love to shop, have breakfast, "have a bakkie" and dine there. Every Saturday there is a farmers market at the end of the street, on the Noordplein.
host_about: Twee en half jaar geleden verhuisd naar Rotterdam en erg enthousiast over de veelzijdigheid van deze stad. Ik houd ontzettend van (avontuurlijke) reizen en het ontmoeten van nieuwe mensen.

name: 100m2 modern design appartement
description: Welcome to our beautiful design apartment, an oasis of style and comfort designed by an architect and furnished by a young couple with a passion for art and hospitality. Located in the center next to a park, our apartment offers the perfect balance between adventure and relaxation. Enjoy abundant natural light, free wifi, a fully equipped kitchen and a comfortable bedroom. We look forward to welcoming you and ensuring you have an unforgettable stay!
neighborhood_overview:
The property is located in Blijdorp, which is a charming green neighborhood situated just north of the central station. At the end of the street, you'll find the popular Vroesenpark. This neighborhood offers a delightful blend of greenery, culture, and urban flair. Nearby, you'll discover cozy cafes, boutiques, and local restaurants where you can enjoy delicious dishes and drinks. The Blijdorp metro station is just a 2-minute walk away. The metro will take you to the center of Rotterdam in 5 minutes (3 stops).

One of the prominent attractions in the area is Diergaarde Blijdorp, the Rotterdam zoo. The convenient location near the city center and excellent public transportation connections make the apartment an excellent base for exploring Rotterdam.

name: Sonder Rose | Double Queen Room
description: Experience a harborside lifestyle at Rose. You'll be in the heart of Rotterdam and four short blocks from the river Maas. The traditional Dutch exterior with narrow red-brick and white trim perfectly complements each modern room. Arriving early? Store your belongings in our luggage lockers until check-in. This central location makes exploring easy. Take a walk down Scheepstimmermanslaan for an array of restaurants and shopping. Make the most of your adventure at Rose.
neighborhood_overview: Riverside Nieuwe Werk, also known as Scheepvaartkwartier, is one of Rotterdam’s trendiest neighborhoods. Stunning 1840s maritime architecture decorates the waterfront, centered around Veerhaven — a former harbor, now home to old sailing boats and bustling restaurants. Enjoy picturesque city views at The Park, Museumpark, or 100 meters in the sky at Euromast. Learn about Rotterdam’s history through a collection of 160 years at Worldmuseum. Or grab tickets to a football match at Feyenoord Stadium. You’re also close to Ahoy event center. Home to the largest port in Europe, this is a must-see destination.
host_about: Rooms, suites, and apartments in over 40 cities around the world. Every Sonder features designer details, keyless entry, and fast free WiFi. Experience a better way to stay today.

name: Cozy home for two, close to all hotspots
description: Rotterdam our home town. We love this city and want to share this with you. Our apartment is nearby the city center as well the Central Station (both a 15 min stroll away). Public transportation is just around the corner and takes you to various places in Rotterdam. 4 grocery stores just 5 minutes away. Also close to the nicest restaurants in town. The neighborhood is lovely and we live in a calm street. There is even a small forest not that far away. Relax in our spa bathroom after a long day.
host_about:
Hi fellow traveler(s),

Since I can remember I always had a passion for travel. In my past I traveled around the world for 10 months and loved it. For me accommodation must feel like a new home. Opening the door should give me an “aaah wow” moment. I’ve seen a lot of hotels/hostels and other kind of accommodation during those 10 months. This apartment is my home at the moment. I love arriving home and fall on the couch. I also love cooking and discovering my own city (and country). I like to read on my balcony with a cold drink in my hand. I want to share my experiences and passion for this city with you.

name: Ruime en frisse design woning Rotterdam centrum
description:
The house has been designed by an architect as part of a CPO project. The house has some unique design details, including a videnet, countertop, and large sliding glass doors. The house was designed according to the 7th generation principle of the “Iroquois” principle: the decisions we make today should lead to a healthy world over 7 generations in the future.

The house is a multi-generational home and can accommodate 3 generations by a separate guest house with its own bathroom.
neighborhood_overview: The head of Feijenoord is a nice residential area, right next to the center of Rotterdam. Experience the river the Maas with the Koninginnebrug (3min), Willemsbrug (5 min) and Erasmus Bridge (10 min) within walking distance. Metro station Wilhelminapier (10 minutes) walk.

name: Uniek appartement, mét dakterras en 2 slaapkamers
description:
Cozy and spacious apartment in the center with great views and sun all day on the roof terrace. In a beautiful, green environment with everything nearby. The apartment is few minutes walk from the Heemraadspark and West's most popular cafes & restaurants.

A wonderful base to discover the city and relax with family/friends.

Central Station is 10 min by bike and Rotterdam/The Hague airport is 10 min by car.
Parties and celebrations are not allowed.
neighborhood_overview:
Within 10 minutes by bike to Rotterdam Central Station and downtown area. In the same street you will find a big supermarket. Bus and tram stop just around the corner. The apartment is also easy to reach from the highway.

The Heemraadspark, historic Delfshaven and Blijdorp Zoo are within walking distance. Rotterdam West is a beautiful, green and lively neighborhood with lots of nice restaurants and cafes such as Beppie, De Burgemeester, Arzu West, Bar Simon and much more. A lovely place to discover Rotterdam.

name: Tiny House Historisch Delfshaven (Galerie Petit)
description: Welcome to the enchanting Delfshaven, where history and modern comfort go hand in hand! Prepare yourself for an unforgettable overnight stay in our atmospheric ART-INN residence in Delfshaven where art and living come together. With its centuries-old canals, picturesque facades, and winding streets, Delfshaven breathes a unique atmosphere that will keep you captivated right away.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the west of Rotterdam, Delfshaven is a charming neighborhood steeped in history and maritime atmosphere. The neighborhood was born in the 14th century as an independent city, but was later in the 19th century annexed by Rotterdam. Despite the growth of the modern city, Delfshaven has managed to maintain its historical character.

An important moment in the history of Delfshaven was the pilgrimage of the Mayflower in 1620. The starting point of this famous trip to America was not Plymouth in England, but Delfshaven. A memorial monument, called the Pilgrim Fathers Church, marks this historical event.

One of the most striking sights in Delfshaven is the Old or Pilgrim Fathers Church, built in the 15th century. This Gothic church has a rich history and houses the tomb of the famous pilgrim father, Reverend John Robinson. The area surrounding the church is filled with quaint streets, historic buildings, and cozy cafes.

Along the ancient canals of D

name: Calm room in colorful apartment
description:
Dear guests, I have a spacious bedroom with a big double bed that you can come stay in.

The west of Rotterdam is a calm area, close to the city center of both Rotterdam and Schiedam. You can find shops and a supermarket at de Franselaan. The tram and metro are at 2 min walking distance for a visit to the center, the central station or with 30 minutes directly to the beach.

neighborhood_overview:
Oud Mathenesse is a calm neighborhood on the west-side of Rotterdam next to were the harbor used to be. The Franselaan, a main street with food, shops and supermarket Dirk, the center of Schiedam and the Dakpark are nearby.

I’d recommend walking or taking the tram to the historic center of Schiedam with its canals as a contrast to Rotterdam’s post-war Architecture.

The tram and metro are at walking distance for a visit to the center of Rotterdam, the central station or with 30 minutes directly to the beach.

The Hague is close by with a 30 minute train ride, Amsterdam is about 1,5 hours away as well as Antwerpen in Belgium.

name: 1649 - Private room
description:
Private room located in the historic district of Delfshaven.

The house dates back to the 17th Century making it one of Rotterdam's oldest mansions. The stone-facade dating 1649 is characterized by an image of a dog. These emblems notable in the neighbourhood do not only serve as decoration but were utilized to give houses their own character in a period when house numbers were still unknown.

On July 22, 1620 the speedwell boat set sail from this very port.

Close to public transport.
host_about:
Culture, design, and kayak enthusiast, I work as an independent artist and cultural producer. I've been living in Rotterdam for a couple of years, happy to share my favorite places in the city. 

I don't list my name for privacy reasons we can exchange contact in person, and I'll pass my phone number incase you need anything or have any questions during your stay.

We live with our dog Peanut and host also dogs from time to time.

Bernadette.

name: Urban Mindful Getaway
description: Welcome to our Urban Mindful Getaway in the heart of Rotterdam! Experience the challenge of conscious living with just 100 liters of water and 1600 watts of power. This tiny house, built of reused materials and equipped with a composting toilet, offers tranquility in a green courtyard. Enjoy the unique split-level layout that creates a challenging living space. Discover the city on foot, by bike or by water taxi. Perfect for eco travelers and adventurers who want to consciously handle resources.
host_about: Als architect, ondernemer en toekomstvisualisator ben ik altijd bezig met het creatief vorm geven van mijn leefomgeving. In 2016 heb ik een tiny house (op wielen) ontworpen en gebouwd waarmee we off-grid o.a. op een landgoed gewoond hebben. In die tijd had ik ook de tiny house academy opgericht. Nu doet de herbouwde vorm van het huisje dienst als retreat voor onszelf en als inspiratiebron voor bewuste eco-toeristen zoals jij.

Welcome to our beautiful two-bedroom, 90 m2, apartment nestled in the heart of vibrant Rotterdam! Situated just a leisurely 5-minute stroll from the Central Station, this gem of a space is perched on the 11th floor, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the city's magnificent skyline.

Upon entry, you'll encounter a tasteful interior featuring high quality design furniture. Despite its prime city-center location, the apartment offers a peaceful haven, where you can unwind and relax.

name: Modern en licht appartement in Delfshaven
description: Welcome in this nice apartment! A great place for a couple of days away. In addition to being able to relax in the newly renovated and carefully designed apartment, there is a lot to do in the area. Within 2 minutes you will be in the Historical Delfshaven. A beautiful place with cozy terraces and nice restaurants on the water. With a tram and metro stop in front of the door, you can reach the bustling heart of Rotterdam within 10 minutes.

name: Grindhuis
description:
A characteristic garden house with all the comforts in the north of Rotterdam. Enjoy the leafy Hillegersberg and yet close to the city center (15-20 minutes by car or public transport) public transport and shopping street within walking distance.

The stairs to the bedroom are steep and not suitable for people with difficulty walking.
host_about:
Welkom in ons tuinhuis, wij zijn Rogier de Wit en Viviana Lima en wonen aan de overkant van de tuin met onze twee zonen.

name: Slow living Romantic Canal house -  city center
description: Rare and charming 120-year-old Romantic Canal House in the heart of Rotterdam!  On the most beautiful canal, this fairytail style cottage offers spectacular views, a romantic balcony, and stunning sunsets surrounded by vast nature, yet centraly located. Near metro, tram, supermarkets, cafes, pubs, unique shops, and delis. . Perfect  blend of tranquility and urban life, ideal for a romantic getaway. A place to relax, reflect and heal while enjoying the beautiful city.
host_about: Hi. I live in Rotterdam for about 6 years, and I am totally in love with this amazing city.  I made sure you would receive in my house a full Dutch experience with a full canal view, which is a rare find in Rotterdam as there are almost no old canals left in the city. Feel free to ask for recommendations for places to go and  to do. I have many:)

name: Beautiful condo "pearl of Roffa"
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm space. You'll have your own private top floor in a newly renovated artsy townhouse of 1926. Ideal for longer stays, near the city center but in a calm neighbourhood.

It has a bedroom (incl. queensize bed) & smart-tv, bathroom, living room with a work area, kitchen. You can reach the center of Rotterdam within 15 minutes by bike, bus or metro. With the Zuiderpark and the river Maas just around the corner, you can also retreat from the bustling city.
neighborhood_overview:
A lively and multicultural neighbourhood where most neighbours know each other. There is also a creative and artistic community.

There are multiple supermarkets, a drugstore and liquor store right within 5 minutes walking from the house. there is also a huge shopping center called Zuidplein 15 minutes walking from the house.

The river Maas is 5 minutes walking distance from the house which has multiple areas to chill and nice routes for running and cycling.
host_about:
Hello all,
We are a Dutch & Austrian couple, love to travel and prefer to avoid large touristic hotels. We really like to stay in B&B's to get to know local culture and create amazing experiences together with locals :-)  By now we also rent out a private apartment at the top floor of our own house, hoping to return the pleasure of all the nice B&B stay's we've had. Any questions about us? Feel free to ask!
Liesa & Franklin

name: Sunny home in quiet area of Rotterdam
description:
Welcome to our sunny home! Our living room is facing south, which means you can enjoy a cup of coffee from the couch while the sun is shining on your face all year. We also have two gardens, in the front (facing south) and in the back, and two bedrooms (one double and one single bed).

The house is located in a quite area close to a beautiful lake, but also only a 10 min bike ride or a few mins by train (Rotterdam Noord) to the city centre. Normally, you can use our bikes for free. Just ask :)

name: Geweldig modern herenhuis op top lokatie
description: With this large and stylish accommodation in a unique location in the Katendrecht district, you have the perfect base for your stay in Rotterdam. This bright house has all the comforts with 220 m2 over 4 floors. Close to restaurants, theater, public transport and water taxi. On a quiet park where children can play safely. In the cozy kitchen, you can open the doors to the green courtyard garden. We have two lovely cats. There is an automatic litter box and food provided.
neighborhood_overview:
Katendrecht has everything you want. It is quiet living with a nice green park, a playground within walking distance, surrounded by water, child-friendly neighborhood. A stone's throw away is the bustling deliplein, where you will find cozy restaurants, cafes and a theater. From deliplein, you can walk to the fenix shed with great terrace on the waterfront. And from there to the head of south where you can find hotel New York, among other things. You can take the water taxi anywhere.
From the house you can see the SS Rotterdam, a former cruise ship of the Holland America line, which now acts as a hotel, with a very nice terrace.
Katendrecht is under development and is the new bustling heart of Rotterdam. Really a top location to stay.
host_about: Hi! I'm Mark. Together with my wife Meike and my two kids Ise and Mats we live in the vibrant city of Rotterdam. We love to share our beautiful 1 year old townhouse this summer. Don't hesitate to send me a pm with questions regarding your stay at our place.

name: City Center Apartment: Metro-Markthal-Cube houses
description:
Just a 2-minute walk from the metro and train station "Blaak" you will find this nice and modern apartment in the heart of Rotterdam, overlooking the Markthal and the Cubic Houses.

After a cozy day in Rotterdam, you can plop on the lovely sofa or drink something on the balcony. The apartment has all the comforts: dishwasher, washing machine, dryer, rain shower etc.

In short: the perfect base to explore this cool city!
host_about:
I have travelled a lot during the last couple of years, lived in 5 countries, always up to discover new interesting places and meeting new people.

I started sharing my own home in Rotterdam so others can enjoy this amazing city.

description:

neighborhood_overview:
Delfshaven is one of the most picturesque and historically rich neighbourhoods in Rotterdam, known for its charming canals, historic buildings, and vibrant cultural scene.

1. Historical Significance

Old Port Charm: Delfshaven is one of the few parts of Rotterdam that was not destroyed during World War II, preserving its historic character. It was originally an independent town and port, dating back to the early 14th century, and was later incorporated into Rotterdam.
Pilgrim Fathers: This area is famous for being the departure point of the Pilgrim Fathers who sailed to America on the "Speedwell" in 1620 before transferring to the "Mayflower." This event is commemorated in the Old Church (Oude Kerk) of Delfshaven.

2. Architecture and Atmosphere

Canals and Historic Buildings: Delfshaven is characterized by its scenic canals lined with traditional Dutch houses, old warehouses, and windmills, notably the De Distilleerketel windmill.

Abrazos, 
Jhoy & Armèl

name: City Loft with Garden Getaway
description:
Welcome to our cozy city loft, just a short walk from Rotterdam’s center. Located on Begonia Street, you'll find boutiques, cafes, and a supermarket 1 minute away. Rotterdam Noord Train Station is 5 minutes on foot.

The house combines modern style and charm, with a fully equipped kitchen. The loft bedroom is bright and peaceful. Enjoy the morning sun in the back garden and evening sunsets on the front patio.

Perfect for a relaxing stay in Rotterdam!
host_about:
My name is Koen Bokhoven, I'm working as a Business Consultant in Sustainable Logistics in Rotterdam. I love to be around friends and family and do all sorts of activities, from water-sports to gardening. 

I love traveling and visiting new places, my girlfriend (Bente) lives in Copenhagen so this way we can rent out our house when I'm not there!
